comments: This game was played by my sister, than I wanted to play it as soon as I saw it, cause of its amazing graphics. Now that I'm playing it, I just had to rate it. But I had to wait but I never ever preset the never show me again because I knew I was going to rate it some day. And I guess that was today. Love you created a of rodeo staped! And the people who play it too!!‚ù§

I bought the mission mule, and it gave me nothing. I even got a confirmation email from Google play. I thought it was just because he's a mule, and I am in the savannah, but I still had to watch a video to get missions. So 1 star. Will rate 5 if I get my unlimited missions  EDIT: The team at yodo1 got back to me in 24 hours, and helped me understand what was up with the mission mule.  Amazing game. Everyone I tell about it, gets addicted to it.

Love this game It's very Addicting. I don't want to say to much because I'm still trying to figure it out. **update**  I understand how to play it better now. I want you to know I don't really play much In the way of games anymore but a friend showed me this game and now I'm addicted to it. Also wanted to mention that I'm 49 years old so in saying that this game is for the young and old alike.

Game is addictive and fun to play, great sense of reward when you discover and tame a new / rare animal, however there are way too many ads. Every time I die in the game there is a high chance for an ad which really puts the fun fast paced gameplay behind bars. Adds for deaths should only occur once you pass a distance of 3000 or more distance, as you already must have enough ad revenue from doubling coins on a opening and after a run.

The game is very fun itself but after some time it wouldnt work and im still trying to make it work again. It says download fail when i turn it on even though i have had it for almost a year now. But overall a fun addictive game
Great game, I play it when I have a lot of free time. However, I am stuck on a boss mission, I wish there was a way to skip it or replace it like with the other types of missions.
description: Saddle up and get ready to wrassle with the stampede-iest critters this side of the Savannah. Lions and Tigers and Bears are no match for this rodeo star. Armed with a lasso and a ten gallon hat, swing from the backs of stampeding buffalo, elephants, ostrich and more. Hold tight atop these bucking beasts and you might just win their hearts. When the stampede‚Äôs over, the zoo begins! Fill enclosures with your four-footed friends and let your patrons gaze in wonder. This is one wild ride that you will not want to miss - YEEHAWRide through the wild stampede on the backs of buffalo, elephants, and all types of exotic animalsDodge and avoid obstacles in your chase for high scoresCatch and befriend animals of all shapes and sizes to show off in your Sky ZooCollect a wide variety of hats for your character to wearInvite visitors to come admire your collectionExpand and Manage your zoo to earn huge rewards from visitorsWild Endless Runner Adventure

Saddle up and get ready to wrassle with the stampede-iest critters this side of the Savannah. Lions and Tigers and Bears are no match for this rodeo star. comments: It's a good twist on the base building genre. Whether or not it'll keep me interested long term I don't know. We'll see if, at later stages, it can become like the others where you have to spend money or fail. For now it's very entertaining.

Come! Along with brothers, we'l corner our enemy and battle if words don’t work.

✔ Shooters are capable of wielding all kinds of arms, from submachine guns, rifles to artillery and many more. 
✔ Bikers, with tons of heavy locomotives which move like lightning, robbing and setting things alight. Definitely a nightmare for all gangsters! 
✔ Modified Vehicle can be done from a minivan to a military Hummer. There's nothing we can't change, only what you can't imagine.

comments: Everything about this game is great, but this company/developer really differentiate themselves from the competition with their customer service and support. Any issues I've ever had with adcap or any kongregate apps were handled extremely quick with the most professions experience.   Try the game, it's addicting, challenging, and very fun. It is a freemium game but don't forget to support the devs but purchasing a gift pack or even just downloading a game you like for $1.  Thank you for the hard work guys/gals

About a few years ago, I had this installed on a Droid phone. I never was able to open the app to play. Recently, I glanced through the apps I had & remembered this one. After thinking it over, I decided to get it. Now, I am happy the developers decided to upgrade the game. This is fun. I am contemplating letting the üí∞ accumulate for one full day just to see how much I earn. Thank you developers for providing a fun little time waster. I recommend this if you are the type of person who üíò s making fake money. Try it out & hopefully you enjoy it.

Yes this is addictive, yes it's fun, and it's great because you can spend 12 seconds or 12 minutes on it and still get the same amount of enjoyment. BUT, and this is a very big but, this game is a HUGE drain on your battery. And no, I don't have an iPhone - I have a proper phone - a Sony XZ Pro. So it's not the weedy battery. No game I have ever played drains the battery away as fast as this game does, so it's clearly an issue that I wish they could fix.

Way way WAYYY too laggy. It's an easy casual game though. I wouldn't say it's "fun" but it does pass the time and make you want to achieve the little goals. Only goal, make more money in game. That's it and you achieve that by not even playing the game so there's no challenge whatsoever. Uninstalled after first day reaching about 500 Trillion and force closing 100 times.

This game is enjoyable, but like many have said, it drains battery life. Moreover, it hangs too long when switching planets. I suspect, like many areas of technology, performance testing new updates with older devices is not even a consideration. If it runs smooth on the latest and greatest then it is ready to ship.  Like many mobile games this is a casino. It's main existence is to make money. I do not have a problem with this so much, but the events give rewards based on leaderboards. Unfortunately, they are pay to win. You are bombarded with options to pay cash. Making the top charts without spending money is not likely to happen.  This game is a time and battery killer, so keep you charger close by.

I really like this game. its really fun. so i figured  i should tell you that all you have to do is change your date and time and the game doesn't know. Like i change it to the year 2036 and i get all of those years of profit in secs and then my phone fixes the date its self and i can do it again. I've restarted twice cause i felt bad for cheating lol. Well hope you can make it were we can't do that anymore.

Gave you 2 stars for a nice game, didn't play a lot though so couldn't tell you more.
God I hate the voodoo developers, they come up with cool game ideas but then just litter the game with ads and ruin it.. I understand some ads but god damn theres an and every 30 seconds.
I paid the 3$ for ad free, I had some Google Play money and the ads were very overwhelming, but the game was fun. STILL HAS ADS. Ridiculous. I'm so mad right now.

I understand that you wanna make more money then you have, but you have ads every 2 plays! 5 games? Okay. 10 games? Great. But 2? Seriously. And then there is that stupid ad bar at the bottom. When I slide across the screen, sometimes my finger goes down, right on the ad. Yay? I think not. Why do you think this game is rated a 3.8?

descriptionHTML:
Draw.ly is an amazing coloring game designed for adults and children. It’s completely FREE! No need to subscribe, all pictures can be unlocked with coins! There’re tons of interesting pixel arts for you to color, and more updated daily; you’ll never run out of coloring materials!

SUPER EASY GAMEPLAY: Fill the pixel blocks with color by number, and you’ll have a piece of super cool pixel artwork!

FREE COINS! New pictures and tools can be unlocked with coins. Earn more coins by finishing and sharing your coloring pieces and get TONS of coins upon first login!

Draw.ly isn’t just incredibly fun to play, it can also help children develop better hand-eye coordination, ability to focus, and recognition of colors and numbers. It also helps them practice drawing and coloring skills.

For adults, Draw.ly is really stress relieving. Just relax and enjoy a session of nice and comfy color therapy!

Download for FREE now and have fun coloring!

descriptionHTML:
FREE 3D simulation game to farm, craft, build, dress, home, fish, cook and chat!

Townkins: Wonderland Village is a 3D free to play simulation game with beautiful graphics and an immersive, online world that will capture your imagination and heart.

Nurture animals, cultivate crops, cook dishes, and fish with your friends! Real-time interaction means you can invite friends to your customized Town to chat and interact with your character! Always wanted to laugh at your friend's ridiculous outfit, while showing off your own? Now you can, using real-time emotes! Bored? Host a party, invite friends, and show off your stylish home! Countless customization options means that no two Avatars or Towns look the same; with a myriad of outfits, faces, hairstyles, and decorations to choose from! Furnish your very own home with an endless variety of wallpapers, flooring, and furniture! Get to know the quirky Townkins as they send you on exciting adventures, and progress through the main storyline to unlock more mysterious townfolk!

Play now for free, and experience these fun, specialized features:

• Farm and cook to complete orders and gain rewards!
• Challenge your friends and compete in various competitions for prizes!
• Complete quests to unlock fascinating characters in an immersive world!
• Specialize your skills by researching varied technologies!
• Personalize your Avatar with dozens of hairstyles, clothes, and different facial expressions!
• Make your home sweet home with tons of furniture, wallpaper, and flooring to choose from!
• Design your Town to your liking with your choice of decorations, paths, and buildings!
• Be inspired to cook tasty dishes and impress your friends!
• Laugh, cry, and congratulate your friends with real-time emotes!
• Play plenty of mini-games to enjoy with your friends!

App Notes:

• This app requires an active internet connection to play. Please make sure your device is connected while playing.

• Townkins: Wonderland Village is completely free to download and free to play. However, some items in the game may be purchased with real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

Contact Us:

• Townkins: Wonderland Village Customer Support: contact_townkins@funplus.com

• Need more Friends and want to receive game news and tips? Like 👍 our official Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/Townkins/

• Privacy Policy: https://www.funplus.com/privacy_policy/

• Terms of Service: https://www.funplus.com/tos/

Just anything more crime related like a dealer or mafia or hitman.

I suggest the possibility to get into politics, become president even (or prime minister, or not be able to at all depending on country), or join the military, and perhaps participate in wars if they arise. Right now, the game really only offers boring straightforward lives, and I hope that is changed.

description: Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.
descriptionHTML:
Release a platinum album at the age of 17, or die of old age only having a few qualifications in school and not much else, the choice is yours.

Pass your driving test and die in a fatal accident a year later or become a famous musician and become restricted in what you can do. Will you go to university or give it a miss?

Meet different people each time you play, start a relationship. Will they be the one? Let them move in and live happily ever after. Or... Will they leave you?

Jobs, and companies, are generated and are different for each game. Jobs require different qualifications to get hired, make sure you work hard and get that promotion! Will the companies CEO step down and allow you to change the company for the better?

Find your perfect house! Can't afford it? Get a mortgage, make sure to keep your payments up...

Each year you live contains new experiences. The ultimate life simulation.

InstLife does not require an internet connection, and can be played offline.

comments: As expected, it looks and performs amazing. Fighting mechanics and modes are pretty innovative and thrilling. It is quite stupid to compare the console version with mobile one. Each one has its own unique style, so they should NOT look the same, cz' each one provides the fans with a different gaming experience. This surely increases the already huge number of fans of Tekken. 5 üåü game

WOW, great memories came back. Amazing graphics, and story is going good so far. Only thing is the controles, I mean you should have given the original TEKKEN controls with the moves n all. Its now like a small kid can play. Their is no fun n pressure of making the right punch or through as the good old days. If you guys can make a lit like that, then its will more gold in a gold mine. Otherwise is a nice game.  Thank you

Samsung Galaxy S6... Alright, they went and fixed the release bug crashes within a day or two. I finally got to enjoy the game. It's pretty decent. I'm enjoying the whole fighting/build your characters concept. As promised, I've raised my rating. (Probably could give more on the post mission drops) other than that, I love how there isn't a limit to how many missions you can do and have to wait for an energy bar to replenish. Great game so far. (Give more on the drops though lol... seriously)

First off, the thought of the game and concept of direction it went in for a mobile game is fair, I'll give it that. But... I will say, being one of the best franchises ever created, I expected more. Not another knockoff style of Marvel and DC's (and MK's) style of fighting game. I expected originality from an original creator. The having to heal and near impossibility of play at a certain point (unless you pay a lot...) steered me away from it, tbh.

This game is beautiful! I have always loved Tekken ever since the 1st and have played them all. I only wish some of my favorite characters weren't missing, like Lei and Bryan and I haven't seen Yoshimitsu or Heihachi Mishima. Overall I am very impressed. Thanks, I have been waiting for this on Android for a long time! I would rate 4.5 stars ‚ò∫

So far I've been enjoying it. It's nothing too special, typical mobile fighting game but Tekken. The fact that's it Tekken makes it more enjoyable than average because I love Tekken, but that's just me. I feel that acquiring new characters needs to be way easier than it is, especially when you need to take on harder missions for bonus materials and currency. I don't like how you have to wait for characters health to regenerate. If characters healths auto filled per mission, I would definitely put more time into the game. Since it isn't, I have to constantly stop playing and wait for the health to refill, and I don't wait to use healing items because it takes away from my in game currency, which itself is difficult to obtain if you aren't constantly grinding. Aside from that, it's fun. Very fun, I recommend.

description: Your story begins here!Wanna enjoy living on campus with amazing friends?Wanna find love with the mysteriously luring vampire?The choice is yours!The wiser your choice is, the more interesting your story gets.You can never put your phone down as these weekly-added stories make you insatiable!‚óÜCampus Hacker‚óÜAlice the partygoer and Faith the unexpected are your roommates.When Norman the football player decides to move in to your flat, things get a little crazy...- Norman the football player, Peter the gamer, and Dean the aspiring actor are the candidates. Who can make you fall in love?- Problems at home can be solved if your choice is correct.- Your choice of an answer also affect your friendship and their lives. It's something to consider when choosing an option.‚óÜUntold Darkness‚óÜAlex St. Cyr is a member of the famous on-campus residence the House St. Cyr.On the way home after a party, you witness a girl who gets attacked by a man with fiery red eyes.How does this incident affect your life?And what are the secrets of the St. Cyr family?- Sexy and daring boys like Alex and Max make the story more thrilling!- Solve the mystery of the St. Cyr family.- Work hand and win the journalist competition!‚óÜYearbook‚óÜYour friend Daisy goes missing when you come to meet a detective who has recently moved in to town.Carl the detective and his assistant Stanley as well as Troy the classmate want to help you locate Daisy.Will you succeed in saving Daisy?Carl's dark past gets revealed as the search makes a progress...- Solve the mystery of Daisy's missing case.- Use your impressive memory to help Stanley locate his missing item.- Disguise and attend a party to catch the pickpocket!‚óÜHit the Floor!‚óÜWorst day ever! You lose job and boyfriend on the same day!While wandering the city feeling sucky, you run into your ex Ken in front of a bar.Remembering the good old times, you decide to start all over.- Work hard to sign the record deal!- David the producer, Adrian the pianist, and Ken the ex. Who has the ability to shine you on the stage the most?‚óÜFeatures‚óÜ- Add stories weekly.- Offer HQ graphic.- Divide up into genres.- Customize the look of a protagonist.- Change storylines depending on options.- Choose appearances depending on occasions.- Bookmark your favorite episode!Official Website: http://myshelfapp.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyShelf.NTTSolmare/Twitter: https://twitter.com/MyShelf_SolmareInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/myshelf_solmare/‚óÜAbout Us‚óÜNTT Solmare is a Japanese company based in Osaka, Japan. We strive to make the best simulation apps for adults. Our sims are free! If you like romance novels, visual novels, or cute guys, then we think that you will love our games!So download one of our free games today, and find out why our games are so popular!
descriptionHTML:
Your story begins here!
Wanna enjoy living on campus with amazing friends?
Wanna find love with the mysteriously luring vampire?
The choice is yours!

The wiser your choice is, the more interesting your story gets.
You can never put your phone down as these weekly-added stories make you insatiable!

◆Campus Hacker◆
Alice the partygoer and Faith the unexpected are your roommates.
When Norman the football player decides to move in to your flat, things get a little crazy...

- Norman the football player, Peter the gamer, and Dean the aspiring actor are the candidates. Who can make you fall in love?
- Problems at home can be solved if your choice is correct.
- Your choice of an answer also affect your friendship and their lives. It's something to consider when choosing an option.

◆Untold Darkness◆
Alex St. Cyr is a member of the famous on-campus residence the House St. Cyr.
On the way home after a party, you witness a girl who gets attacked by a man with fiery red eyes.
How does this incident affect your life?
And what are the secrets of the St. Cyr family?

- Sexy and daring boys like Alex and Max make the story more thrilling!
- Solve the mystery of the St. Cyr family.
- Work hand and win the journalist competition!

◆Yearbook◆
Your friend Daisy goes missing when you come to meet a detective who has recently moved in to town.
Carl the detective and his assistant Stanley as well as Troy the classmate want to help you locate Daisy.
Will you succeed in saving Daisy?
Carl's dark past gets revealed as the search makes a progress...

- Solve the mystery of Daisy's missing case.
- Use your impressive memory to help Stanley locate his missing item.
- Disguise and attend a party to catch the pickpocket!

◆Hit the Floor!◆
Worst day ever! You lose job and boyfriend on the same day!
While wandering the city feeling sucky, you run into your ex Ken in front of a bar.
Remembering the good old times, you decide to start all over.

- Work hard to sign the record deal!
- David the producer, Adrian the pianist, and Ken the ex. Who has the ability to shine you on the stage the most?

◆Features◆
- Add stories weekly.
- Offer HQ graphic.
- Divide up into genres.
- Customize the look of a protagonist.
- Change storylines depending on options.
- Choose appearances depending on occasions.
- Bookmark your favorite episode!

Official Website: http://myshelfapp.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MyShelf.NTTSolmare/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MyShelf_Solmare
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/myshelf_solmare/

◆About Us◆
NTT Solmare is a Japanese company based in Osaka, Japan. We strive to make the best simulation apps for adults. Our sims are free! If you like romance novels, visual novels, or cute guys, then we think that you will love our games!
So download one of our free games today, and find out why our games are so popular!

descriptionHTML:
Max Unblock is a fun and classic addictive puzzle game. The goal is to unblock the red block out of the board by sliding the other blocks out of its way with the minimal amount of moves. Max Unblock comes with 4 difficulties of puzzles. There are 200+ puzzles in total, the highest amount of puzzles you'll find in any logic block game, worth hundreds of hours to keep you challenged and hooked.

[How to play]
The red block escape to the exit.
Horizontal blocks can move from side to side.
Vertical blocks can be moved up and down

FEATURES
• 200+ puzzles in total for you to enjoy
• Established a hint system helping you to solve puzzles
• Reset/Undo buttons to help you figure out each puzzle
• Smooth and delicate animation
• 4 difficulty level: easy to expert
• Try to enjoy the "Max Unblock” using various devices and screen sizes

Max Unblock have been used in many schools to help improve kids with their brain functions in school and in their pastime. Not only for kids, Max Unblock can keep you mentally fit every day. It will improve your cognitive abilities such as attention, concentration and logic reasoning.

comments: Great but it highlights what dice give points on every roll. That's good for learning the game, but if you already know how to play, then you need only to pay enough attention to bankroll the minimum score per round. Where's the fun in that? Otherwise it's just mindless tapping.

I love the game and been playing for years. Downloaded this tonight and it is a good game, but seems it has way too many farkles and seems to be rigged. Can barely win any games. Did ok starting out betting 50 chips. Once I moved up to 100 chips, played 5 and didn't win once. If I had 2 dice left and rolled I farkled every time, but the other player does same thing and never farkles. Went back to 50 chips and won once. I believe some of these players are bots and the game is rigged.

Started it great!  Shortly after during 1000 coin multiplayer the game wouldn't recognize my roll of 5 4s and forfeited my turn.. I re enterd multilayer 1000 coin and lost the the same person 4 times in a row and never got more than 750 and farkeled 26 times in 4 games and also, I didn't enter rematch to play the same person..  Sad...

Initially the ads were every couple games which was manageable. After the latest update it's at the start and at the end of every game as well as sometimes randomly in the middle. They've become overly intrusive and it is just getting more and more irritating.
Garbage app. Games are rigged, people can cheat. It's no fun when I only get to roll once, then my opponent gets perfect rolls, over and over, and makes 7500 on their ONLY turn. Uninstalling.

You don't win very often! I play the single-player game and I've noticed that with the power dice turned off you can really rack up some points. As soon as you turn them on you very rarely win. Not much fun when you farkle 6-7 times out of 10 while throwing 4-5 dice!
description: Play Farkle Dice Game! We have finally created Farkle for Android.The rules of Farkle are very simple:In 'Multiplayer', you need to accumulate 5000 or 7500 points before your opponent does.In 'Single Player' and 'Tournament', you need to accumulate as many points as you can in 10 moves.You have 6 dice. When you roll them, you get different scoring combinations. In order to bank the points for your score, you need to accumulate at least 300 points. If you roll a Farkle three times in a row, you get -500. If you have not rolled a meaningful scoring combination, you "Farkle" and get 0 points.Full rules are here: http://farkle-game.com/rules.phpThe dice game Farkle is also known as 10000, Greed, Hot Dice, Squelch, Zilch, Dice Poker, Zonk or Farkel.
descriptionHTML:
Play Farkle Dice Game! We have finally created Farkle for Android.

The rules of Farkle are very simple:
In 'Multiplayer', you need to accumulate 5000 or 7500 points before your opponent does.
In 'Single Player' and 'Tournament', you need to accumulate as many points as you can in 10 moves.
You have 6 dice. When you roll them, you get different scoring combinations. In order to bank the points for your score, you need to accumulate at least 300 points. If you roll a Farkle three times in a row, you get -500. If you have not rolled a meaningful scoring combination, you "Farkle" and get 0 points.

Full rules are here: http://farkle-game.com/rules.php

The dice game Farkle is also known as 10000, Greed, Hot Dice, Squelch, Zilch, Dice Poker, Zonk or Farkel.
recentChanges: We Wish You a Merry Christmas!
summary: Farkle Dice Game - board dice game
title: Farkle Dice Game

comments: I freaking love this game but I do recommend more energy or at least less time to wait for energy. Please and thank you :)  P.S. We need more diamonds some how like. Maybe you should let us watch ads for 2-5 diamond's each ad. Or do a daily login type thing. I know you guys wont but I've been playing this game a ton and for a long time. i restart everything because when you guys make new stories it makes me want to use diamonds but I don't have anymore. I restarted the game like over 10 times honestly. Thanks for a great game though.

I never thought I would find a game like this that would work so well and play so easily! The only things I would change would be adding videos to gain more gems, or getting 2 gems after each chapter. Maybe even some extra gems after finishing a story? Getting gems on previously finished stories as well. I would also add the option to replay a chapter from the menu, not only after playing the chapter. Other than that, THIS GAME IS A MUST PLAY!

I really do love the stories this game offers. I just wish the key and diamond system was better. I feel like I've purposely passed up some great stories just to play through them quickly so I could get back to the current story I'm really hooked on. Not to mention I've put money into the game as well. But being on a budget, I'm limited with what I can do. Sadly I think that is what will eventually make me stop playing such a great game. It's just too expensive in the end.

I have fallen in love with this app and whoever created the stories is creative and amazing, however it would be nice if you could make it so we can earn more keys per time given and definitely make it so the good choices don't cost so many diamonds. Those two factors get really annoying and depressing. All the good choices cost way too many diamonds. Unless  you make it so we can earn more of those per chapter and let us earn free ones by watching adds or something. Otherwise, amazing game. Thanks.

Amazing! I love it but I absolutely HATE that you only get 1 key every 2 hours. And once you get 2 keys it stops giving you them. I love the freshman and I'm on chapter 11 but it will take me ages to finish all of them as the lack of keys you give. I think it should be 2 keys every 1 hour and the keys come non-stop. I will change my review to a 5 star if you consider and use some of these suggestions. Thank You.

I love this app! I just wish you could collect more than 2 keys at a time. Sometimes the chapters feel short and to only be able to accumulate 2 keys feels like its not enough. 3 to 5 would be way better! Its already a bummer to not have enough diamonds to unlock cool stuff. (unless you want to pay more.. Not everyone has money to spend on phone app games)
description: One choice can change everything! Fall in love, solve crimes, and embark on epic fantasy adventures in immersive visual stories where YOU control what happens next! Current stories include:THE FRESHMAN, BOOK 1. Welcome to Hartfeld University! You'll make friends for life, and maybe even find true love. Will you date bookish James, party girl Kaitlyn, football hero Chris... or all three at once?- Dress to impress with fashion forward outfits.- Choose a date for the elegant and romantic Winter Formal.- Support new friends as you tackle freshman adventures together!THE CROWN & THE FLAME, BOOK 1. Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown!- Form alliances to build your army.- Master unique weapons.- Choose between elegant ball gowns and powerful armor.- Crush your enemies in an epic battle!MOST WANTED, BOOK 1. The heat is on when a no-nonsense Texas Marshal and a Hollywood detective are thrown together to stop a deranged hitman. Can you catch the killer?- Play as Detective Dave Reyes and U.S. Marshal Sam Massey.- Investigate a mystery with twists you won't see coming.- Examine evidence at crime scenes.- Stop the killer before he can claim another victim!...PLUS more new stories COMING SOON!Choices is by the team that first created story games for mobile over a decade ago. Later we created Surviving High School and Cause of Death, the first games with episodes, for EA.Both games hit the Top 25 and were inspirations for other companies. After leaving EA, our team regrouped in a small office and with the quacking of nearby ducklings we set out to create story driven games with heart. As Pixelberry, we launched two hit games, High School Story and Hollywood U.Our team has now grown to over a dozen of the most experienced game writers in the industry. In our 10 years of creating story games together, we‚Äôve seen heartbreak, marriages, great adventures, and even Pixelbabies.But even through diaper changes and late nights, we think we‚Äôve created our best work to date. We hope you‚Äôll fall in love with our newest characters, Chris, James, Kaitlyn, Dave, and Sam just as we have.Enjoy,- The Pixelberry Team
descriptionHTML:
One choice can change everything! Fall in love, solve crimes, and embark on epic fantasy adventures in immersive visual stories where YOU control what happens next! Current stories include:


THE FRESHMAN, BOOK 1. Welcome to Hartfeld University! You'll make friends for life, and maybe even find true love. Will you date bookish James, party girl Kaitlyn, football hero Chris... or all three at once?

- Dress to impress with fashion forward outfits.
- Choose a date for the elegant and romantic Winter Formal.
- Support new friends as you tackle freshman adventures together!

THE CROWN & THE FLAME, BOOK 1. Your enemies stole your kingdom, but now the time has come for you to raise an army, master magic, and reclaim your crown!

- Form alliances to build your army.
- Master unique weapons.
- Choose between elegant ball gowns and powerful armor.
- Crush your enemies in an epic battle!

MOST WANTED, BOOK 1. The heat is on when a no-nonsense Texas Marshal and a Hollywood detective are thrown together to stop a deranged hitman. Can you catch the killer?

- Play as Detective Dave Reyes and U.S. Marshal Sam Massey.
- Investigate a mystery with twists you won't see coming.
- Examine evidence at crime scenes.
- Stop the killer before he can claim another victim!

...PLUS more new stories COMING SOON!

Choices is by the team that first created story games for mobile over a decade ago. Later we created Surviving High School and Cause of Death, the first games with episodes, for EA.

Both games hit the Top 25 and were inspirations for other companies. After leaving EA, our team regrouped in a small office and with the quacking of nearby ducklings we set out to create story driven games with heart. As Pixelberry, we launched two hit games, High School Story and Hollywood U.

Our team has now grown to over a dozen of the most experienced game writers in the industry. In our 10 years of creating story games together, we’ve seen heartbreak, marriages, great adventures, and even Pixelbabies.

But even through diaper changes and late nights, we think we’ve created our best work to date. We hope you’ll fall in love with our newest characters, Chris, James, Kaitlyn, Dave, and Sam just as we have.

Enjoy,

- The Pixelberry Team
developerAddress:
Pixelberry Studios

descriptionHTML:
A better, more fun way to learn and train chess! Master chess through engaging games and interactive lessons with Magnus Carlsen, the World Chess Champion!


UNIQUE TRAINING BY CHESS EXPERTS

Play unique, beautiful games crafted by chess experts and game design experts. Deepen your chess skills through premium lessons based on games by Magnus Carlsen and other world-leading chess players. All games and lessons are created by Magnus Carlsen and his team of experienced Grand Masters, all of whom have years of coaching experience.

Magnus Trainer makes learning chess easy and engaging for players of all levels. New games are updated and added regularly to bring you the best possible experience, and we're adding new theory lessons every week.

Each mini-game has dozens of levels, ranging from beginner to advanced, allowing all chess players, new and experienced, to find a challenging fit to improve their skills. Those who have never played chess before are able to learn the fundamentals in a series of introductory lessons, while more experienced players have access to advanced tactics and strategies, covering a range of end-game essentials.


FROM AN AWARD WINNING TEAM

The Magnus Trainer app has been featured in Fast Company, The Guardian, and VG, and is the creation of the team behind the Play Magnus app, winner of several design awards.

“I’ve always done things a little differently. That is what inspired me to create Magnus Trainer. Chess has always been fun, but this takes learning and training chess to a new level. Magnus Trainer is chess training for everyone!”
— Magnus Carlsen

“The Future of Chess!”
— Rob, App Store Reviewer

You can also check out our other free app, Play Magnus. Play against Magnus at any age from 5 years and up!


FEATURES

- Multiple unique, beginner-friendly mini-games, with dozens of levels in each.
- Unique and innovative game design ensures essential chess skills are developed in a fun and effective way.
- Caters to beginners and advanced players alike.
- Learn chess from the greatest player of all time!


REACH FURTHER WITH A MEMBERSHIP

The app is free to use, with added benefits for paying members.

Members enjoy instant access to all 150+ premium lessons, many exclusive only for members. As a member, you also get infinite lives so you can always keep playing, including exclusive bonus levels.

For Magnus Trainer we offer the following subscriptions:
- 1 month
- 12 months
- Lifetime


TERMS OF PAYMENT

Payment will be charged to your Google Play account after you’ve confirmed a purchase. Subscription to a membership automatically renews, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, and the price for renewal will be provided. You can change your subscription settings in Subscriptions in Google Play, or in the More tab in Magnus Trainer when a subscription is active.

It is not possible to cancel an active subscription to get a refund of remaining time.

Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

For more information:
Terms of Use - http://www.playmagnus.com/terms
Privacy Policy - http://www.playmagnus.com/privacy

www.playmagnus.com
recentChanges: We‚Äôre SO excited to announce the launch of the awesome Magnus Trainer app for Android. Hope you‚Äôre excited too!

For a limited time we‚Äôre offering early subscribers a free 5-day trial, so you can check out all premium content and features. As a member, you‚Äôll get access to a huge amount of exclusive lessons designed by Magnus and his team of chess experts, as well as improved versions of the games available in the iOS app.
We really hope you enjoy Magnus Trainer on Android!
summary: Learn chess with the World Champion
title: Magnus Trainer - Train Chess

comments: The usual city builder game that's easy to build up your castle/city way faster than it's other counterparts. The people I've met on this game were pretty kind, the battle simulating is a nice touch which I haven't seen anywhere else. Sad that I only get to see like 3/4 models of the same monsters though.

Been playing game for couple of days, enjoying it so far. Lots to do, build times not to long at start, graphics good. Love the fact that in game purchases are there if you want them but you are not pushed to buy. Game plays well on my Samsung tablet and LG phone. Been playing for months now, still love it, definately not a play to win if you get into a good alliance

After playing mobile strike for a solid year, that game is really expensive if you want to be at the top with the big dogs. And this game seems great to where you don't have to spend much and actually enjoy the game. The graphics on her are amazing. I would suggest playing this game to all. üëçüëä

This is a war game where no one wants ts to fight. Don't try attacking anyone bigger than you. They won't fight you back, they will just attack your buildings, which you won't be able to defend. It costs real money to avoid having them destroyed. Spend your time and money somewhere else.

When I first downloaded it promised you didn't need to pay to win and that hackers would be felt with - that was a lie. If your not prepared to spend a lot of money your just going to get wiped out by those who do or their hacker friends. This game isn't worth the time and data needed to play until there is a level and fair playing field.

It is a scam game. You have users that work for the company and set up different realms but same players the force purchases. They then sell old accounts and start New realms. Money goes over seas to like turkey and russia.

descriptionHTML:
Google Play’s Carnaval - Festive updates you can’t resist

Build your own world in this strategy war game! War and Order is the perfect fusion of real time strategy, tower defense, and castle building games and has received several Global Google Recommendations.

Orcs, elves, and mages are yours to command in a gorgeous 3D medieval game world. Raise a massive fantasy army for HUGE fully animated battles. Clash with enemies from all over the world in real-time! Choose your alliance and take castles, slay monsters, and stake new territory as a tribe! This is WAR, and there’s never a dull moment as your screen lights up with constant new battles, chats, and upgrades!

You must battle to become more powerful than any king in history in this dangerous war game. It’s up to you, your strategy, and your allies to conquer an endless world of empires and imagination.

★HOMELAND
• Recruit and train over 50 fantasy soldiers, uniting Orcs, Elves, Humans, Mages, Beasts, and Angels.
• Your ultimate building game: Construct and upgrade tons of buildings for new soldiers, buffs, and resources!
• Research new magic and technology FAST for cutting-edge tactics and weapons!

★ALLIANCE
• Friend, feud, and chat with players from around the world in real time.
• Fight and build together to conquer enemies and build castles you could never hold alone.
• Share and expand territory for exclusive bonuses!
• But remember! This is a war strategy game. Tust no one!

★CONFRONTATION
• Sweep the battlefield in huge real-time PvP matches!
• Build your force to leviathan proportions!
• Engulf other lords’ castles as you expand your territory.

★CONQUEST
• Command and conquer other players’ castles to plunder their resources and climb power rankings!
• Vanquish roaming monsters for their treasures, from man-eating Ogres to massive Dragons.
• Play castle defense games and protect yourself and your allies from would-be conquerors.

★EMPIRE
• Not just a one castle game: Take over the Royal City to rule over the realm with unheard of power and privileges!
• Explore unknown lands to find elite resources, ancient ruins, and more surprises!
• Grow your alliance territory for richer rewards and resources!

Follow War and Order on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/WarandOrder1/
developerAddress: 1201 Orange street, suite 600, Wilmington DE, USA
recentChanges: Google Play‚Äôs Carnaval - Festive updates you can‚Äôt resist
1. Accounts can now be bound to multiple 3rd party services! A single game account can now bind 2 third-party login methods.
3. Optimized Elite Wars declaration requirements: Cannot declare on alliances that will battle within 2 hours.
summary: Build a fantasy empire! Orcs, elves, amazing graphics. Battle players worldwide!
title: War and Order

description: Scooter Freestyle Extreme 3D 2, is the sequal to the first Scooter FE3D game.The sequal has a massive upgrade to graphics, physics, animations, and pretty much everything else.Awesome freestyle scooter game in 3D. Go blast the skatepark to earn points to upgrade and customize your character, your scooter and your skills.Whether you like skating street, or big ramps, half pipes and bowls, Scooter FE3D 2 has it all!Ride fast, do manuals, slides, flip tricks, grabs, wall rides and all the other tricks you can imagine, and line them together for insane combos like the pros!Customize your characters clothes and scooter!Earn skill points to level up your characters skills, like jump height, spin speed and more!Play 3 different game modes: Arcade Mode, S-C-O-O-T Mode and Free Run!The game is developed by independent developer EnJen Games. Follow EnJen Games on www.facebook.com/EnJenGames, to request new features, report bugs, or get the latest news about new EnJen Games or updates!
descriptionHTML:
Scooter Freestyle Extreme 3D 2, is the sequal to the first Scooter FE3D game.

The sequal has a massive upgrade to graphics, physics, animations, and pretty much everything else.

Awesome freestyle scooter game in 3D.
Go blast the skatepark to earn points to upgrade and customize your character, your scooter and your skills.

Whether you like skating street, or big ramps, half pipes and bowls, Scooter FE3D 2 has it all!

Ride fast, do manuals, slides, flip tricks, grabs, wall rides and all the other tricks you can imagine, and line them together for insane combos like the pros!

Customize your characters clothes and scooter!

Earn skill points to level up your characters skills, like jump height, spin speed and more!

Play 3 different game modes: Arcade Mode, S-C-O-O-T Mode and Free Run!

The game is developed by independent developer EnJen Games. Follow EnJen Games on www.facebook.com/EnJenGames, to request new features, report bugs, or get the latest news about new EnJen Games or updates!
summary: Scooter Freestyle Extreme 3D 2!Skate parks, earn skills and upgrade characters.
title: Scooter FE3D 2

comments: Nice game with very good events but the drop rates to heroes of 5 star is too low i killed a lot of gems and scrols and hero orbs and my first 5 star i  dropped it at lvl 75. Okok now again event of summoning 100 scrolls and i continue still no 5 star hero only 4, just try and fix the drop rate. In the rest its a nice game.

Excellent game. Best Idle, if not best game period on the market. Not really P2W, just pay to speed up. Heroes are amazing, unique and cool. There are also lots of other things to do besides just idle and wait to get stronger. So much content and you're given free gems from watching adds. Doesn't make you pay to succeed or have fun. Literally no complaints. And that's coming from someone that just in general has an issue with 99% of mobile  games. Download this!

Fun at first, but you have to pay a lot of real money for it to stay fun. Otherwise you have to wait weeks and months to progress. Some events can only be fully completed by spending hundreds of dollars (yeah, that much). Not worth it. If you have that much money, use it on something better than this. Improve your life, use your time better, don't waste it here. Good luck!

I purchased the spring festival card on top of all the money I've already dumped into this game and the devs didn't give me my in game rewards. I've submitted numerous tickets to get a refund or my rewards and they just reply there is no problem. Ya no problem with you taking my money.  They deleted my review, wonder how many other people had this issue and had reviews deleted.

Wasn't sure about this game at first. I love it. I use a f2p  and a vip one  to see  the difference  between the two. Really well done. Having said all that the game does require patience. This is an IDLE game. You pick it up do dailies, talk, spend money, or what ever you want to do in game, then put it down to "farm gold,xp,mats". The high end heros do take some planning to aquire as a f2p player. This game requires patience because it's an IDLE game. Yes some people have a ton of money to throw at the game but don't be jealous, just play your game and have fun.

Not what I expected, given that my first impression of it was of IH being an "annoying add". Once I decided to pick it up though my thoughts changed rather drastically.   It's simple, it's fun and the warm colour palette of the graphics make a nice change compared to the widespread use of bleak colours in other games.   If you think you might enjoy this game, you sure are my friend.

descriptionHTML:
"Android Excellence Game" of Google Play. Play with 12 million global players!
Join millions of other players around the world and start your journey from Sara Forest to the High Heaven, leading your band of heroes into ancient ruins to battle the forces of darkness!

GAME FEATURES:

★IDLE System★
Set your heroes training while you’re away. When you return to your phone, they will be stronger, gained new abilities, and ready for battle. Grow & Train a powerful squad without all the grinding!

★Evolving Strategy★
More than 200 Heroes in different factions with specific skills. Summon your Warriors, TRAIN them to become powerful heroes, or convert them into Spirit material for EVOLVING. Forge magical gears, and outfit your warriors for victory!

★TONS of Content★
With battlegrounds galore and dungeons aplenty, heroic quests, mysterious towers, arena, guild, much fun to enjoy!

★GUILD Wars★
Fight alongside your friends and players everywhere in a war for control of the floating continent. Join multiplayer guild boss-battles and lead your guild to supremacy!

★Worldwide Arena★
Put forth your best heroes to do battle in the ARENA. Watch them PK online in a multiplayer contest for glory! Climb the Leader board for the best rewards!

comments: For a game that is still in soft-launch and unreleased it's a pretty well made free Sims game. It may have limited things to do for now but it has a lot of potential to be an amazing mobile Sims game.   A few criticisms though but nothing too bad in my experience:   1. The game will very occasionally not load when travelling to a new location or when redeeming heirloom tickets or event exclusive items, forcing me to exit the game  2. When I exit from the game it will sometimes not save the actions I've done  Besides those few minor problems I think this game is great, keep it up EA

SUPER GLITCHY. My sims now won't go to work, they haven't even finished their career stories. It freezes alot, and for a few minutes. A mate of mine can never give out stickers. Can't sell furniture and a few other issues but it is a free game after all. Just fix the darn glitches.

The new update is better than the last one, however it still lags a little. My daily tasks won't reset either. It has been "100% complete" for a few days now... I also think the game should include a selling function, as my inventory is filling up fast and I can't sell any of it. Especially when one of the daily tasks is to buy new items for the house everyday.

This is the best game ever! I have not stoped playing it since the day I got it. I wish there was six stars for this app because it deservs it! Who ever thought of the idea for this game is a genius. The game is fun and addictive perfect for when you are bord and looking for something to do.
Energy takes too long to refill and can only sleep or shower once a day so you can't refill energy quicker
I like it but it's not that free like the Sims 4 if you know what I mean.
description: Express your creativity as you customize your Sims‚Äô distinct appearances and unique personalities, giving them traits and having fun with fashion and hairstyles. Effortlessly build your Sims the perfect home, choosing favorite designs and d√©cor, with more detail than ever before on mobile. Experience the rich and entertaining moments of your Sims‚Äô lives as they accomplish career goals, pursue hobbies, develop relationships, and improve their Lifestyle. Party with friends, fall in love, and establish a legacy. What stories will you tell? CREATE UNIQUE SIMSCustomize Sims‚Äô appearances, hairstyles, outfits, makeup, and accessories. From nose to toes, there are endless possibilities! Then put together an unforgettable wardrobe when you team up with Izzy Fabulous in the Fashion Shop. Choose personality traits for each Sim, like Active or Musical, and add more as your Sims gain life experience.BUILD THE PERFECT HOMEDesign your Sims a home where they can experience all that life has to offer. Effortlessly personalize home layouts and designs, selecting from a variety of furniture, appliances, decorations, and even themed collections. Then take them out to discover awesome venues like a fashion studio, restaurant, and nightclub. SHAPE YOUR SIMS‚Äô LIFESTYLE Guide the stories of your Sims‚Äô lives from careers and hobbies to relationships and families. Pick exciting careers like Fashion Designer and Doctor, and hobbies like Cooking and Guitar playing. Have friendly and romantic relationships with other Sims and take Risky Actions like trying for a kiss or inventing an experimental recipe. Start a family and create a path for future generations by passing down powerful Heirlooms. PLAY TOGETHERHost and attend parties with other Sims where you can socialize and earn rewards. Show off your amazing house, develop romantic relationships, and even decide to move in with other people‚Äôs Sims. Join special daily events like Speed Dating in the Park or the Market Square Music Festival. Plus, vote for the most popular Sims as they make their way to fame.There are endless ways to connect when you craft big and small moments for your Sims, and see where life takes them in The Sims Mobile!____________Important Consumer Information. comments: Just a quick review. Can you please add night time to the game? I'm bored because its always day. And please add weather like rain,sunny,thunderstorm and winter. It would be great too if you win the tournament,you can travel to other country.

While definitely a decent game and time passer. It should be painfully apparent to any non spender that you are almost all but required to watch ads for progression. I do not mind this that much. What I do mind is the ads exceeding 30 seconds. Please meet us somewhere and put a cap on ad length.

No choice of starter car. New cars are a unreachable goal. Video ads aren't worth watching. ( 5 vids for 1 blueprint. 40 bps for a car.) Short, unchanging loop of scenery that fades in slowly. Boosters run for 30sec and take 20 MINUTES to cool down.

Great idler. Refreshing concept for an idle game. The only thing I can ask from the devs is to optimize the game for better battery consumption. I play MOBA and other graphics/resource hog games but this one drains my battery more than any other game I play.

comments: I'm really enjoying this game. It beats the previous bid wars-storage auctions & pawn shop game I've played. And the rest of the screen shows the normal background for mutt's semi legal store, and I pretty much can't do anything when this happens. I have to reset the game, and each time I try to "show results" in mutt's semi legal store, same thing happens. Please fix this

Really liked the game at first, but I'm encountering a glitch early on that's making it unplayable. When I try to tap on the one of the first buildings you unlock, it tells me it's still downloading but is stuck at 0%. I've tried restarting the app, restarting my phone, reinstalling the app, but the problem persists. If this was resolved I'd definitely give it a better rating.

What is wrong with the newest update? I can't acquire my item from the switch shop. Every time I click on get item, the black screen goes to the top left of the screen. And I can see the normal background picture. When that happens I have to close the game and reset. I've tried to get the item 20 times and it does that every time.

Was a great game til the update. Now I have to open it twice for my energy to update and for the money in the pawn shop to change. Also when I bargain with clients now it's alway a negative profit compared to before. More annoying then anything

My main issue with this game is the fact that a mission is requiring me to renovate a building but in order to do that I need to download an additional package which WILL NOT download. Rendering the mission unattainable and the game broken by default. Would this issue be resolved then there would be no need for such a low star rating and I would gladly rate it better.

descriptionHTML:
Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you’re not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You’ll be rich and powerful in no time!

HIGHLIGHTS

💸PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!

💸OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!

💸RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!

💸LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!

💸GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!

💸COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!

Take part in every auction and don’t miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! Try your luck, but never ignore your instincts: they can make or break a bidder’s career!

Become a rising star as you take part in bigger auctions and deal with the good and bad attention you’ll get: some big pawn shop moguls might not like the competition your business represents, and they’ll pull out all the stops to hinder your path! Such problems come with the territory when you get rich and notorious, so be prepared to deal with it!

Start your pawn empire now and get ready to bid!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

descriptionHTML:

comments: I'm very happy to have stumbled upon this game to satiate my cravings while I wait for season 2. I am enjoying this game so far. It keeps me hooked at a comfortable distance, not demanding. I love the quirky animations, the charming stylized set and character designs. My only qualm about the gameplay is the waiting time in Diagnostics. I thought spending 40gems for an additional host slot would mean two hosts being diagnosed at the same time. Instead I find out the 40gems was for the que. Also it would be great if we could play eithet offline or online. Anyway great job to the game devs!

The 30 host cap immediately becomes pretty difficult to work around, especially when you need to have duplicates of the  hosts to increase their max level cap/attribute score as well as duplicates of hosts for hat colours. I'm hoping there's a way to increase this later in the game. Also, synthblood is incredibly difficult to obtain especially when you need more to fix higher level hosts. Overall though, the game is pretty generous with currency, so I don't think I've ever ran into a hard building wall that made me think I had to spend money on it to progress further. So far, I'm enjoying the game and looking forward to the updates
The host cap of just 30 is a real problem because it becomes difficult to rank up higher level hosts. I would love to continue playing but the cap is a dealbreaker. Hope you can fix this asap

Pros: 1. Good design and SFX 2. Balanced currency and gameplay 3. Detailed and reasonably complex  Cons: 1. Unnecessary level cap (level 25). I noticed that after reaching level 25, no additional exp is received for doing stuff.  I hope this level cap is removed, as there are still Escalante missions that require level 30, 35,..., 50 to take part in.  I feel like I am wasting my time and effort by catering on hosts when my supposed XP for those actions are neglected simply because the limit is at level 25 right now, when it should be at 50.  Please fix this, I really like playing this game. But because of this premature level capping, I'm afraid this would significantly lessen my motivation in playing and spending on the game. Thanks.
Great pre release! Join us at the subreddit /r/westworldgame to talk strategies and have fun :)
Great game and pretty entertaining.

comments: There is just to much to say about this brilliant, creative, and fun game! It keeps me busy while im bored and on a road trip! I saw an ad for this on instagram and decided to download it, and let me tell you I was not disappointed with the outcome. I've been seraching for games like this and I have finally come across such a fantastic game! The Fluffy charectors should be sold as toys because of their adorable look!

I have just one piece of criticism... How is it that you're not selling these things as toys??? I want, like, all of them. For the love of God, make a Kickstarter if you must, but you need to make real Fluffies and sell them right now! The game's great, by the way, although I wish the Fluffy didn't cover the view so much, and I also wish the rainbow system thing was better explained, because I have no idea how it works. Keep it up!

It's interestingly successful. Im actually into the games with a good story or good music. Although this game contains neither Im actually loving it! The only comment that I would say is that I can't see much thing because of the fluffies are big, I usually mix coins or fire and avoid both :D

I am really hoping that it updates, because I want all the monthly gem stones to be in stone section. I think it would be cool to have my gem stone. And play as it.  Anyways, I really love the game, it is so amazing!! If you love kawaii and fun games, get Fluffy Fall!!! üòäüíï

First of all, I was astonished by the graphics. It's simple to learn, and despite the lack of any instruction, I understood how to play immediately. It could honestly use a little more to do, long run, levels or other goals beyond what's already there, but for the time being it's a lot of fun.

Absolutely Love this! I've only been playing for at least an hour but it's so unbelievably adorable! I always try sticking with adventure games but any game with cute little puffblocks are always gonna be tested as well, I definitely recommend people of all ages to play üòÅ

descriptionHTML:

descriptionHTML:
Get ready to have some fun in the Ponyville, ladies! Four of your favorite ponies feature this brand new hair salon game for girls on DressUpWho.com and you’re invite to join Applejack in and help her impress her colourful clients with her amazing hairstyling skills. Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy and Twilight Sparkle are going to be your clients of the day and you and Applejack need to make sure they leave your beauty place with a huge smile on their face and looking jaw-dropping. Ready? Now get ‘My Little Pony Hair Salon’ game started and see that crazy are looks you can put together for the three ponies looking for a change. Use your mouse to guide Applejack in the hairstyling process and once you’re done with each of your clients… dress them up in super cool outfits and matching accessories. Have fun, ladies!

Keywords: My Little Pony, Applejack, Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy, Twilight Sparkle, Hairstyles
summary: My Little Pony Hair Salon - Magic Princess
title: My Little Pony Hair Salon - Magic Princess

Been seeing this game on the playstore but never bothered to install it. I was wrong. It was so much fun to play with and the levels are well thought since you can actually achieve 3 stars even though you just started to play the game plus the game is generous enough to give characters and gems to spend on the game. It doesn't force you to spend real money. It gives you the decision to to that which is a plus factor. Will definitely play this game for a long time. Can you please add auto complete feature on stages that has 3 stars already. Thanks!

This game is amazing... The graphics are smooth, the gameplay is amazing, and for a mobile game my phone can handle 60 fps from it, you guys made something i never expected in mobile. A few minor things though, 1. The first thing is that this game is a bit grindy because of the level you need to unlock new levels, but that encourages doing hard/supreme mode so yeah, i love that you put dark souls and bloodborne references in the achievments, well the game is doing well so far so keep it that way, (also pls add offline mode, just a suggestion)

I don't even know anymore. This is, without a doubt, one of the most robust, refined, and beautiful pieces of software on the Android market today. The combat is punchy and visceral, the controls are tight, the character designs are neat and stylish without going overboard, and the story is very anime if you catch my drift. Progression is nice and smooth even without spending a single dime, especially with all the gifts and events the devs put out. If you consider yourself even slightly interested in ARPGS like Devil May Cry, you absolutely owe it to yourself to try this one out.

This game has awesome graphics. Cool fighting styles, each unique to each character. Even when new characters are released, it doesn't seem to overpower the other characters. Well balanced and filled with events! My energy never gets to recharge itself to maximum because i always come back to play it. Free to play or not, the game can still go on without much of a hassle!

descriptionHTML:
New Update - World's Cutest Valkyrie, Theresa Attack!


[Game Descriptions]
"Honkai, the mysterious power responsible for destroying human civilization countless times, has descended upon this beautiful world once again…”
With the lands now flooded with deadwalkers and Honkai beasts, a group of girls bearing the burdens of despair continue their fight onward. Will there be any hope of clinging to survival?"
Honkai Impact 3 follows the story of Kiana and her team's resistance against the Honkai. In an epic adventure of saving the world, the experiences of the Valkyries—Kiana, Mei, and Bronya gradually unfold. Players will play as Captain of the warship Hyperion, commanding each of the unique Valkries in their fight against deadwalkers and Honkai beast around the globe. Players will progress through various stages, experience different storylines, and fight together for all that is beautiful in the world!

[New Features]
---- [Cute & Righteous]
"Teriteri So Easy~"
The world's cutest Valkyries, the principal Theresa, attacks! S-rank [Violet Executer], A-rank [Valkyrie Pledge] are now available to aid Captains in battle!
Captain, what are you waiting for? Be a good boy and come back to the Battleship so principal Theresa can teach you a good lesson!

---- [Theresa's Everlasting Memory]
A pure soul born in a laboratory, an artificial life bearing memory of despair.
With a body that can't grow older, and a will to protect her beloved ones that never changed through time.
"The Oath of Judah, this time I must protect the ones I love!"

----[New Equipment]
"I will protect you with my life!"
The Lunar New Year Festival is approaching, and Theresa's new Stigmata is also joining the Captains on their journey to fight the [Honkai] war!
Also, the new Cross weapon series is now available ---- Oath of Judah will also be making its way into Battleship Hyperion's armory, to help the Captains fight the Honkai!

[SUPPORT]
If you encounter any problem while playing Honkai Impact 3, please contact the support center in-game and send us your feedback!
Customer Support Email:
honkai3rd_asia@mihoyo.com

[Honkai Impact 3] Official Website: http://asia.honkaiimpact3.com/
[Honkai Impact 3] Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/HonkaiImpact3rd
recentChanges: 1. New Valkyrie Theresa [Violet Executer], [Valkyrie Pledge] joins the battle.
2. Theresa Extra Story [Everlasting Memory] is now available.
summary: Save the world with your Valkyries in this next-gen 3D mobile action game!
title: Honkai Impact 3

descriptionHTML:
One Line with One Touch is a simple way to get some brain training exercise everyday. This is a great mind challenging game with simple rules. Just try to connect all the dots with only one touch.

In this tricky mind game you will find a lot of good brain puzzle packs and a daily challenge.

Just a couple of minutes a day with this mind game will help you activate your brain. Enjoy this brain training game at home or at work, at a park or in a bus, in other words everywhere!

This One Line with One Touch game doesn’t occupy a lot of space on your device and it doesn’t drain your battery!

In One Line with One Touch you will find:
• Hundreds of challenging packs. All of the are free
• Daily challenges. Train your mind with smart brain puzzles everyday
• Hints. In case you find yourself stuck and without any idea how to connect the dots with one touch. You are welcome to use hints!

description: A new kind of Mario game that you can play with one hand.Super Mario Run has received some big updates! You control Mario by tapping as he constantly runs forward. You time your taps to pull off stylish jumps, midair spins, and wall jumps to gather coins and reach the goal!Super Mario Run can be downloaded for free and after you purchase the game, you will be able to play all the modes with no additional payment required. You can try out all four modes before purchase: World Tour, Toad Rally, Remix 10, and Kingdom Builder.‚ñ†New mode Remix 10Some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play!This mode is Super Mario Run in bite-sized bursts! You'll play through 10 short courses one after the other, with the courses changing each time you play. Daisy is lost somewhere in Remix 10, so try to clear as many courses as you can to find her!‚ñ†New World Tour coursesA brand-new world of courses, World Star, has been added to World Tour mode! You can play this world after completing the first six worlds.‚ñ†World TourRun and jump with style to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser‚Äôs clutches! Travel through plains, caverns, ghost houses, airships, castles, and more.Clear the 24 exciting courses to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, waiting in his castle at the end. There are many ways to enjoy the courses, such as collecting the 3 different types of colored coins or by competing for the highest score against your friends. You can try courses 1-1 to 1-4 for free.‚ñ†Toad RallyShow off Mario‚Äôs stylish moves, compete against your friends, and challenge people from all over the world.In this challenge mode, the competition differs each time you play.Compete against the stylish moves of other players for the highest score as you gather coins and get cheered on by a crowd of Toads. Fill the gauge with stylish moves to enter Coin Rush Mode to get more coins. If you win the rally, the cheering Toads will come live in your kingdom, and your kingdom will grow. ‚ñ†Kingdom BuilderGather coins and Toads to build your very own kingdom.Combine different buildings and decorations to create your own unique kingdom. There are over 100 kinds of items in Kingdom Builder mode. If you get more Toads in Toad Rally, the number of buildings and decorations available will increase. With the help of the friendly Toads you can gradually build up your kingdom.‚ñ†What You Can Do After Purchasing All Worlds„Éª All courses in World Tour are playableWhy not try out the bigger challenges and thrills available in all courses?„Éª Easier to get Rally TicketsIt's easier to get Rally Tickets that are needed to play Remix 10 and Toad Rally. You can collect them in Kingdom Builder through Bonus Game Houses and ? Blocks, by collecting colored coins in World Tour, and more.„Éª More playable charactersIf you rescue Princess Peach by completing course 6-4 and build homes for Luigi, Yoshi, and Toadette in Kingdom Builder mode, you can get them to join your adventures as playable characters. They play differently than Mario, so why not put their special characteristics to good use in World Tour and Toad Rally?„Éª More courses in Toad RallyThe types of courses available in Toad Rally will increase to seven different types of courses, expanding the fun! Along with the new additions, Purple and Yellow Toads may also come to cheer for you.„Éª More buildings and decorations in Kingdom BuilderThe types of buildings available will increase, so you'll be able to make your kingdom even more lively. You can also place Rainbow Bridges to expand your kingdom.„Éª Play Remix 10 without having to waitYou can play Remix 10 continuously, without having to wait between each game.*Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply.
descriptionHTML:
A new kind of Mario game that you can play with one hand.

Super Mario Run has received some big updates! You control Mario by tapping as he constantly runs forward. You time your taps to pull off stylish jumps, midair spins, and wall jumps to gather coins and reach the goal!

Super Mario Run can be downloaded for free and after you purchase the game, you will be able to play all the modes with no additional payment required. You can try out all four modes before purchase: World Tour, Toad Rally, Remix 10, and Kingdom Builder.

■New mode Remix 10
Some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play!
This mode is Super Mario Run in bite-sized bursts! You'll play through 10 short courses one after the other, with the courses changing each time you play. Daisy is lost somewhere in Remix 10, so try to clear as many courses as you can to find her!

■New World Tour courses
A brand-new world of courses, World Star, has been added to World Tour mode! You can play this world after completing the first six worlds.

■World Tour
Run and jump with style to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser’s clutches!
Travel through plains, caverns, ghost houses, airships, castles, and more.

Clear the 24 exciting courses to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, waiting in his castle at the end. There are many ways to enjoy the courses, such as collecting the 3 different types of colored coins or by competing for the highest score against your friends. You can try courses 1-1 to 1-4 for free.

■Toad Rally
Show off Mario’s stylish moves, compete against your friends, and challenge people from all over the world.

In this challenge mode, the competition differs each time you play.
Compete against the stylish moves of other players for the highest score as you gather coins and get cheered on by a crowd of Toads. Fill the gauge with stylish moves to enter Coin Rush Mode to get more coins. If you win the rally, the cheering Toads will come live in your kingdom, and your kingdom will grow.

■Kingdom Builder
Gather coins and Toads to build your very own kingdom.

Combine different buildings and decorations to create your own unique kingdom. There are over 100 kinds of items in Kingdom Builder mode. If you get more Toads in Toad Rally, the number of buildings and decorations available will increase. With the help of the friendly Toads you can gradually build up your kingdom.

■What You Can Do After Purchasing All Worlds

・ All courses in World Tour are playable
Why not try out the bigger challenges and thrills available in all courses?

・ Easier to get Rally Tickets
It's easier to get Rally Tickets that are needed to play Remix 10 and Toad Rally. You can collect them in Kingdom Builder through Bonus Game Houses and ? Blocks, by collecting colored coins in World Tour, and more.

・ More playable characters
If you rescue Princess Peach by completing course 6-4 and build homes for Luigi, Yoshi, and Toadette in Kingdom Builder mode, you can get them to join your adventures as playable characters. They play differently than Mario, so why not put their special characteristics to good use in World Tour and Toad Rally?

・ More courses in Toad Rally
The types of courses available in Toad Rally will increase to seven different types of courses, expanding the fun! Along with the new additions, Purple and Yellow Toads may also come to cheer for you.

・ More buildings and decorations in Kingdom Builder
The types of buildings available will increase, so you'll be able to make your kingdom even more lively. You can also place Rainbow Bridges to expand your kingdom.

・ Play Remix 10 without having to wait
You can play Remix 10 continuously, without having to wait between each game.

*Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply.
recentChanges: „Éª Added a Skip button to opening tutorial.
Remix 10, made of some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play, is here!
There are also some brand-new courses, a new playable character, and a new feature that lets you listen to your favorite music while you play!
Why not try out the updated Super Mario Run?
summary: Remix 10 is here!
title: Super Mario Run

descriptionHTML:
From the creators of Angry Birds: a game from the PIGS’ point of view! OiNk! Build makeshift contraptions from a huge collection of parts and make it to the goal without blowing your vehicle to pieces!

IGN's "Best Mobile Game of 2012" Winner!

"Extremely fun and very challenging" -- Kotaku

“The best title Rovio has released yet” - IGN

“4/4 - Must Have” -- Slide to Play

"If you can’t enjoy watching a pig drive a badly constructed car off a cliff and onto a pile of dynamite, you probably don’t have a soul." - Yahoo/BGR

Create the ultimate flying/crawling/rolling/spinning/crashing device and pilot the pigs safely to the eggs!

The Bad Piggies are after the eggs again -- but as usual, nothing is going according to plan! Can you create the ultimate flying machine and steer them safely to their destination? Those tricky pigs have a few objects they can use, but they need your help to turn these into the perfect transportation!

With more than 200 levels, and free updates coming up, you have hours and hours of pig-crashing, exploding, and flying fun! Get three stars to unlock over 40 more levels! HINT: Sometimes you need to play the level several times to achieve all the objectives -- try building a new device or steering in a different way to earn all the stars!

Features:
● Over 200 levels crammed with flying/driving/crashing fun!
● 40+ special levels unlocked by getting three stars!
● Free updates!
● 9+ sandbox levels to stretch your creativity!
● Ultra-special, ultra-secret, ultra-difficult sandbox level to unlock by collecting ten skulls! Oh – guess it’s not a secret anymore...
● 42 objects to create the ultimate machine: motors, wings, fans, bottle rockets, umbrellas, balloons, and much more!

Mechanic Pig
● Need help? This little piggy will build it for you!
● Mechanic pig pre-assembles transport for you!
● All you have to do is pilot it!
● Tweak his design to get all three stars!

New Episode: The Road to El Porkado
Embark on an archaeological adventure in an all new episode full of treacherously icy environments and spooky dark caves. Be sure to equip the trusty lamp to find your way in the darkness – or put the new Night Vision Goggles power-up to use!

Get ready to see pigs fly!

Become a fan of Bad Piggies on Facebook:
http://facebook.com/badpiggies

Follow us on Twitter:
http://twitter.com/badpiggies

Terms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eula
Privacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacy


Important Message for Parents

This game may include:
- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.
- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.
- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.
