comments: Awesome game! Love the art, love the music, love the style, and the gameplay is actually challenging enough to hold my attention but not enough to be irritating. Perfect difficulty. Not to mention the colorblind mode actually works. I know this is receiving a lot of criticism, but I love the option you guys gave with ads and how well you executed it, that was a very nice touch. You really outdid yourselves with this one!

A very decent small game. I don't know what other people are complaining about but you can play the game without paying. The music is nice the graphics is nice it's easy to play. I hope there more levels in the future as this is such a fun game. Very nice one from the team at noodlecake Studios. Kudos my n*****

Pretty decent game, couple of suggestions though: instead of limiting lives to a paywall, why not use opt-in ads which we can click to respawn the character? Also, it'd be better if instead of two movement buttons placed on only one side of the screen, why not make either sides of the screen be for forward move through right screen and backward move through left, and double click for removing the hindrances? Just my two cents, but overall it's a nice game to kill time
The lives rate behind a paywall is a joke.  Nothing but a money grab.  I will be removing the game

Excellent running based game with puzzles to solve. There are ads but that is by choice to enable them otherwise there are no ads. Keeps my attention to continue to keep playing more levels or retry to get all 3 stars. Everytime you die it's a different character but same premise as for as completing the levels.

Really fun game, but once you've got a couple colors going, it doesn't like to click the changer buttons. It also doesn't like when you click the buttons while you're moving. Lots of potential here (Currently at 1000 downloads, so I feel like it's still working out the kinks)

comments: Good game however, once you've taken control of all the islands there is little else to keep you interested. I would look at adding more world's and making the trading a real economy by having the ability to buy items and sell them for a profit in different ports. Potentially even have your ports taken over again or mutiny so you need to recapture them.

Overall the game is great. Gameplay is smooth but slow (hey, old ships), making the gameplay calming. Graphics are pleasing to the eyes, though it could still need improvements. Sounds are calming too.   You guys should change the image for the gold coins since it resembles a symbol in One Piece. And also the whale movement could be smoother and slower. You could add more creatures in the ocean in addition to the whale since its just blank at times.

It's a really great game! I'm really looking forward to an update. I think it'd be REALLY helpful to be able to purchase an extra boat that just goes around and picks up boxes.. Having to turn around all the time gets tedious. Also an online pvp would be awesome. Maybe have the ability to make clans with your friends that can attack other clans. I'm looking forward to see what you guys do!

This game is great overall and you have a great sense of progression as your ship gets bigger and faster. The problem is the controls themselves. I found it very hard( I noticed this when I reached HP or ship level 6 ) and sometimes close to impossible to fire at other ship even at point blank range. The game has a very hard time trying to focus on one ship and would often shoot at where the enemy was 3 seconds ago especially when there is more than 3 ships at once which often happens. I would recommend a fire button option to compliment the controls and the gameplay experience. As I said before, it is indeed a very amusing game and would be even more enjoyable with this added feature.

please, please, please. update more maps or make it more challenging, ive already conquered all the islands and there's not much i can do anymore. so please, either more maps, or let others conquer my islands and let me reclaim it. i know you guys can still add up to this already amazing game. also, improve the controls, really cant see much when im steering. but over all, its a really fun, relaxing game. ;) thank you.

One of me and my sister's favourite game. But we wish we could play together same team or against each other with bots. We don't  want to be against online players. If you guys do that I will tell alllllll my friends to play. Anyway great job keep up the work , you guys are greatüòÅ

descriptionHTML:
More than 17,000,000 players worldwide!
Kiss Kiss: spin the bottle is the best game for chatting, dating, and having fun with players in your city and around the world.

Complete fun, simple tasks to find a multitude of new friends. Chat and swap compliments, participate in friendly matches, bombard your competitors with snowballs, get more kisses than anyone else and win in contests.

Kiss Kiss: spin the bottle is:
❤ A fun game to play spin the bottle (or truth or dare) with friends from Facebook, as well as more than 17 players from all over the world
❤ Talk openly in age-specific chats about anything
❤ Complete tasks that will help you in simple and easy ways to get to know people you find attractive.
❤ Date, give/take kisses, compliments and gifts
❤ Play in fun contests, matches and competitions
❤ Create a unique and individual look to show off how awesome you are
❤ Form clans with new friends and others close to you

How is Kiss Kiss played?:

Spin the bottle! During a game, the Bottle will point to a random user of the opposite sex with whom you then have a chance to kiss. Whether you kiss them or not is up to you. You will soon find out with which users at the table you share a mutual attraction! Send free virtual gifts and compliments to users you like, or choose to bombard those you don’t like with snowballs and eggs. By completing simple and fun tasks you will easily get to know people you find attractive. Also, by gathering one of many gift collections you will receive a beautiful photo frame that'll help you get even more likes.

Contact a Support: support@getkisskiss.com

comments: Good game. Initially throws good stuff at you and makes you feel like you dont have to pay anything to enjoy it. Only thing i don't like is the fuel system (verdium), that you need to start missions. I'd love it if in addition to buddy points, you would get some extra verdium when helping out others. It would certainly increase the incentive to help other players once you run out of fuel, and thus can't start matches yourself.

The game is great. Real old-school shmup. Graphics are ok, sometimes though so much is happening on screen that you can't see enemy bullets. Game needs control sensitivity options (like most of the other shmups). Overall - fun all the way!

Could've been so much better. There's literally no way to gain the highest end aircrafts without either grinding for ages, or buying crystals with real money. What i particularly hated is that the "craft" method is completely missing for the aircrafts. You can craft bots using blueprints, but you can't craft aircrafts using blueprints. That's the last straw that drove me away from the game. Had that been an option, this was a total 5 star. But the greed really drove it away. And mind you i have actually spent some money on this game already, but am still dissatisfied.

I'm VIP 2, currently on Stage 100, like this game but I have a suggestion. Please add Aircraft choosing option when prompted to join others online, 30 secs to prepare but got nothing to do except buying Powerups? That's too much time on hand and wasted. Some plane works well on normal stages while some works especially good against bosses, minus one star because the lack of this option. I'll consider giving you 5* if my plead is granted.

For me, this is a nice game. I would love to try it on a new phone like the Razer one, since this current one is lagging in certain points to really appreciate the game to its fullest. Regardless, I will still be playing this :)

Great game: great graphics, great shmup, plenty of rewards, great sound design. The only problem I have is with the lack of control customization, as there is no way to adjust movement sensitivity; otherwise, the game is (as in sure you've gathered) great.
description: One body is nobody! Gather your bros and kick the living heck out of tyrannical Autocrat's armadas in a series of breathtaking aerial battles! The enemy outnumbers you, but you're never alone -- the unique co-op mode allows you to join forces with either your bro or a new friend! Shooting never ends.With a broad range of aircraft and upgrades to choose from, a variety of missions and challenges, Hawk is a good ol' adrenaline overdose. There's absolutely no way you'll ever get bored! So be ready to attack.Maniac bros will help you choose the best guns and surprise the enemies with destructive missiles. Keep your strongest weapons reloaded to deliver a crucial strike to the enemies‚Äô fighter jets. True bullet hell where metal melts.‚Äì Exciting campaign: more than 190 levels full of enemies and breathtaking action!‚Äì Unique co-op multiplayer: team up with your battle brothers to overcome challenges or join forces with random players for even more fun!‚Äì Additional modes: Arcade, Team-up and Assault, each of them radically changing the gameplay!‚Äì Perfect Shoot ‚Äòem up: Lots of fighter jets, battle companions, ammunition and guns, and devices to choose from: your personal armory is packed with hi tech!.‚Äì Huge bosses: battle and defeat enemies that are so big they don't even fit the screen! And wipe out swarms of their minions! Find pieces of the Danmaku barrage of bullets. ‚Äì Great visuals: Tired of space and lasers? Try out flying! Amazing 3d graphics will make you forget that this game genre is old school. Vertical shooters have never been better. Epic sky wars are full of excitement. Choose your ¬´phoenix¬ª and free the country from invaders. The symphony of air war and heroes' charisma are unforgettable!‚Äì Retro modernized: Played Shmup (STG) games before? Think this is retro? We prove you are wrong. This top-down shooter will make you say ¬´wow¬ª and revive the best impressions of your scroll childhood. No matter you are a fan of Strikers, Tyrian, Ace Squad, Razor or Airborn or you participated in battle actions in 1945. You will become the fan of our freedom squadron!  Take your Broforce to victory. Feel the bullet force.
descriptionHTML:
One body is nobody! Gather your bros and kick the living heck out of tyrannical Autocrat's armadas in a series of breathtaking aerial battles! The enemy outnumbers you, but you're never alone -- the unique co-op mode allows you to join forces with either your bro or a new friend! Shooting never ends.
With a broad range of aircraft and upgrades to choose from, a variety of missions and challenges, Hawk is a good ol' adrenaline overdose. There's absolutely no way you'll ever get bored! So be ready to attack.
Maniac bros will help you choose the best guns and surprise the enemies with destructive missiles. Keep your strongest weapons reloaded to deliver a crucial strike to the enemies’ fighter jets. True bullet hell where metal melts.

– Exciting campaign: more than 190 levels full of enemies and breathtaking action!
– Unique co-op multiplayer: team up with your battle brothers to overcome challenges or join forces with random players for even more fun!
– Additional modes: Arcade, Team-up and Assault, each of them radically changing the gameplay!
– Perfect Shoot ‘em up: Lots of fighter jets, battle companions, ammunition and guns, and devices to choose from: your personal armory is packed with hi tech!.
– Huge bosses: battle and defeat enemies that are so big they don't even fit the screen! And wipe out swarms of their minions! Find pieces of the Danmaku barrage of bullets.
– Great visuals: Tired of space and lasers? Try out flying! Amazing 3d graphics will make you forget that this game genre is old school. Vertical shooters have never been better. Epic sky wars are full of excitement. Choose your «phoenix» and free the country from invaders. The symphony of air war and heroes' charisma are unforgettable!
– Retro modernized: Played Shmup (STG) games before? Think this is retro? We prove you are wrong. This top-down shooter will make you say «wow» and revive the best impressions of your scroll childhood. No matter you are a fan of Strikers, Tyrian, Ace Squad, Razor or Airborn or you participated in battle actions in 1945. You will become the fan of our freedom squadron!

Take your Broforce to victory. Feel the bullet force.
summary: Grab your bros and plunge yourself into a breathtaking air combat action!
title: HAWK ‚Äì Force of an Arcade Shooter. Shoot 'em up!

description: Welcome to the world of zombies! The number of zombies grew rapidly since the accident happened. Several researchers of T virus lab got affected by mistake. After that, things have been worse and worse. Clashes broke out between zombies and humans, but it was a disaster. Once a soldier fell down, he/she turned into a new zombie. We suffered a 97% lost in population within only one year. It seems doom is coming!However, survivals kept the hope for human being. They escaped from the dead cities and build solid survival camps. The scientists in camp discover the weakness of T virus and make the vaccines to avoid the transition from dead to zombie. It's the time for us to give an end to the zombies' empire. Kill them all, and retake and rebuild our city, our home!PLEASE NOTE! Although Doomsday Z Empire: Survival vs Zombieis a free strategy game, some gold bar packs can be purchased in game for real money to help you develop your camp and enhance your army troops. Please do not share your account with others, you may lost it after sharing. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Doomsday Z Empire: Survival vs Zombie.FEATURES- Undead ZombieEndless Zombies occupied the stations, malls and even cities.Even in the survival camps, people also suffers from the attack of the unknown zombies.Living in the Nightmare World, people must be strong and smart!- SurvivorWe have Survivor Bonuses for every new commander.Quest help commanders develop the Survivor camps quickly and effectively.Commanders can assemble the survivors and build up a powerful army!Do you want a Massive Empire to defend and even eliminate the zombies? Join us!-Love & RescueWhile defending the zombies, Love and Friendship spread among the companions.Besides, most family members of survivors are still in the city occupied by the zombies, we must rescue them as soon as possible.- Ally & TraitorWalk through the dead zone, commanders should be allied with the others. The unity of survivors produces endless power help people overcome the problems one by one. However, the most threat doesn't come from the zombies. Some allies have the ambition more than sweeping out the zombies. They betrayed their companions and try to control the zombies. All they want is ruling the doomsday! We need hero to stop them!-Worldwide PlayersNo matter where you are, no matter who you are. Commanders get together in Doomsday Z Empire: Survival vs Zombie. Defend the zombies with the friend with all over the world! Work together to give an end to the clash of Zombie world. Or you want rule the world? It depends on yourself!

. Defend the zombies with the friend with all over the world! Work together to give an end to the clash of Zombie world. Or you want rule the world? It depends on yourself!

descriptionHTML:
From the creator of Color Switch comes Color Switch: Phoenix, a re-envisioning of the original game.

With 200 million downloads and counting, Color Switch was the fastest game in the App Store history to reach 50 million downloads and was the #1 game in over 150 countries. How to Play
● Tap, Tap, Tap to get the ball past each obstacle.

description: ** Please note: this game requires an active internet connection! ** Return to the famed and mystical island of Isola and be drawn into the latest sequel in the beloved Virtual Villagers series! In the wake of a volcanic terror on the neighboring island of Asura, a family has made their way to Isola, seeking a new home. As their boat lands on the beach, they are greeted by a strange man and begin to explore this mysterious new world. The beautiful and curious island of Isola was once a paradise home to a thriving civilization but has gone to ruin and untamed jungle. The twists and turns will leave you discovering new, interactive, magical moments at every turn! Here are some of the amazing features we can‚Äôt wait to share!! - Be the master of your own village: With real-time simulation, the ability to customize your villagers‚Äô names and game-changing, random island events, no two tribes will ever be quite the same!- Train villagers to become proficient at various skills to perform tasks around the island and survive their new-found world.- Explore the charmed island to solve all-new puzzles, and uncover mysterious island secrets.- Gather and combine resources from around your new virtual home to craft rare resources and unlock rewards from completed collections.- Breed, heal and care for your beloved village children and families; build a sustainable village up from ruins; unlock improved food sources with farming and fishing; craft unique resources for puzzles and collections; and so much more! - Power-up villagers with magical necklaces, and improve productivity, life expectancy and much more for your entire village with magical totems and potions!- Acquire homes for two unique island pets that will help weed out pests and discover magical items around the island. - Reincarnate cherished villagers with all their skills.- Earn daily rewards! Also available in the Last Day of Work franchise:- Virtual Villagers Series (Origins, A New Home, New Believers, Lost Children, Secret City and The Tree of Life) - Virtual Families 2 Series- Virtual Town- Fish Tycoon Series- Plant Tycoon- San Francisco Zoo
descriptionHTML:
** Please note: this game requires an active internet connection! **

Return to the famed and mystical island of Isola and be drawn into the latest sequel in the beloved Virtual Villagers series! In the wake of a volcanic terror on the neighboring island of Asura, a family has made their way to Isola, seeking a new home. As their boat lands on the beach, they are greeted by a strange man and begin to explore this mysterious new world.

The beautiful and curious island of Isola was once a paradise home to a thriving civilization but has gone to ruin and untamed jungle. The twists and turns will leave you discovering new, interactive, magical moments at every turn!

Here are some of the amazing features we can’t wait to share!!

- Be the master of your own village: With real-time simulation, the ability to customize your villagers’ names and game-changing, random island events, no two tribes will ever be quite the same!
- Train villagers to become proficient at various skills to perform tasks around the island and survive their new-found world.
- Explore the charmed island to solve all-new puzzles, and uncover mysterious island secrets.
- Gather and combine resources from around your new virtual home to craft rare resources and unlock rewards from completed collections.
- Breed, heal and care for your beloved village children and families; build a sustainable village up from ruins; unlock improved food sources with farming and fishing; craft unique resources for puzzles and collections; and so much more!
- Power-up villagers with magical necklaces, and improve productivity, life expectancy and much more for your entire village with magical totems and potions!
- Acquire homes for two unique island pets that will help weed out pests and discover magical items around the island.
- Reincarnate cherished villagers with all their skills.
- Earn daily rewards!

Also available in the Last Day of Work franchise:
- Virtual Villagers Series (Origins, A New Home, New Believers, Lost Children, Secret City and The Tree of Life)
- Virtual Families 2 Series
- Virtual Town
- Fish Tycoon Series
- Plant Tycoon
- San Francisco Zoo
summary: Craft, build, farm, breed and solve puzzles in a village right in your pocket!
title: Virtual Villagers Origins 2

descriptionHTML:
Take part in one of the BattleMinibots armoured car shows – spectacular robots fighting games of armoured car and robot warriors radio-guided vehicles. These indestructible battle cars are extremely dangerous, each with its unique weapon for death racing. Create your own armoured car minibot in the garage and upgrade its properties to make it to the try-out and become a member of the mech robot wars League!

Enjoy watching steel robot fighting BattleBots and armoured car Robot Wars shows? Always dreamed of creating your own indestructible battle cars robot and building a team to take part in the death racing show? With Robot Fighting 2 - Minibots robots fighting games ANYONE can be part of robot warriors and armoured car wars game – this car battle is thrilling, and it's free!

Drive to the steel robot fighting arena and be ready for the most breathtaking car wars game with death racing! These robots vs robots car battles are something really amazing!

Face the most powerful death racing super mechs. You're going to deal with them in mech robot wars:
Excabot
Drillbot
Smile minibomb
Sawbot
Nailthrower, and other machines for car battle!

Complete super mechs tasks and earn great rewards. Get improving weapons (flame-thrower, magnets, taser, saws etc), armour to protect minibot’s body. Find the best equipment for the minibot and create your own destruction machine. There are new minibots for your collection!

Fight with your super mechs on multiple battle arena locations with additional obstacles – traps, spike strips, kill saws, hell raisers, ramrods, etc. Interact with objects on the battle arena (crates, fire extinguishers) and learn how to use the traps in your favour. Earn experience points in robots fighting games and get access to minibot customization – new armour, weapons and styles for more breathtaking car wars game.

And remember: the more achievements you unlock, the better, as only the most persistent players will join the mech robot wars League. Let the car wars game start!

then your phone will ring and easter bunny will come on a video chat with your kids.
Easter is an amazing time to celebrate with family and friends and one of its major traditions is the egg hunt that kids do to understand easter and have fun.
Please keep in mind this is a simulation of a bunny calling and its not a real video. Also this is 100% safe for kids of all ages so feel free to use it with anyone.

summary: Get a call from Easter Bunny for Egg Hunt for Kids

descriptionHTML:
Are you looking for fun, easy but free educational toddlers games to help your kids (boys and girls) learn preschool vocabulary (alphabet, numbers, colors, shapes, fruits, vegetables, animals, vehicles...)? Don't look far away, this learning game is made for you.

We have carefully developed this kids app as we wanted to amaze your toddlers while teaching them their first words. We have integrated cartoon and nursery rhymes to not make learning boring for the babies.

It's more than an ABC learning game for kids, it's a comprehensive educational app for toddlers with various features :
- Alphabet learning game : Learn the 26 letters of the alphabet
- Numbers learning game : Learn counting from 1 to 20
- Colors learning game : 11 colors to learn (Red, Blue, Yellow, Green, Orange, Pink, Purple, Brown, Black, White, Gray)
- Shapes learning game : 12 shapes to learn (Circle, cross, diamond, heart, heptagon, hexagon, octagon, pentagon, rectangle, square, star, triangle)
- Fruits learning game : 16 fruits to learn (Apple, banana, blueberry, cherries, grapefruit, grapes, kiwi, lemon, melon, orange, peach, pears, pineapple, plums, strawberry, watermelon)
- Vegetables learning game : 16 veggies to learn (Asparagus, bean, broccoli, carrot, corn, cucumber, eggplant, green onion, green pepper, lettuce, mushroom, onion, potato, pumpkin, sweet potato, tomato)
- Animals learning game : 24 animals to learn (Alligator, cat, chicken, cow, dog, donkey, elephant, fox, frog, giraffe, gorilla, hippo, horse, lion, monkey, pig, rabbit, rhino, sheep, snake, tiger, turkey, zebra)
- Sea animals learning game : 14 sea animals to learn (Clam, crab, dolphin, fish, jellyfish, lobster, octopus, seahorse, shark, squid, starfish, stingray, turtle, whale)
- Transport learning game : 16 vehicles to learn (Airplane, ambulance, bicycle, bulldozer, bus, car, dump truck, fire engine, helicopter, motorcycle, police car, rocket, ship, taxi, train, truck)

In the next updates, we will include :
- Time learning game
- Countries learning game
- Jobs learning game
- And more

This educational baby game contains these cartoons :
- Aladdin
- Baby Mouse
- Catty
- Peppa Pig
- Tchoupi
- Unicorn Pony
- Popeye
- Doggy Dog
- Teddy Bear
- Pinocchio
- Tarzan
- Caillou

We will also try to add the following comics to our cartoon network: Mickey Mouse (Disney), SpongeBob, Scooby-Doo, Winnie the Pooh, Spiderman, Batman, PJ Masks, Hello Kitty, Barbie, My Little Pony (Pinkie Pie), Frozen, Kung Fu Panda, Trolls, Bugs Bunny, The Simpsons, Betty Boop, Pink Panther, Gumby, Donald Duck (Disney), Minnie Mouse (Disney), Alvin and the Chipmunk, Tom and Jerry, Woody Woodpecker, Felix the Cat, Superman, Wonder Woman, Paw patrol, Pocoyo...

IMPORTANT : All cartoons characters shown or represented in this game are copyright and/or trademark of their respective corporations. The use of low resolution images in this learning app is for non-profit educational use only which qualifies as fair use under copyright law. Source : http://www.publiccounsel.org/tools/publications/files/fairuse.pdf

At Genius Kids Games, we build educational toddlers games to give your children the opportunity to learn, grow and become what they want!

Our english educational games are designed for:
- Children, Kids and Toddlers ( 2 - 5 years old)
- Boys and Girls
- Preschool and Nursery use
- Suitable for autism / autistic children
- Parents & Teachers

We advise parents to add this game into the kids mode to better control the apps your children are handling.

We hope we'll contribute to your children and autistic kids blossoming and success.

Developing english games for toddlers is our patience, we are always ready to help and are open to any suggestions. If you have any questions or requests, please contact us.

You will be presented with ten different items in the parcel, which you can use to escape. In the game you will encounter many problems that need to be solved in order to feel the taste of freedom. descriptionHTML:
Think, search, swipe and connect all letters into words!

What is Wordsdom?
An interesting word game with endless fun!
Thousands of puzzles of words!
The best choice for family and friends!

What are you waiting for? Just click and start to play! Challenge yourself!
Play Wordsdom, the addictive word puzzle game, for once and you can’t stop playing it! More importantly, Wordsdom is a free game and you can play it whenever you like, wherever you are. The fun is ready for you anytime!

How to play:
• Easy to learn. Swipe your finger over letters, search, connect and combine a word.
• Flexible to control. Connecting words can be vertical, horizontal, diagonal and even backwards.
• Plain and clear. If you've found a valid word it will remain highlighted and marked on the word list as found.

Wordsdom is more than special!
• Simple, easy, and addictive puzzle gameplay!
• 2000+ levels with infinite word puzzles await you!
• Login every day to get a wonderful daily bonus for FREE to unlock higher levels and solve more puzzles!
• Enjoyable graphics will bring you and your friends a brilliant puzzle memory of words!
• Without time limit, you can use time wisely to find new words and solve puzzles at your own pace!
• No Wifi? Don’t worry, play Wordsdom and clear word puzzles anytime, anywhere!
• Support both phones and tablets.
• FREE update to unlock more word puzzles!

Wordsdom is a perfect choice for fans of classic word search or swipe games and crossword puzzles. Try not to guess but to use your word intelligence so as to solve difficult puzzles more efficiently. And remember to share the fun with your family and friends, so as to enjoy this addictive Wordsdom together!
We sincerely hope that you can have a good time with our word puzzle game. So if you have any comments, questions or feedback, please contact us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Wordsdom2018
recentChanges: - Optimized game performance and overall fun of player experience!
Enjoy Wordsdom and thanks for your support!

comments: The ads are a real pita.  You can get rid of the sound by turning your media volume all the way down.    Also even after I uninstalled it I started getting occasional ads.  They must have left some hidden app on my phone.  That's not at all cool.    I love the game play, the hints and the possibility of choosing a game you know can be won.  I wish they'd just offer a paid as free version but I suppose they make more money from advertisers than they'd make by charging.

Its a relaxing game to enjoy. It is competitive, but not over bearing to where all there is, is competition. I have always been a fan of solitaire games since they were on windows pc computers on dial up if we wanted to play a game its mostly all we had lol when the connections went down. The game is well made and doesn't have that many ads for a free game its nice. Well done

It is a beautiful well balanced game, however too many ads, and unable to turn off sounds on the ads. The algorithm could be a bit harder. I knows it's a money maker for you with no real incentive to offer a paid version. But I would gladly pay $1 to rid the ads.

This game sucks i did try to win one game and i did try all solutions without sucsess.. if the game dosent give you right to win (than this is not a game) some rounds have no solution just to make you losse some points.. idk to explain in english! Can't upload pic of my last round!

The game itself is good: Unlimited undo moves is nice, the hints are usually helpful, and the "wining game" option is awesome BUT the number and type of ads (usually ones that can't be navigated away from for at least a couple of seconds) are ridiculous! Open up the app => you get an ad...Finish or restart a game => there's another ad...Change the mode you are playing in => yep, you get hit with an ad...Switch to another app then return to play the game you already watched the ad for => about half the time you are forced to sit through yet another ad! Sometimes you get lucky and an ad doesn't play under one of those circumstances, but it is a rare occurrence. I'm going to try to find a less irritating solitar game because after just 1 week with this app is getting to be too much for me :/
These guys are greedy! An ad after every game and they load slowly and some have timers so that you have to wait to delete them. Very greedy buggers. Plus the game is too easy to win. I deleted it

comments: Fnaf: The Franchise Scott, you are a mastermind for making this game. If I could I would rate 4.5 but you can't do fractions. Looking forward to October! The reason I didn't rate 5 is because certain animatronics have no reason to be in the game. For example: The Endoskeleton. He's pretty much just a fun easter egg. Cool to find him but doesn't exactly have a backstory. Except that and a few other things. Great Work, Scott!

Awesomeness I do admit it's pretty complex but at least I won! And I'm only 8, which your thinking now, Wow! He is a good speller and, Wow! He's complex for is grade. Yep! I know. I'm in fourth grade math when I'm only in 2nd grade. Not to brag, but my family has it in their blood. And one more thing, I was on the news yesterday! It gave me the heebie-jeebies! Yikes! But I also loved it at the same time. Fnaf is rad!

loves fnaf awsome the next one is sister location watch the trailer i watch it i love it so much but..... is scary if you played it. the name of the characters funtime freddy funtime foxy baby the clown ballora the dancer and i love the sister location so much i love it so watch the video right now is awsome watch it they can open there faces so i warning you all or they will open there faces ok i love this game the character named ennard he is mangled and if you go to the scooping room you got scoop open your body

I think it still needs some polishing I Love this game, definitely gonna get the full version, but I still this this game needs just a little more polishing. Just to make transitions more animated, like walking to each door and when you open and close doors. You should add in options to change the button layout and play with no visible buttons, stuff like this will make it seem more like the pc version. These are the only reasons this game doesn't get 5 stars.

Best game ever!!! The fourth and final installment of the five nights at Freddy's series is the best one! So, basically you're a kid who is trapped in his room and you have to make it to 6AM without being jumpscared by any of the nightmarish animatronics. There are little freddles that will occasionally pop up on your bed, and you shoo them with your flashlight. Do this and Freddy won't ruin your fun. Check the closet door for foxy or he will get you. If you hear breathing, then check the doors. If someone is there, shut it.

Fnaf 5 Scott, please, make fnaf 5. I mean duh the games are awesome, but it's the story that people love. Thinking "Hm I wonder what Scott's next teaser will be." Waiting for another game. Making theorys to share with the world. It's sad to think of fnaf at an end. But all things must end. We love you Scott. A friend of mine once told me that there would be 7 games, for 7 nights. How would it feel to make that dream come true? We  believe in you. You can do it. I know you can. I'll always believe in you. The End?
description: NOTE: This game requires at least 512 megs of RAM. Phones with less than that may crash!This is a 2-night demo of the game. If you enjoyed it, get the full version here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.scottgames.fnaf4In this last chapter of the Five Nights at Freddy's original story, you must once again defend yourself against Freddy Fazbear, Chica, Bonnie, Foxy, and even worse things that lurk in the shadows. Playing as a child whose role is yet unknown, you must safeguard yourself until 6am by watching the doors, as well as warding off unwanted creatures that may venture into your closet or onto the bed behind you.You have only a flashlight to protect yourself. It will scare away things that may be creeping at the far end of the hallways, but be careful, and listen. If something has crept too close, then shining lights in its eyes will be your end.

descriptionHTML:
My name is Bella Olsen. I turned into a vampire after a car accident. I kept my secret and went back to school. Later, I dated a new classmate, his name is Zac, and I found out that he is a vampire, too!

Things got different after that. My ex-boyfriend, Spencer, came back to town and wanted to get back together with me. I never could imagine that his true identity is —— a werewolf!

And that's not all, a new girl showed up at school, her name is Vicki. She asked me about Zac. I brought Vicki to Zac's home, and she told me that they had a relationship for a hundred years!

A hundred years? Does Zac have another girlfriend behind my back? Is Vicki a vampire, too? I need to find out the truth.


Features:
- Let's light up the room! Clean up the spider webs! Wow, it’s a secret old house behind our high school!
- Zac and Vicki are disappeared, the house is scary. Help Bella to open all the rooms in the house!
- The first room is a dressing room! Wow, look at all the vintage jewelry! Look, a piece of an old photo is there!
- The second room is a study room. Fix the lamb, sort out the book shelf, change the old sofa cushions! Wow, some more pieces of the old photo are here! And also an old diary!
- Bella finds a diary here! There’s a sketch of a young couple in the diary, it says “Z&V, 1918”. What was happening here one hundred years ago?
- Bella is so upset. The photo and diary, maybe Vicki really is Zac's girlfriend! But the date says 1918, and that was a hundred years ago. Zac is a vampire, he can live eternally, is Vicki a vampire, too?
- The third room is a bathroom. Bella’s hair and face are covered by the dust, let us help her to freshen up a little bit!
- Oh no! Bella uses a silver comb to brush her hair, she turns into a vampire!
- The last room is a bedroom! Zac is here! Somebody attacked him! He is very weak at the moment, please save him!

And so much more are waiting for you to find out at SECRET HIGH SCHOOL!

Wanna have more fun? We would love to hear from you!

description: Crafting a city and building your own Aztec temples! Exploration of an ancient blocky world of rituals and tribal dances. City building games in a blocky world made from cubes that you can mine. Go craft temples and huts, the only limit is your imagination!Featuring:‚Ä¢ Exploration of an ancient civilization‚Ä¢ Crafting and creative building‚Ä¢ Tribal life simulation games‚Ä¢ Exotic materials to mine‚Ä¢ Lots of free craft items to play with‚Ä¢ Amazing blocky graphics‚Ä¢ Animal pets to play withOne of the best historical simulator games! In this crafting history series you're being transported back in time to the peak of the ancient Aztec civilization. The time when new temples were built every year to appease the gods. Aztecs were notoriously known for their rituals performed in these pyramid temples - now you can take part in these celebrations! Dance with the priests and cultists and try to bring fertility to the land and abundant rains for the crops. Crafting of your own tribal dresses and spears might be required.This simulator game allows you for full immersion and exploration in the blocky world of creativity. Walk around and admire the tribal people that live their lives in impressive headdresses, watch them perform rituals and sacrifices. Most of them are armed with spears, but they won't attack you - your exploration of this world of Aztec cubes is totally safe.There are lots of items that you can craft by hand and place around. Take part in city building games and recreate any kind of ancient buildings you want - any crafting ideas will work for this building work. Mine resources and craft huge structures that will dwarf even the Pyramid of the Sun, the biggest temple in Teotihuacan. Creative mode allows you even for building your own city. How many simulator games will give you that?Use your craft powers to the max! Unlock city building design plans so you don't have to craft everything by hand. Just place the plan and fill it with blocky cubes. Craft your own world in just minutes, just mine the required resources!
descriptionHTML:
Crafting a city and building your own Aztec temples! Exploration of an ancient blocky world of rituals and tribal dances. City building games in a blocky world made from cubes that you can mine. Go craft temples and huts, the only limit is your imagination!

Featuring:
• Exploration of an ancient civilization
• Crafting and creative building
• Tribal life simulation games
• Exotic materials to mine
• Lots of free craft items to play with
• Amazing blocky graphics
• Animal pets to play with

One of the best historical simulator games! In this crafting history series you're being transported back in time to the peak of the ancient Aztec civilization. The time when new temples were built every year to appease the gods. Aztecs were notoriously known for their rituals performed in these pyramid temples - now you can take part in these celebrations! Dance with the priests and cultists and try to bring fertility to the land and abundant rains for the crops. Crafting of your own tribal dresses and spears might be required.

This simulator game allows you for full immersion and exploration in the blocky world of creativity. Walk around and admire the tribal people that live their lives in impressive headdresses, watch them perform rituals and sacrifices. Most of them are armed with spears, but they won't attack you - your exploration of this world of Aztec cubes is totally safe.

There are lots of items that you can craft by hand and place around. Take part in city building games and recreate any kind of ancient buildings you want - any crafting ideas will work for this building work. Mine resources and craft huge structures that will dwarf even the Pyramid of the Sun, the biggest temple in Teotihuacan. Creative mode allows you even for building your own city. How many simulator games will give you that?

Use your craft powers to the max! Unlock city building design plans so you don't have to craft everything by hand. Just place the plan and fill it with blocky cubes. Craft your own world in just minutes, just mine the required resources!
developer: Fat Lion Games: Crafting & Building Adventure
summary: Creative crafting and exploration! Mine blocks, craft an Aztec city by hand!
title: Aztec Craft: Ancient Blocky City Building Games 3D

comments: I love this game! I have never played a game for such a long time before, I have stuck around for a year. I spend a few dollars every month but now that the connection to server times out I am reconsidering my devotion to the game. I will definitely not spend any money on the game until the sync to server issue has been resolved. Will update review if that happens.

Paying player here. Was very happy with the game until patch 1.9.6. Whoever thought it was a good idea to force you to NOT be idle in order to progress in a game advertised as an IDLE game should be fired or forced to realise their seriously flawed decision making. Patch 1.9.7 did NOT fix  this. Tempted to take my time and money elsewhere. Just hanging on by a thread, the memory of over a year of this patch not existing. Fix this stupidity, or lose people. Fast!

I still love the game, and will for now continue playing, but a server issue introduced over the past couple of weeks has made playing difficult. This passive online game now randomly stops connecting to the server without letting you know. It can happen at random, and resets your progress for the past hour or two. Extremely frustrating.
Sync to server issue has completely ruined this game. I'm constantly having to reload the game and lose progress in doing so.  Complete joke of an update.

After the last update the game has become unbearable to play. It constantly locks up and becomes unresponsive. When you log out after playing and log back in again later your progress is missing. The game has become very unenjoyable and the devs aren't doing anything to fix this problem.

Had 5 star review, now due to the de synch with servers I can't play as idle anymore, and was supposed to be a idle game, was hoping 1.9.7 will fix that but is not the case. My review will go back to 5 star once this gets fixed

descriptionHTML:
Legendary heroes join an endless idle RPG battle that began over a thousand years ago! Fight legendary monsters, enter online PvP role playing battles and end the reign of the Dark Prince in Endless Frontier!

Travel across endless stages of fantasy RPG action with online PvP games, offline RPG guild wars and plenty of treasures to unlock! Upgrade your character with limitless fantasy RPG power ups and take control of legendary heroes in the Endless Frontier!

After failing to defeat the dreadful Prince of Darkness, Erin vows to revive himself again and again to organize the Knightgage of Dimension! Join the automatic fantasy RPG action!

Endless Frontier Features:

1. Idle RPG Fantasy Games
★ Idle RPG gameplay in an exciting fantasy adventure!
★ Lead your knights into the heat of battle and defeat the dreaded Prince of Darkness in epic autoquests!

2. Legendary Heroes
★ Heroes number over 150 and have their own powers – Which ones will you command?
★ Monster trainer – Recruit more than 50 pets to aid you in your quest!
★ Command more than 100 kinds of army units, to become legends of war!

3. Endless Inflation RPG
★ Grow stronger each time you revive with progressive gameplay!
★ Endless levels for endless fun! There’s no limit to the amount of power you can obtain!
★ Level up and tap your way through an expansive frontier of over 9000 stages!

4. Online PvP Guild Wars and Dungeon Games
★ Online multiplayer awaits with endless PvP battles and 200 vs. 200 guild wars that offer endless fun
★ Dungeon boss battles award you with 20 kinds of unique treasures and rare gifts

5. Find Gifts and Treasures
★ Discover more than 200 relics to aid you in your autoquest
★ Get treasure chests in each stage for even more great rewards!
★Obtain gold automatically the longer you stay in the frontier, the more chances you’ll have to tap and find more treasures


Traverse the frontier, take on your friends and see why Endless Frontier is one of the best idle RPG games on the market, today!


■ Rights Information
We request the following permissions for smooth gameplay.

[ Modify or delete the contents of your SD card (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE) ]
Use an external storage such as SD cards to save and load game data.

This right is need for the linkage and notification between your game account and google account information.

[ The approximate location (network-based) (ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION) ]
Use the network/wifi information to provide the advertisement in one of the advertising services because items can be obtained free of charge after seeing it.

comments: This was my favorite game as a kid. Of course I played it on NAMCO museum for PlayStation. The controls were perfect and the entire family loved to compete. This version looks the same graphics wise, but these are the worst controls possible! Too small space and the fire button and move buttons aren't very responsive. I looked for this game before and it wasn't in the store now it is. Want to rate 5 stars but please fix the controls first. Too hard to play and enjoy at the moment.

Its the actual Galaga but the controls are horrendous. Please fix asap.  I don't know why they stuck with a d-pad and A and B buttons.  Modernize the controls.  Tapping anywhere on the screen should allow you to shoot.  Sliding your finger left and right should allow you to move.  They should allow for 2 different control options classic and modern.

If the controls were better, this would be 5 stars. This really reminds me of my childhood. I was around 12 years old when this came out. Great retro game that is authentic and gun, except for the controls, they don't respond all the time and the placement is bad.

You should be able to change the on screen controls to your liking, the on screen d-pad has and up and down button that does nothing and it just takes up room on the screen. But this is the closest to the real thing on the whole Play Store and it's still fun.
Controls are awful, vibe is always on, very annoying.  Only need left and right movement, no up and down needed. Need to be able to customize more. And just needs left and right control.
I absolutely love Galaga. It's (in my opinion) the best arcade game form the 80's. The only thing about this is the controls are sort of hard to use. It's not bad, it could just be tweaked.
description: The objective of Galaga is to score as many points as possible by destroying insect-like enemies. The player controls a starfighter that can move left and right along the bottom of the playfield. Enemies swarm in groups in a formation near the top of the screen, and then begin flying down toward the player, firing bullets at and attempting to crash into them. In later stages, some enemies even break from an entering group in a frantic attempt to crash into the player. The game ends when the player's last fighter is lost by colliding with an enemy, being hit by an enemy shot, or being captured.A "hit/miss ratio" statistic at the end of the game, and a bonus "Challenging Stage" that occurs every few stages, in which a series of enemies fly onto and off the screen in set patterns without firing at the player's ship or trying to crash into it. When you destroy a group of enemies, you are awarded 1500 points.These stages award a 10K-point bonus if the player manages to destroy every enemy, but otherwise 100 bonus points for every enemy destroyed. Another feature in the game is for enemies to randomly transform and organize into a certain formation, which awards the player bonus points if they manage to successfully destroy it.Another gameplay feature new is the ability for enemies to capture the player's fighter. While the player is in control of just one fighter, a "boss" Galaga (which takes two hits to kill, the first hit will turn it purple) will periodically attempt to capture the fighter using a tractor beam. If successful, the fighter joins the enemy formation as a satellite to the boss Galaga which captured it. The captive fighter becomes an enemy, turns red, and likewise, it can be shot and destroyed. The player can still fire while being captured up to the point their ship "touches" the captor, which could be considered an opportunity to shoot the captor down before it can manage to successfully capture the player. Captive fighters can be freed by destroying the boss Galaga towing it while it is attacking. The freed fighter will then combine with the player's fighter who freed them, offering doubled firepower but with the disadvantage of a target twice as large. If the player destroys the captor while it is still in formation, the captured fighter will not be rescued, and will instead fly away after a diving run (assuming the player does not destroy it) to appear in the next stage as a satellite for another boss Galaga where it can again be rescued.*Notice: This game doesn't support Android 8.0+
descriptionHTML:
The objective of Galaga is to score as many points as possible by destroying insect-like enemies. The player controls a starfighter that can move left and right along the bottom of the playfield. Enemies swarm in groups in a formation near the top of the screen, and then begin flying down toward the player, firing bullets at and attempting to crash into them. In later stages, some enemies even break from an entering group in a frantic attempt to crash into the player. The game ends when the player's last fighter is lost by colliding with an enemy, being hit by an enemy shot, or being captured.

A "hit/miss ratio" statistic at the end of the game, and a bonus "Challenging Stage" that occurs every few stages, in which a series of enemies fly onto and off the screen in set patterns without firing at the player's ship or trying to crash into it. When you destroy a group of enemies, you are awarded 1500 points.These stages award a 10K-point bonus if the player manages to destroy every enemy, but otherwise 100 bonus points for every enemy destroyed. Another feature in the game is for enemies to randomly transform and organize into a certain formation, which awards the player bonus points if they manage to successfully destroy it.

Another gameplay feature new is the ability for enemies to capture the player's fighter. While the player is in control of just one fighter, a "boss" Galaga (which takes two hits to kill, the first hit will turn it purple) will periodically attempt to capture the fighter using a tractor beam. If successful, the fighter joins the enemy formation as a satellite to the boss Galaga which captured it. The captive fighter becomes an enemy, turns red, and likewise, it can be shot and destroyed. The player can still fire while being captured up to the point their ship "touches" the captor, which could be considered an opportunity to shoot the captor down before it can manage to successfully capture the player. Captive fighters can be freed by destroying the boss Galaga towing it while it is attacking. The freed fighter will then combine with the player's fighter who freed them, offering doubled firepower but with the disadvantage of a target twice as large. If the player destroys the captor while it is still in formation, the captured fighter will not be rescued, and will instead fly away after a diving run (assuming the player does not destroy it) to appear in the next stage as a satellite for another boss Galaga where it can again be rescued.

*Notice: This game doesn't support Android 8.0+
summary: Controls a starfighter to destroy insect-like enemies
title: Galaga

description: Ready to drive big offroad trucks in one of the best 6x6 driving simulator games! Take control of 6x6 offroad trucks (4x4 trucks with more wheels!) in a huge offroad mountain environment: 16 km¬≤ area, 30 km of roads!Accomplish tons of unique missions to be a top offroad truck driver! !! Truck Driver 6x6 Hill Driving contains action packed 20 truck driving missions !!Get right into the driving action and become the 6x6 truck driver, drive some seriously big vehicles in one of the best driving simulators in 6x6 offroad trucks. Experience driving specially modified trucks, with 6x6 all-terrain driving, you can conquer driving anywhere offroad in the most realistic driving simulator game!Explore the massive open world map with your own 6x6 offroad truck, filled with loads exciting places to visit. Beautiful vistas in one of the best truck driving simulators. Like a waterfall cascade and a lake, an ancient temple, a small airport, countryside houses and farms, ruins, camping places, and more... Drive on roads that vary from 2x2 lanes to very small dirt road up mountains, with a hill climb driving experience waiting for you.Example of missions :- Tow broke down 4x4 trucks offroad- Transport important cargo across the country- Race at speed to get through speed traps- Rescue injured climbers up mountain hill climbs- Stop and catch all the gangsters with your SUV- Protect your terrain from wolves- Avoid without hitting the boars and barrels- Drive on tricky obstacle courses as fast as possible- And a whole load more!!Features :- Huge open world, filled with wide open roads, mountains, and forests- Realistic 6x6 truck driving simulator- Realistic off-road truck driving physics- High-quality 6x6 trucks and vehicles- Dynamic camera angles, control any angle!- Easy to play truck driving controls, use touch, wheel and tilt controls!You can adjust the quality button to play without lag.
descriptionHTML:
Ready to drive big offroad trucks in one of the best 6x6 driving simulator games! Take control of 6x6 offroad trucks (4x4 trucks with more wheels!) in a huge offroad mountain environment: 16 km² area, 30 km of roads!
Accomplish tons of unique missions to be a top offroad truck driver!

!! Truck Driver 6x6 Hill Driving contains action packed 20 truck driving missions !!

Get right into the driving action and become the 6x6 truck driver, drive some seriously big vehicles in one of the best driving simulators in 6x6 offroad trucks. Experience driving specially modified trucks, with 6x6 all-terrain driving, you can conquer driving anywhere offroad in the most realistic driving simulator game!

Explore the massive open world map with your own 6x6 offroad truck, filled with loads exciting places to visit. Beautiful vistas in one of the best truck driving simulators.
Like a waterfall cascade and a lake, an ancient temple, a small airport, countryside houses and farms, ruins, camping places, and more...
Drive on roads that vary from 2x2 lanes to very small dirt road up mountains, with a hill climb driving experience waiting for you.

Example of missions :
- Tow broke down 4x4 trucks offroad
- Transport important cargo across the country
- Race at speed to get through speed traps
- Rescue injured climbers up mountain hill climbs
- Stop and catch all the gangsters with your SUV
- Protect your terrain from wolves
- Avoid without hitting the boars and barrels
- Drive on tricky obstacle courses as fast as possible
- And a whole load more!!

Features :
- Huge open world, filled with wide open roads, mountains, and forests
- Realistic 6x6 truck driving simulator
- Realistic off-road truck driving physics
- High-quality 6x6 trucks and vehicles
- Dynamic camera angles, control any angle!
- Easy to play truck driving controls, use touch, wheel and tilt controls!

You can adjust the quality button to play without lag.

description: You will really feel like you are behind the wheel of a muscle car. Cruise around the city in your car with friends, and experience how cool and difficult it can be at the same time. Explore the city, and perhaps you will find something interesting. You have a 360-degree view of the cabin. Fun companions are waiting for you to join them in the game.Set up a race according to your own rules! Turn on the music and let's go!!!!           Tips:1. Do not speed. Drive carefully in order to avoid crashing or damaging your muscle car. 2. Beware of the traffic police. If you speed, then you will get a ticket. 3. Pay attention to the interactive hints.  4. Don't forget to fill up your car with gas at the gas station.5. It is cheaper to pay a bribe than the official ticket.  6. For your convenience, please keep the doors locked when driving.    Please note: The input area for the interactive buttons is around the center of the screen.    ***Game features:***- Fun interactive game with endless replay value.- Daily bonuses. - First-person mode. - Richly detailed car models.- Many of the components inside the car are interactive.- You can modify and tune your car in a large number of ways. - Interesting map of the city and its environs.- Interactive gas station.  - Fun arcade-style missions.- Service station cars: Car Service: Tinted, Low Ride, Paint, License Plate, Body Repair, Wheel Rims... - Car showroom.- Additional multiplayer-mode missions.    Additional bonus! The game contains an additional 3 cars. One of the cars has a dead battery, the second lacks one entirely, and the third is missing a wheel. Find a way to get them going again, and they will be yours!!! Hint! New modern 3 muscle cars.  Bonus!Baseball-bat. Play the beta versions. Follow us!Tell us your wishes for new features and comments about the game.  Download and play OPPANA GAMES! And enjoy yourself!  https://www.facebook.com/OppanaGameshttps://vk.com/oppana_games   While you're thinking, your friend is already driving!

comments: Best curling game I've seen Enjoy the graphics, controls, love the 1 on 1 against international players and career game options. Seems consistent and easy to learn. Needs a few tweaks like... throws that don't make hog line or touch hogline must be taken out of play. Have seen the bug that others reported, sometimes rock after thrown disappears , some kind of glitch that happens occasionally.  Sometimes the sweepers don't react to my movement to sweep. Would love to see 8 stones instead of 6. If you love curling, this should satisfy

Great game except for hackers. There is a hack that allows some to bump or change finish of a throw. Yoy can go from having 2 scoring to opponent having the score, changing after the rocks stopped. Developers have not replied ti report. Fine for some fun but don't waste your money in upgrades

Very fun game. Multiplayer is awsome! Please add private matches so i can play with friends.   Physics still need work to hold up to real world standard. Rocks dont follow thru on take outs in real life as they do in this game. Also (rules), a rock needs to make it all the way over the hogline in order to stay in play.  Thank you for making this game!

The physics of this game are terrible. It's fatal flaw is if you have a completely frozen rock, you physically can't remove it, but this game you can completely remove 3 rocks even if they are all frozen. Also the free guard rule is very loosley applied. This game clearly was not created by someone who has ever curled.

Physics are not like real curling, rocks are dead in the house when hit, physically impossible doubles and triples, improper use of the free guard zone rules (if a rock is in the house, it is free to be removed...not in this game).  Connecting people across the globe is a cool idea but you frequently lose people and you win without finishing a game.  I've played for 35 years so I speak from experience.

Full of cheaters Started to play and it was awesome. But it seems that some people created cheats and make your pins move from their places without even theirs touching them so that they win points. I will not play it until its updated and try again. Too bad.

comments: Too short of gameplay I saw DanTDM play this game on PC I think and it was pretty funny and it looked cool. I saw it on Google Play and bought it... I was preeeety disappointed. Don't waste your precious 30 seconds of gameplay time! There are just so many games out there that are better, even Flappy Bird. However, the funny fail screens make it only a bit better.

I downloaded this app, I started to play the game, it's was really funny and enjoyable! But the talking on the court was a little too long. It then showed me running and it said who made it, who was the director, the music and voices. Then it told me to press retry from start. It put me the whole way back. Please fix this problem and I will give you another start and if you do the things that other people do I will give five stars. Other than that it's amazing!

While the game was fairly short, it was also very well done. I think many of the reviews saying it was boring or saying they "beat it in five minutes" didn't get the point of the game. The point of the game is more about seeing all the different possibilities rather than winning. For this reason it's mostly a matter of whether or not you enjoy the creator's sense of humor which I greatly enjoy. Nothing about this game is perfect, but nothing is bad either. All in all this is an awesome series of games.

comments: I love this game because of how simple yet in depth everything is. There are lots of game modes and choices to customise your tank, which I love! One thing that could be added is an offline mode where you play against bots. Again great work and I am excited to see how this game will improve because already it is almost perfect. If you are thinking of downloading it, I recommend you do! As long as you have fairly good Internet you should be OK, there is a little bit of lag but that only happens when you spam the fire button too much.

What a great game! Forget the haters who say its laggy, just because they don't want to blame it on their wifi. I like how it is so simple, yet exciting and fast paced. Good graphics, great gameplay, and good controls. To make it even better, please add a bouncy, funky backing track to really put the player in the tank. Also the game can freeze occasionally, so debug that if you can. Side note: you do have to reach over a bit too much to upgrade, but don't let my cons sidetrack you from a GREAT GAME!!!!!!!!!

description: Everybody has one day dreamed of creating his own video game. It's now possible with Draw Your Game! All you need is paper, pens, and our app! It's super easy!Why not get the app now and read these simple instructions during the download?1. Draw your own game's world on a piece of paper, using black, blue, green and red pens.2. Use the Draw Your Game app to take a picture of your drawing.3. Wait a few seconds, while Draw Your Game transforms the drawing into an amazing game !4. Play your brand new game, with a cute character that you can control. 5. Share your creation with other Draw Your Game players from all around the world. Of course we check them to be sure there's no inappropriate content!How do I play?In Draw Your Game, there are three modes you can play!‚ñ∂ Create: this is where you build your own world with paper and pens! You can also draw inside the game, so you can create on the go.‚ñ∂ Explore: play the levels of drawers from all around the world. Some of them are easy. Some others are complex and very hard. You choose whatever you want to play!‚ñ∂ Adventure: play through a hundred levels picked by our team of dreamers. Follow unlockable characters through their journey into a world of paper.There are two kinds of levels:‚ñ∂ Escape: the character must find a way off the paper to escape and finish the level. Sometimes it requires some clever mind tricks!‚ñ∂ Destruction: the character must push blue objects into red ones to destroy them. It's not as easy as you may think!The game is FREE (with ads)‚ñ∂ For free, you can finished the game and unlock all features if you play in the adventure mode.‚ñ∂ You earn a sticker each time you finish a level and you unlock a feature when you finish a season.‚ñ∂ You need to wait 2 hours between each season unlocked.‚ñ∂ There is a video ad every 5 minutes.If you don't want to wait or don't want to play in adventure mode, you can do a purchase to unlock features:‚ñ∂ One by one if you want to consume your stickers.‚ñ∂ You can buy the "Full Version" (in-app purchase) to unlock all at once.‚ñ∂ A special offer is available for the "Full Version" the first 24h (30%).So what are these pens for?You can pick between four colors to draw a world:‚ñ∂ Black for stationary floors/ground (basically, platforms)‚ñ∂ Blue for movable objects that the character can push around (we love physics)‚ñ∂ Green for bouncing elements (sounds like fun)‚ñ∂ Red for elements that will destroy the character or the blue objects (don't touch them!)Here are some advices from our artists‚ñ∂ Use fairly wide felt-tip pens.‚ñ∂ Choose vivid colors.‚ñ∂ Take pictures under good lighting.Important noticeOur team approves each new world before releasing it to the community, and a rating system is used to rank the top worlds against one another. We spend an epic amount of time to ensure that your children (and ours as well) won't see inappropriate content in the game. Of course, if you think we've missed some things, there are ways inside the game to report us anything you want.Some limitations we're aware ofDraw Your Game only runs on smartphones and tablets with a camera that can be used to scan your drawings.Want to share you creations with us?We're always amazed by your creations. We validate every level, but if you want to get some love and feedback about your world, share it with us on Twitter (@DrawYourGame) or Facebook! You can also send us your feature suggestions!
descriptionHTML:
Everybody has one day dreamed of creating his own video game. It's now possible with Draw Your Game! All you need is paper, pens, and our app! It's super easy!


Why not get the app now and read these simple instructions during the download?
1. Draw your own game's world on a piece of paper, using black, blue, green and red pens.
2. Use the Draw Your Game app to take a picture of your drawing.
3. Wait a few seconds, while Draw Your Game transforms the drawing into an amazing game !
4. Play your brand new game, with a cute character that you can control.
5. Share your creation with other Draw Your Game players from all around the world. Of course we check them to be sure there's no inappropriate content!

How do I play?
In Draw Your Game, there are three modes you can play!

▶ Create: this is where you build your own world with paper and pens! You can also draw inside the game, so you can create on the go.
▶ Explore: play the levels of drawers from all around the world. Some of them are easy. Some others are complex and very hard. You choose whatever you want to play!
▶ Adventure: play through a hundred levels picked by our team of dreamers. Follow unlockable characters through their journey into a world of paper.

There are two kinds of levels:
▶ Escape: the character must find a way off the paper to escape and finish the level. Sometimes it requires some clever mind tricks!
▶ Destruction: the character must push blue objects into red ones to destroy them. It's not as easy as you may think!

The game is FREE (with ads)

▶ For free, you can finished the game and unlock all features if you play in the adventure mode.
▶ You earn a sticker each time you finish a level and you unlock a feature when you finish a season.
▶ You need to wait 2 hours between each season unlocked.
▶ There is a video ad every 5 minutes.

If you don't want to wait or don't want to play in adventure mode, you can do a purchase to unlock features:
▶ One by one if you want to consume your stickers.
▶ You can buy the "Full Version" (in-app purchase) to unlock all at once.
▶ A special offer is available for the "Full Version" the first 24h (30%).

So what are these pens for?

You can pick between four colors to draw a world:
▶ Black for stationary floors/ground (basically, platforms)
▶ Blue for movable objects that the character can push around (we love physics)
▶ Green for bouncing elements (sounds like fun)
▶ Red for elements that will destroy the character or the blue objects (don't touch them!)

Here are some advices from our artists

▶ Use fairly wide felt-tip pens.
▶ Choose vivid colors.
▶ Take pictures under good lighting.

Important notice
Our team approves each new world before releasing it to the community, and a rating system is used to rank the top worlds against one another. We spend an epic amount of time to ensure that your children (and ours as well) won't see inappropriate content in the game.
Of course, if you think we've missed some things, there are ways inside the game to report us anything you want.

Some limitations we're aware of
Draw Your Game only runs on smartphones and tablets with a camera that can be used to scan your drawings.

Want to share you creations with us?
We're always amazed by your creations. We validate every level, but if you want to get some love and feedback about your world, share it with us on Twitter (@DrawYourGame) or Facebook! You can also send us your feature suggestions!
recentChanges: Share your best levels and follow our latest news on our Twitter: https://twitter.com/DrawYourGame?s=09
summary: Draw, capture then play!
title: Draw Your Game

descriptionHTML:
Now that Henry has escaped from prison it's time for him to get back out there and make (read: steal) some money. A local museum has recently unveiled it's latest exhibit, the Tunisian Diamond. Help Henry decide which ways to get into the museum and steal the diamond!

description: Smash or Pass is a challenge game based on popular YouTube Smash or Pass game where you vote would you rather smash or pass. You can select between famous youtubers (vloggers) and celebrities, both men and women in this casual game.You can also upload your own images and share them with others so they could smash it or pass it. Each uploaded image have it's own unique number that you can share with others and see how much smash or pass will that quiz image get. You can see all your uploaded images on your profile.You can see top list of uploaded people. As your uploaded image get more smashes you will climb in top list.Game have standard tuber simulator, you can click on either SMASH button if you would smash or on PASS button if you would pass.After you click Smash or Pass you will see details for that person how other people voted, how many people would rather smash or pass. You can see total number of smash or pass votes, how many people in total would rather smash, how many men would rather smash, how many women would rather smash and how many other would rather smash. You can also see either how many people in total would rather pass, how many men would rather pass, how many women would rather pass and how many other would rather pass.Smash or Pass is a either.io type of game and is played by many youtubers, vloggers, celebrities and others.Open Smash or Pass app and choose either would you rather smash or pass adult youtubers (vloggers), celebrities or custom uploaded person.The Smash or Pass challenge is inspired by popular youtubers like pewdiepie and jacksepticeye.Smash or Pass will look great on all phones and tablets including Samsung Galaxy S8 and Samsung Galaxy S8 plus, LG G6, Motorola Moto Z, Samsung Galaxy S7 and Samsung Galaxy S7 edge, Apple iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone 7s Plus, iPhone 8 or iPhone X, HTC 10, Google Pixel XL, HTC U11, Samsung Galaxy S6, Samsung Galaxy Note5, Apple iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus LG G5, Apple iPad, upcoming Samsung Galaxy Note8 and Galaxy S9, Lenovo P2, Huawei P10 Plus, Huawei Honor 8 Pro, Sony Xperia XZ Premium, OnePlus 3T, Xiaomi Mi 6 and more.Enjoy in best Smash or Pass challenge game!

Smash or Pass is a challenge game based on popular YouTube Smash or Pass game where you vote would you rather smash or pass.

You can select between famous youtubers (vloggers) and celebrities, both men and women in this casual game.

You can also upload your own images and share them with others so they could smash it or pass it. Each uploaded image have it's own unique number that you can share with others and see how much smash or pass will that quiz image get. You can see all your uploaded images on your profile.

You can also see either how many people in total would rather pass, how many men would rather pass, how many women would rather pass and how many other would rather pass.

For starters, this game Needs To Be Able To Play Offline or without internet access. There should be no reason playing solo Arcade mode requires internet just to play. Also plz fix the reconnection issues with the app not acknowledging when service is restored. I have to force close the app and reopen just for the game to acknowledge that it is able to connect.

Great game, but please add Versus mode and Oni! This is great with the addition of Dan, and on Android now too. But I'm still really hoping that single player Versus mode can be added, like it was on Volt. It just really sucks to be forced to play online basically, and not have a good offline option (only Arcade mode and survival). Also, I would love it if Oni was also added. Thanks for the great game!

I have no idea why this has ANY bad reviews. I'm using the Note 8 and it is perfect on full screen mode. The old school graphics are perfect. It makes Tekken feel like it was made for retarded people. Seriously this game is so good. It's my new favorite game. And 5 bucks to unlock everything is nothing. Perfect reasonable price I'd say.

The game is awesome, I think it's more worth $5 than Super Mario Run and that's $10! This has Multiplayer and Arcade Mode for all your Street Fighter needs, and it's all on your phone. You can now go to the bathroom and fight someone online! 10/10 worth every penny. Street Fighter <3

Totally Disappointed. When I had an iPhone,  I could play the previous version of this game totally OFFLINE. However, I'm shocked and disappointed that after paying my hard-earned money to capcom this game is only played online. I feel cheated. Please make this game playable offline!!! Thanks
description: A new warrior has entered the ring! Take control of 32 world warriors and test your mettle against players from around the world. Street Fighter IV: Champion Edition perfects the winning gameplay formula by offering the most exciting fighting game on mobile. Long time Street Fighter fans can jump into the action and have an instant familiarity with the controls. For more casual players Street Fighter IV features numerous settings and tutorials that put you on the path to victory.- Fight as 32 Street Fighter characters including fan favorite and Android exclusive, Dan.- Intuitive virtual pad controls allow players to execute full move sets including Unique Attacks, Special Moves, Focus Attacks, Super Combos and Ultra Combos- Take your game to the next level with a Bluetooth controller (Controllers do not work in menus, they fully function in multiplayer and single-player gameplay.)- Battle head-to-head against players from around the world via Wifi- Single player ‚Äúarcade‚Äù and multiplayer modes.- Unleash super moves with a tap of the ‚ÄúSP‚Äù button.- Four levels of difficulty.
descriptionHTML:
A new warrior has entered the ring!

Take control of 32 world warriors and test your mettle against players from around the world. Street Fighter IV: Champion Edition perfects the winning gameplay formula by offering the most exciting fighting game on mobile. Long time Street Fighter fans can jump into the action and have an instant familiarity with the controls. For more casual players Street Fighter IV features numerous settings and tutorials that put you on the path to victory.

- Fight as 32 Street Fighter characters including fan favorite and Android exclusive, Dan.
- Intuitive virtual pad controls allow players to execute full move sets including Unique Attacks, Special Moves, Focus Attacks, Super Combos and Ultra Combos
- Take your game to the next level with a Bluetooth controller (Controllers do not work in menus, they fully function in multiplayer and single-player gameplay.)
- Battle head-to-head against players from around the world via Wifi
- Single player “arcade” and multiplayer modes.
- Unleash super moves with a tap of the “SP” button.
- Four levels of difficulty.
recentChanges: Fixed crash issues on select devices. General bug fixes and performance improvements. More updates to come as we identify fixes.‚ÄÇ‚ÄÇThanks to the community for your notes.
summary: Control 32 fighters and test your skill against players from around the world.
title: Street Fighter IV Champion Edition

comments: Good game. Some bumps on the way but all in all it was amazing and the powers that the players have is phenomenal. I can get to super high levels just playing Harley Quinn. I used this trick one time where I turned my device off every time i died and I would come back on that same level. I went all the way to level 30 something but then I accidentally deleted it. Whoops!! Anywho it was a great game I recommend this to everyone but if you don't like DC or fighting games and stuff like this then it is not a game for you.

This game is alright but it can be amazing. It needs more choice. For example the characters  and the places you can go to. They limited the charatcer from 11 to 3. There are so much more characters in the film. They even show them on the front but don't have them in the game. It would also be interesting to see how each character work with their ability and characteristic. Another thing is that they did not add different places. All they added was the room around the train station and inside it. They need more than that to surprise me. Thankfully  the graphics was amazing. So now i hope they fix these problems to get a 5 star.

And in multiplayer we get to play as the squad and the creatures. And level up? And also add a attack button? And add more special attack buttons? And also when one of the squad dies we can revive them? Thx. I'm still enjoying this game Though.
