description: Join the Squad!  In this official Suicide Squad film game, you have been selected to lead a special task force comprised of highly dangerous incarcerated Super Villains. It is up to you and your Squad of antiheroes to defeat the horde of enemies that try to stop you. Fight as Harley Quinn with her signature baseball bat, or as Deadshot with his rifle or as Diablo with fire.  Can you complete the mission?  Are you Squad enough?  Features: First person shooter action optimized for mobile play. Survive as long as you can against increasingly challenging enemies.Master Harley‚Äôs, Deadshot‚Äôs and Diablo‚Äôs weapons and special abilities. Explore the city to locate health packs, ammo and upgrades in order to survive against your enemies. Compete against other players in a daily, weekly and all-time leader board. Record HD footage while playing and share it on social media.Note:- This app needs access to your device storage in order to load additional content. This is required for the game to run.

Keeps your attention for its entire duration. Also there are no pointless long intervals between messages like in some other games of the genre. Nicole's dialogue is very... real, totally like what a real girl would say. Including paradoxes like "plz don't change eh en though I probably will", that's female logic at its finest. Although how would I know ehat a real girl speaks like? :-P Mark's dialogue choices, on the other hand, sometimes seem unrealistic, sometimes silly and childish, sometimes plain stupid. Totally NOT like what a real guy would act like. Kinda aggravating, you could've had more options in this regard. The interface looks like a real messaging app, and actually I'd rather use Seen for messaging than my built-in messaging app.  Authors, consider that as an option. Kudos for the interface. :-) Overall, a very good one.

Love interest is insufferable, the typing is cumbersome, just selecting a response would be better than the strangely specific not-a-keyboard, and it doesn't seem that your selections have any bearing on the plot or outcome.

descriptionHTML:
What if life gave you another chance to learn to love again? Seen is an interactive story set in high school where you play as Mark Blythe, a student who fell in love with the new fellow student, Nicole Tyler. Do you have what it takes to catch her heart?

Get to know Nicole, Mike, Jake, Jenny, and Valerie. Explore various outcomes based on your decisions in a world where change is inevitable. This game features a remake of "annie96 is typing..." by Pascal Chatterjee, a creepy chat history that took Reddit and Twitter by storm.

FEATURES
• Different outcomes based on your choices
• Make your own stories with Story Maker
• Play other players' stories and share your own with Story World
• Includes "annie96 is typing...", the creepiest chat history you’ll ever play
• Realistic chat client inspired by Facebook Messenger

Seen is not just an interactive story game, it's a platform for interactive story games! Make your very own chat stories with Story Maker. The possibilities are endless. The only limit is your imagination.

Once you're done making a story, let the world play it with Story World and play others' stories as well. Story World is an in-game community where players can upload and download stories (currently in Beta).

FOLLOW US
• PolychromaGames.com
• facebook.com/PolychromaGames
• twitter.com/PolychromaGames

DONATE
• bit.ly/2btduCy

We always make sure that our games are of high quality so if you encounter a problem, please don't hesitate to contact us :)
recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Make links clickable in chat messages (Linkify for Story Maker)
‚Ä¢ View and update downloaded stories (Library for Story World)
‚Ä¢ Story World now suggests similar stories
‚Ä¢ Filter Story World stories by keyword
summary: What if life gave you another chance to learn to love again?
title: Seen

comments: enjoy this game, welldone!!   Suggestion: can bring 2 or 3 weapons and swap in battle.    Hint for newbie, tripple bow is the key.   Dont waste money on entry level of each weapon, always save for the strongest. 1st start with tripple spear. The poison blowgun is good for earning money in training but very for later game level 80+  Get 25k is pretty easy to earn in daily rewards and training. I can get it in a few hours quickly, each training 4-10k point.

- if you are playing the game there is no option to get out of the app or to go to the main menu or restart the play.  - bug: even if the player is dead the game does not terminates this Happens for 5 times in 100 that is not a good show. - I loved played the app but I think you should test the app for the bugs and some missing functional points  - over all I will rate app 4 star & good

This is an excellent little arcade game with simple but challenging controls. I like the variety of different weapons you get to choose from and the graphics are lovely and evoke a kind of 'dawn of time' feel. The only criticism would be that earning ivory (the in game currency) is slow and there are no other options to obtain apart from buying some.

One of the best challenging game I've played so far. In the beginning it seems a very tough game (specially the terror bird story) but eventually you'll fall in track. One thing I would like to suggest that in gameplay, if there is an option to change the weapon (maybe in between 2 alternatives), then it would be more interesting. Thanks.

Its great and addicting and has very little ads. The only thing I don't like is that the amount of levels needed to move on in the game and the prices if weapons are a bit too much. I would give it like a 4.8/5

The art work, the atmosphere, the weapon choices. It's perfect. I couldn't be more happier that i found this game. The only thing I would personally change is the Tribe Leader's cheering sound. It's a bit silly and is the only thing that truly breaks the immersion of this game for me.

Hunt the primeval gigantic animals!

Long time ago, a bushman tribe lived in an outback town.
People were starving to death because of continuous droughts
The leader of the tribe goes out for hunting every day for living.....

Big Hunter is a dynamic physics game that hunts gigantic primeval animals with spear, axe and boomerang. Become the world's best hunter with a variety of weapons!

comments: Glu games never fail to dissapoint, and Dino Hunter Deadly Shores is no exception. The graphics are satisfying, the weapons are creative and the gameplay is entertaining. I am empathetic, and realize that You need ads to generate income, but the amount of afs in this game is rudiculous Nonetheless, I have had a great experience playing this game, and It never fails to keep me entertained and enthralled. Keep it up!

It is a time killer with some fun for a bit. The graphics are good. My main point of contention is their shady sales practice where they have two GLU credit packs for the same price (say $49.99) one is for 1300 credits and the other for 2500. There is really no difference in the world, except one says credit pack and the other says value pack. It isn't until you get to the payment screen that if you aren't observant that you notice that the "value pack" of 2500 credits for $49.99 is a monthly subscription. They need to clearly state this on the listing so people are well aware before they hit the purchase button. But they won't because they are shady as fu*k

Hi, the game is pretty nice. I have a problem when I select to hunt with a bow for daily missions. Is there a trick to solve this? The problem look like a half of a screen in vertical, has very bad sync with the other half, and is quite impossible to see the monsters; only after I select to zoom, appear for a moment some clear image, but that is not for long...is just impossible to such mission....please fix this.

I've been playing this game since 2016. I know I have had a few different carriers and phones but my stats always begin over. I know you have the means to rollover data therefore for this reason alone l say that you are greedy little men and women.  The game is one of my favorites so there it is. I've spent thousands on this game alone every penny worth it.

I really liked the overall feel of the game, and it isn't too long in loading either. The only thing I don't like is how fast the energy levels wear out. Other than that though it's good, because if you don't have enough money to upgrade to a larger mission, you can do smaller missions to collect more money. :) I would definitely recommend this to gamers.

Great game. Lots of fun to pass the time. I would have given it 5/5 except for the fact that they heavily favor in app purchases and it's about 10 times more difficult to advance without spending real money. But graphics, gameplay, and the concept of the game I give a 10/10!
description: Hunt or be hunted! Embark on the dinosaur hunting expedition of a lifetime to kill the ultimate game in Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores.HUNT DINOSAURSJourney to a hidden, untouched Jurassic island and kill the most ferocious animals in history.  Encounter Jurassic beasts long thought extinct, from the docile stegosaurus to the terrifying T. rex.VISIT EXOTIC Jurassic LOCATIONSKill dinosaurs in lush and dangerous Jurassic environments like the shipwreck-strewn coast, overgrown jungle and dinosaur boneyard!EQUIP POWERFUL WEAPONSLoad up on firepower with destructive weapons like the rocket launcher and shuriken crossbow.  You‚Äôll need a powerful arsenal and an expert shooter strategy to kill these dinosaurs!MASTER A UNIQUE SHOOTER CHALLENGE SERIESProgress through varied shooter series to win rifles, shotguns and assault rifles. Make your kills and complete them all for even greater rewards!EXPERIENCE AMAZING GRAPHICSDynamic shadows, hi-res textures and realistic Jurassic models all combine to make this one of the most beautiful dinosaur shooter games on your mobile device!High-end, immersive tablet gameplay!‚ÄúIt‚Äôs as if Glu Mobile was listening in on my mind as I imagined how good Deer Hunter 2014 would be with dinosaurs.‚Äù ‚Äì Kotaku ‚Äú‚Ä¶ I am totally, absolutely, 100% completely behind blasting dinosaurs with guns until they explode, and happily that's exactly what Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores will let you do.‚Äù ‚Äì AppSpy ‚ÄúDino Hunter: Deadly Shores dishes up tons of behemoth-shooting action. It‚Äôs an easy game to enjoy.‚Äù ‚Äì Gamezebo ‚ÄúDino Hunter: Deadly Shores is a solid shooter. The dinosaurs in the game are very well detailed and the game allows you to jump right in‚Ä¶‚Äù ‚Äì ModojoPLEASE NOTE:- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your Google account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.-This game is not intended for children.- Please buy carefully.- Advertising appears in this game.- This game may permit users to interact with one another (e.g., chat rooms, player to player chat, messaging) depending on the availability of these features. descriptionHTML:
Hunt or be hunted! Embark on the dinosaur hunting expedition of a lifetime to kill the ultimate game in Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores.

HUNT DINOSAURS
Journey to a hidden, untouched Jurassic island and kill the most ferocious animals in history. Encounter Jurassic beasts long thought extinct, from the docile stegosaurus to the terrifying T. rex.

VISIT EXOTIC Jurassic LOCATIONS
Kill dinosaurs in lush and dangerous Jurassic environments like the shipwreck-strewn coast, overgrown jungle and dinosaur boneyard!

EQUIP POWERFUL WEAPONS
Load up on firepower with destructive weapons like the rocket launcher and shuriken crossbow. You’ll need a powerful arsenal and an expert shooter strategy to kill these dinosaurs!

MASTER A UNIQUE SHOOTER CHALLENGE SERIES
Progress through varied shooter series to win rifles, shotguns and assault rifles. Make your kills and complete them all for even greater rewards!

EXPERIENCE AMAZING GRAPHICS
Dynamic shadows, hi-res textures and realistic Jurassic models all combine to make this one of the most beautiful dinosaur shooter games on your mobile device!

High-end, immersive tablet gameplay!

“It’s as if Glu Mobile was listening in on my mind as I imagined how good Deer Hunter 2014 would be with dinosaurs.” – Kotaku

“… I am totally, absolutely, 100% completely behind blasting dinosaurs with guns until they explode, and happily that's exactly what Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores will let you do.” – AppSpy

“Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores dishes up tons of behemoth-shooting action. It’s an easy game to enjoy.” – Gamezebo

“Dino Hunter: Deadly Shores is a solid shooter. The dinosaurs in the game are very well detailed and the game allows you to jump right in…” – Modojo

PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your Google account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.
-This game is not intended for children.
- Please buy carefully.
- Advertising appears in this game.
- This game may permit users to interact with one another (e.g., chat rooms, player to player chat, messaging) depending on the availability of these features. Linking to social networking sites are not intended for persons in violation of the applicable rules of such social networking sites.
- A network connection is required to play.
- For information about how Glu collects and uses your data, please read our privacy policy at: www.Glu.com/privacy
- If you have a problem with this game, please use the game’s “Help” feature.

FOLLOW US at
Twitter @glumobile
facebook.com/glumobile

descriptionHTML:

* Dice all the fresh fruits and combine in the mixer.

comments: Fully addictive game I like it but it has lot of issues in PvP , even though I have a high speed internet connection it shows check your network and logs out and I lose before even starting game

It's fun, but redundant. What's the point of "updating" a ship if they all shoot the same artillery? I don't get this game in all honesty... I mean, you only build up just enough for 1 upgrade per ship.
This game give wayyy too much advantages to purchasers... fun game to play but music is repetitive and boring.
Seems f2p-friendly, but try so hard to grab money it becomes annoying. The recent update broke PvP
This is a good game,i love playin this kind of game cuz it really kills the time and this game is very challenging pvp,normal,elite,veteran specially the boss fight

A really fun game, with nice graphics and fun gameplay, but it's hobbled by ads and constantly bothering you to buy upgrades.  Buying the ad free option does not remove all ads! It replaces them with ads for in game purchases, and you often still have to watch a long ad to continue a level when you die etc. In theory you can use earned 'gold' for this, but in practice the prices when doing that are exorbitant.  Also, turning off in game sound doesn't mute adverts, which is annoying when playing the game while listening to music.
description: If you are a fan of space shooting games and like to simulate sky shooting, so Space shooter: Galaxy attack game is game for you.One day, our beautiful galaxy is under attack of space intruders and the alien shooters. They destroyed all of squadron. You are last hero of galaxy and will be faced an alien shooter. Your goal will be quite challenging as you will have to save the galaxy from its alien enemies.Space Shooter: Galaxy Attack game puts you at the forefront of a battle with space intruders. You will take control of the lone spaceship and protect galaxy from alien swarms. In this space game, you will be faced an increasingly large number of enemies and deal with many epic bosses in space war.As the game progresses, you will earn the right to upgrade your spaceship to bring it to full lethal capacity. FEATURE- Amazing lighting and special effects- Includes Power-ups and Bosses!- Leader board global.- Lucky circle.HOW TO PLAY- Move spaceship - Kill space intruders- Upgrade spaceship- Change your weapons.The Galaxy's future is now in your hands. Get your weapons ready for epic battles.
descriptionHTML:
If you are a fan of space shooting games and like to simulate sky shooting, so Space shooter: Galaxy attack game is game for you.

One day, our beautiful galaxy is under attack of space intruders and the alien shooters. They destroyed all of squadron. You are last hero of galaxy and will be faced an alien shooter. Your goal will be quite challenging as you will have to save the galaxy from its alien enemies.
Space Shooter: Galaxy Attack game puts you at the forefront of a battle with space intruders. You will take control of the lone spaceship and protect galaxy from alien swarms. In this space game, you will be faced an increasingly large number of enemies and deal with many epic bosses in space war.
As the game progresses, you will earn the right to upgrade your spaceship to bring it to full lethal capacity.

FEATURE
- Amazing lighting and special effects
- Includes Power-ups and Bosses!
- Leader board global.
- Lucky circle.

HOW TO PLAY
- Move spaceship
- Kill space intruders
- Upgrade spaceship
- Change your weapons.

The Galaxy's future is now in your hands. Get your weapons ready for epic battles.
developerAddress: Duy Tan, Ha Noi, Viet Nam
recentChanges: * New very cute CAT ship - WAKANDA
summary: Save  the galaxy from alien invaders in sky shooting games.
title: Space Shooter : Galaxy Attack

comments: Graphics are decent. Controls are good. However,  you can earn 10x more $ for a 5 lap race than a 400 lap race. Many times you will be in 1st or 2nd and as the last lap winds down you lose several positions even though nobody passes you.  Oh and the "coming soon" section, don't expect to ever see anything else show up there. Overall, it's a fun game to pass the time,  but these bugs have been reported for at least 2 years and never been fixed.

I love  this   game Still loving the game. Just wanted to put this out there. It would be cool if you could make it to were you could put different designs on the cars like pant the middle the front and rear different colors kinda like the Nascar games. Just wanted to put that out there. But I there way the game still rocks. An for the ppl that thinks it sucks they must not like racing because I've looked at all the round track games and this one is the best of all. Ur biggest fan.

descriptionHTML:
Drivers start your engines! Professional oval track racing that explodes with racing action!

Experience the adrenaline as you power over 600 horses around the track. Choose your stock car and race on 5 different speedways including the 1 Mile, 2.5mi Quad-Oval, a 1.5mi Tri-Oval and the Paperclip!

RACE MODES :
Multiplayer - Race head to head against other players
Regulation - Race and set the difficulty for higher prizes
Ladder - Race against progressively faster opponents for increasing prizes.
Endurance - Race the full 400 lap distance.
Hot Lap - Set your fastest single lap on Game Center
Practice - Practice racing lines and setup car for race trim

CARS:
Includes cars from the golden-era right up to the modern-era. Drive Super Trucks or 1970s classics. Sprint cars and dirt track racing coming soon!

EXPERIENCE THE SPEED
Feel your machine on the absolute limit of adhesion. Earn in-game cash to buy, upgrade, repair and adjust your Stock Car. Qualify to unlock new tracks for increasing prize money.

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER RACING
Beat your friends and join the privileged few to make it onto the leaderboards.

MULTIPLE TRACKS
4 unique tracks to unlock.

REAL CRASH PHYSICS
Persistent car-damage with sparks, smoke and flames for realistic racing.

CUSTOMISE YOUR STOCKCAR
Design your Stock Car with team colours and racing numbers in the Paintshop.

UPGRADE YOUR STOCKCAR
Engine, tires and chassis increasing your car's overall performance.

SETUP YOUR STOCK CAR
Allows you to adjust your car for race trim.

REAL SIMULATION
Visually stunning 3D graphics and realistic physics.

RUBBER-BANDING ASSIST
Helps gets you back into the race quicker.

EARN IN-GAME CASH
Based on finishing position and calculated each lap round, the higher you place the more you earn.

Drivers start your engines!

Personal Information???   It asked many personal information, when I was talking to the people. Some include how I look, my family, and more. It's a pretty dangerous game... My cousins didn't understand and almost fell for it. Luckily, I had enough experience and tried avoiding it. This is a dangerous game! It seems to be luring 1st-3rd graders to answering their questions because they wouldn't understand the dangers of sharing personal info. Don't download please! I told my cousins to be more cautious and to not answer the questions. I'm not sure if that girl... the people.... are "not taking info". You should be aware of that. I'm quite surprised that the reviews are not about this, in fact some other really childish things. I guess... this is a game to lure little kids to sharing their info, perhaps track them down. I don't know, it takes a child that understands the dangers to understand this. I'm pretty sure that most of the downloads come from little kids. My cousin, who is a kid (I won't share info here, due to trust issues) downloaded this and asked me to answer the questions from the little girl. I saw the little thing that this is a BOT, and would not take personal info, so first, I had no suspicion. But soon, the questions got more... Personal. I avoided them... and tried to change the subject. This is a dangerous game, once again. Please don't answer the questions from the people. I believe they are recording your information. I will look more into this game. Hope this review helped.

comments: The game is good to play. But even though you have guessed the word it doesn't submit until you've spent coins to get hints. This happens after every 3/4 levels. After it happened for the sixth to seventh time, I started making a note of what words I tried. Not good, needs fixing ASAP. Luckily for me, I'm not one to waste money buying coins.

Should be able to spell words no matter how many letters are only recommend. Would've had a lot more coins if that wasn't such a limiting factor. Definitions should be added after word is found in case user wants to know what he/she spelled. At least, I want to know what the definition is. That way, I am learning new words. Enhancing my vocabulary as what this app was created/designed for. Right? Right?

If you like words, this is the place to go. However, if you have a question or an issue, they don't respond. Has an issue I've contacted them about (never any response), loses your entries many times after long unused periods. Very frustrating.

Really enjoyed the game. Fun to play, keep coming back, sometimes letters are too close together and it is hard to select the ones you want without others getting in the way. The present doesn't ever give me above 39 coins. It's either rigged or I am very unlucky.

A lot of fun and a challenge to your mind!  There were a lot of adds, but if you paid for some coins (at any price package you wanted) they went away.  After I did that my experience has been much more enjoyable!

I've never taken the time to actually write a review before this game. The fact that you can guess legitimate words, that fit the length requirements that the game doesn't accept is honestly, unacceptable. Swears are words, and often times I'd type in words like "mile" and somehow that's not a real word.

What makes Word Connect so special? ‚Ä¢ The game is powered by Oxford Dictionaries‚Ä¢ Simple, easy, and addictive gameplay!‚Ä¢ 2,796 levels with tons of words await you!‚Ä¢ Login every day for an exciting daily challenge and a wonderful daily bonus!‚Ä¢ Want to check previous levels? Go back to the Level List and play again!‚Ä¢ Up to 11 delicate themes for you to choose from!‚Ä¢ Ask your family members and friend for help and send coins to each other on Facebook!‚Ä¢ With no time limits, you can use your time wisely to find new words at your own pace!‚Ä¢ Our wooden block graphics will bring back nostalgic childhood memories!‚Ä¢ Hidden extra words are waiting to be discovered!‚Ä¢ No wifi? Don‚Äôt worry, play Word Connect anytime, anywhere!‚Ä¢ Supported on both phone and tablet. Word Connect is an app designed to train your brain and learn new words, all while having a great time. Share the fun with your family & friends and enjoy Word Connect together!
descriptionHTML:
Do you enjoy the excitement of classic word games? DOWNLOAD Word Connect, to TRAIN your brain - for FREE!

Simply swipe the letter blocks and build the words to earn coins! DOWNLOAD Word Connect NOW to begin training your brain and become a vocabulary master!

It’s time to discover mystery hidden words and build as many words as possible!

What makes Word Connect so special?

• The game is powered by Oxford Dictionaries
• Simple, easy, and addictive gameplay!
• 2,796 levels with tons of words await you!
• Login every day for an exciting daily challenge and a wonderful daily bonus!
• Want to check previous levels? Go back to the Level List and play again!
• Up to 11 delicate themes for you to choose from!
• Ask your family members and friend for help and send coins to each other on Facebook!
• With no time limits, you can use your time wisely to find new words at your own pace!
• Our wooden block graphics will bring back nostalgic childhood memories!
• Hidden extra words are waiting to be discovered!
• No wifi? Don’t worry, play Word Connect anytime, anywhere!
• Supported on both phone and tablet.

Word Connect is an app designed to train your brain and learn new words, all while having a great time. Share the fun with your family & friends and enjoy Word Connect together!
recentChanges: Brand new version of Word Connect available now!
1. Happy Lunar New Year! From Feb. 15 to Feb. 21:
- Buy the Lunar New Year Pack for the beautiful Lunar New Year theme!
2. We have added 100 brand new levels!
3. We have optimized game performance and fixed the bug for a more fun experience.
Happy holidays and thanks for playing!
summary: Train your brain and vocab for FREE! Enjoy the fun of building words TODAY!
title: Word Connect

descriptionHTML:

There are more than 500 lovely elfins in the game, what’s more, also have unique evolution system, various gorgeous skills and brand new scene. In the game, players can collect various elfins freely, cultivate them and evolve to stronger elfins for you in battle and arena.

Enter battleground through tactics deployment and have a odds-on battle.

Abundant events, interesting tasks, Pokemon Palace, Resource War, Void Realm, Legendary Reveland, Trainer House etc. no matter the leisure or arena players, all they can find the plays and fun which are suitable for them.

description: Welcome to The Big Capitalist, our Young & Ambitious business investors! You are in the right place to fulfill your craving of establishing and expanding businesses, and to become the world greatest capitalist!Start your worldwide monopoly enterprise from the most basic product - wheat. You can accumulate capitals by clicking to produce more wheat, and by investing your money to other industries. In this idle game, the only thing you need to do is clicking, clicking, clicking, and then watching your capital growing rapidly. *Yes, it‚Äôs your chance to pay less and win the world!*There will be more opportunities and challenges waiting for you in Big Capitalist! You can hire managers to help administrating businesses, or introduce new technologies to boost profits; and more to discover!To be the Oil Tycoon or Federal President? That‚Äôs not a question! With Big Capitalist, you can dream big to win big, and take the world in your hand!
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to The Big Capitalist, our Young & Ambitious business investors!
You are in the right place to fulfill your craving of establishing and expanding businesses, and to become the world greatest capitalist!

Start your worldwide monopoly enterprise from the most basic product - wheat. You can accumulate capitals by clicking to produce more wheat, and by investing your money to other industries.

There will be more opportunities and challenges waiting for you in Big Capitalist! You can hire managers to help administrating businesses, or introduce new technologies to boost profits; and more to discover!

To be the Oil Tycoon or Federal President? That’s not a question! With Big Capitalist, you can dream big to win big, and take the world in your hand!

description: In this game you have to do different kinds of work.You can become a woodcutter and start cutting wood. Chop it! You can become a builder performing a simple job that requires precision work with a hammer. Nail it! Or you can become a miner - take a heavy pickaxe and start spliting stones. Break it!You will come across a variety of bonus items. Cut down the stars to spend them  on new tools in the store. Break hearts and get an extra opportunity to miss. Split the clock to slow down the time.Be careful! After all, in addition to bonuses, you can also come across dangerous items that do not like to be beaten with a hammer or pickaxe. Tap them once - and the game will end.Download "Chop It" for free!Have a good game!
descriptionHTML:
In this game you have to do different kinds of work.
You can become a woodcutter and start cutting wood. Chop it! You can become a builder performing a simple job that requires precision work with a hammer. Nail it! Or you can become a miner - take a heavy pickaxe and start spliting stones. Break it!

You will come across a variety of bonus items. Cut down the stars to spend them on new tools in the store. Break hearts and get an extra opportunity to miss. Split the clock to slow down the time.

Be careful! After all, in addition to bonuses, you can also come across dangerous items that do not like to be beaten with a hammer or pickaxe. Tap them once - and the game will end.

Download "Chop It" for free!
Have a good game!
recentChanges: - Fixed a bug with a plate that did not break;
- fixed a bug that did not allow to run the leaderboard.
- reduced the size of the application
summary: We present to your attention a simple and exciting timekiller "Chop It"
title: Chop It

description: electric screen prank app is a super fun prank game. Prank your friends and family with this free game. Making jokes with this game is so simple; for example leave your mobile or tablet unlocked and when somebody touches the screen shall believe the screen creates electricity when is touched. The electricity effects and sounds simulate a electric shock.Have into account that this free app is just a game that simulates a electric screen shock. It is designed to joke with your friends and family. Kids and children also can have so much fun with this app. Besides the electric screen prank, the app also includes a mini game, which is used to obtain coins and unlock new lightning effects colors.The game consists of several parts: the electric screen prank game, the mini game Potty vs Bugs and the free coins virtual store. At the beginning the only available electric lightning color is the blue one. Other colors as red, yellow and green have to been unlocked. In order to do so the user needs to collect coins. Coins can be collected in several ways: playing the mini game Potty vs Bugs, sharing on social networks (Facebook, Twitter or Google Plus) or watching rewarded videos. Each video the user watches gives +50 coins. If the player shares on any social network of the mentioned above also gets 50 coins but only for the first time that he/she shares.The free mini game included is Potty vs Bugs, an adventures platformer game based on a story of a potato, which has to pass 80 levels over 4 worlds to complete his mission. The game is really addictive and fun. The player will discover plenty of challenging levels, secret bricks full of rewards, hidden underground scenarios. Jump, run, swim, shoot fire balls and take a balloon to fly to the sky. There are plenty of different bugs awaiting the potato arrival. Many insects all over the 4 worlds, 8 final bosses in their respective castles. How to play this game is an easy task: move right or left, use the downward arrow of the game pad control to duck. Ducking on some tubes can make you go down through the pipes and find secret underground levels. Use the rightmost button to jump, and the one right on its left side to run and shoot fire balls. To run, the player has to keep the run button pressed while it moves right or left. Jumping is a bit tricky, since it depends on how long the user keeps the jump button pressed. As said before, the mini game is a great way of collecting coins to unlock new electric lightning color. Every level on the game is plenty of coins, some of them can be seen as part of the scenario, other are hidden on visible bricks and blocks, and the player can also find coins in secret blocks. The sky levels are a bonus to add more coins to the score of the game, which are used later to provide new content of the electric screen part. Remember that to store the coins collected in a level, the user has to finish that level.The design of the game is made thinking on create a environment to enjoy the prank app electric screen and have fun playing the mini game Potty vs Bugs, all this joint to have a final goal, unlocking the strobe flash light effect. This shall be available once the user collects 2500 coins, then the user can have the electric lightning visual effect and the electric shock sound effect along with the strobe flashlight effect. Have into account that in order to enjoy of such effect your mobile device should have flashlight.

description: Raft Survival Simulator - is a sandbox survival simulator game. After ocean accident you've opened your eyes and see blue water and a piece of raft. The last thing that you remember - great shark bites your ship... No one alived in this tragedy except you! Ocean survival is here for you to try yourself!Craft your new home from the rubbish flowing near you. But be carefull. The sharks are near your raft. And they are really hungry! Use your hook to catch resources. Use a hammer to destroy everything, even your last raft!Features of game:- open ocean - you can make your own island to survive;- several types of weapons with different behaviours (hook, hammer);- a lot of craft items and constructions;- everything you need for water survival!Thank you for downloading Raft Survival Simulator! We are appreciate any feedback and your ideas! Please give us motivation to make a great game by rating the game with a good mark! All the resources, that are used in this game - are licensed or under royalty free license!
descriptionHTML:
Raft Survival Simulator - is a sandbox survival simulator game. After ocean accident you've opened your eyes and see blue water and a piece of raft. The last thing that you remember - great shark bites your ship... No one alived in this tragedy except you! Ocean survival is here for you to try yourself!

Craft your new home from the rubbish flowing near you. But be carefull. The sharks are near your raft. And they are really hungry! Use your hook to catch resources. Use a hammer to destroy everything, even your last raft!

Features of game:
- open ocean - you can make your own island to survive;
- several types of weapons with different behaviours (hook, hammer);
- a lot of craft items and constructions;
- everything you need for water survival!

Thank you for downloading Raft Survival Simulator! We are appreciate any feedback and your ideas! Please give us motivation to make a great game by rating the game with a good mark! All the resources, that are used in this game - are licensed or under royalty free license!
recentChanges: Christmas edition of Raft Survival Simulator:
Christmas tree which gives you present (random craftable resource) every 5-15 seconds;
Improvements of craft and survival systems.
Merry Christmas & a Happy New Year!
summary: Craft your raft for ocean survival and beware of shark!
title: Raft Survival Simulator

comments: Has a lot of potential. The game itself at this point isn't that good, at least for me, because I want it to be like.. sims. The characters need a bit of free will, what I mean is I can control the main character freely, and talk to the children and not being like a mannequin. The control for the camera is a bit weird. Overall... hmm... I don't like it.. because it looks like a kids game.

The game is kind of fun and the controls are good but it would be better if it was an open world game and you had more freedom to walk around and things to do on your own instead of just following the directions and the goals. Other than that the game is pretty fun but does get boring after awhile since it's not an open world

It's an okay game. I beat it all the way to level 18 and there wasn't anymore levels. Needs more independence upon what mom does. Also kind of childish to keep having the navigating hand. The graphics could be better as well. But good concept. Once more is added I'll  reinstall it and rate it over. Thanks

Bad controls make it very frustrating. There's just not much going on but walking around with extreme difficulty due to controls. Also the neighbors houses are tiny if you walk up to one the front door only goes to your waist.
Why does mom have to do tasks like find husband's socks while he stands still=annoying. ALSO THE CAMERA BLOCKS THE PLAYER'S VIEW =even more annoying. But good job on the graphics
Too many ads! Every time I go to the next level I have to wait for ages and by the time its loaded I am bored! Maybe make the levels last longer? Other than that its OK!
description: This game is a variant of Virtual DAD, and just as fun! Virtual In the midst of a hectic urban neighborhood, Mom is up and ready to take on the day. You‚Äôre the boss here. Take care of tough tasks like managing all the household activities at once! Get all your daily tasks done in time to progress to the next day! If you fall behind, your family will, too! This game is all about micromanagement and multitasking. Wash the monstrous mountain of dishes. Prepare your kids‚Äô breakfast and lunches, and get them ready for school. Take care of the gardening in the backyard, clean the car, feed and walk the dog, vacuum the whole house, and more! Step into the shoes of a mom‚Äôs daily life. This game plays on the element of surprise. Expect the unexpected, as surprise events will pop up during your routine, and make your day much more difficult! The completion of every level increases the variety and difficulty of tasks.The life of a mom is demanding. Don‚Äôt let your family down! Be a SUPERMOM for your family!Virtual Mom Happy Family 3D Features:‚Ä¢ High Quality 3D Graphics‚Ä¢ Awesome Sounds for Maximum Fun! ‚Ä¢ Smooth and Easy Controls‚Ä¢ Addictive Game Play‚Ä¢ Super Cool House Environment‚Ä¢ Family Woman Life Simulation‚Ä¢ Daily Household Tasks Based Missions to Complete

description: Today we decide to bring you another kind of princess makeup games, much better than our older makeup salon games and the first one is called Princess Makeup and Nail Salon, where all girls which like fashion and nail games can change a cute doll in a real princess, using tons of cosmetics, colors and clothes.Now your dreams came true and you have a big and complete beauty makeup salon and there you can prove your makeup artist skills and transform your favorite doll in a gorgeous princess. In the beginning she needs a beauty treatment of her skin, a stunning makeup with beautiful colors, some pretty blouses and necklaces and at the end a pretty manicure with gorgeous patterns for her nails.First step in all our princess makeup games is to use our special creams for a beauty skin treatment. Apply a facial mask, use the shower and do not forget to use also the eye mask. At the end of this level of our makeup salon games tour doll is ready for the next step.The second level will bring you in a world of colors. Tons of colors for lipstick and eyeshadows are available for you and you must pick what you like most. Use red or yellow, blue or green, combine them and make a real rainbow if you want. Try all you believe that will be nice for the pretty doll. The lipstick will complete this nice makeup and be sure that the color of lips will match with the color of makeup. To complete this fabulous look, choose elegant dresses and beautiful jewerly.After this princess makeup games part, we invite you in a virtual nail salon for one of the most fancy manicure that you can try for your princess. There are a lot of nail polish and you may choose the one you want or even combine the colors for each nail. Will be awesome, for sure ! The gorgeous patterns will complete your work in the nail salon games and your client will be very happy.Princess Makeup and Nail Salon Games features :- a big beauty makeup salon with a lot of creams and cosmetics treatments- a complete makeup box for princess makeup games- a virtual nail salon with all you want for a perfect manicure- a lot of colors for nail polish like in all our nail games- elegant dresses and accessories- easy to play, like all our makeup gamesWe hope that our nail salon games are what you want and you will write in your comments your opinion about how  we can make them as you like. Enjoy playing !
descriptionHTML:
Today we decide to bring you another kind of princess makeup games, much better than our older makeup salon games and the first one is called Princess Makeup and Nail Salon, where all girls which like fashion and nail games can change a cute doll in a real princess, using tons of cosmetics, colors and clothes.

Now your dreams came true and you have a big and complete beauty makeup salon and there you can prove your makeup artist skills and transform your favorite doll in a gorgeous princess. In the beginning she needs a beauty treatment of her skin, a stunning makeup with beautiful colors, some pretty blouses and necklaces and at the end a pretty manicure with gorgeous patterns for her nails.

First step in all our princess makeup games is to use our special creams for a beauty skin treatment. Apply a facial mask, use the shower and do not forget to use also the eye mask. At the end of this level of our makeup salon games tour doll is ready for the next step.

The second level will bring you in a world of colors. Tons of colors for lipstick and eyeshadows are available for you and you must pick what you like most. Use red or yellow, blue or green, combine them and make a real rainbow if you want. Try all you believe that will be nice for the pretty doll. The lipstick will complete this nice makeup and be sure that the color of lips will match with the color of makeup. To complete this fabulous look, choose elegant dresses and beautiful jewerly.

After this princess makeup games part, we invite you in a virtual nail salon for one of the most fancy manicure that you can try for your princess. There are a lot of nail polish and you may choose the one you want or even combine the colors for each nail. Will be awesome, for sure ! The gorgeous patterns will complete your work in the nail salon games and your client will be very happy.

Princess Makeup and Nail Salon Games features :

- a big beauty makeup salon with a lot of creams and cosmetics treatments
- a complete makeup box for princess makeup games
- a virtual nail salon with all you want for a perfect manicure
- a lot of colors for nail polish like in all our nail games
- elegant dresses and accessories
- easy to play, like all our makeup games

We hope that our nail salon games are what you want and you will write in your comments your opinion about how we can make them as you like. Enjoy playing !
summary: Princess Makeup and Nail Salon is one of our collection of princess makeup games
title: Princess Makeup and Nail Salon

descriptionHTML:
It’s your day! You’ve just been discovered by the best hip hop talent agent! This game will help you improve your moves, gain fans and show ‘em you’re the hottest hip hop dancer! Dress in street style, choreograph your own dance & climb the ranks at the big show!


LOVE to dance hip hop and want to show the world what you’ve got? This is the game for you! Hip Hop Dance School will give you the skills to choreograph your moves and STAND OUT on stage! Choose your outfit and crew members for the PERFECT performance! You’ve got to uphold your star reputation! Impress the judges and work your way UP the competition!


Features:
> Get your dancing shoes on & dance your heart out in this game, at the famous Hip Hop Show!
> Follow your mentor’s instructions as you make a name for yourself in the hip hop scene!
> Gain mad skills at the dance school as you climb the charts and score awesome prizes!
> Get inspired by your competitors’ dancing clips!
> Be part of an awesome dance crew and learn to choreograph your own moves at the school!
> Get a to-die-for makeover and dress up in the coolest hip hop getups!
> Are you ready for the big show? Get in shape at the gym! Try the cool freeze balance workout!
> Uh-oh! Dance injury! Go to the doctor and get better! Your crew’s counting on you!
> For the performance of a lifetime, you’ll need a great hairstyle! Get your hair done at the salon.
> After an intense day at dance school, relax yourself at the spa & get rid of any pre-show jitters.
> Show off your killer hip hop moves while your biggest fans cheer you on!

description: Move a snake around a dark space, eat mass, defeat and consume other players to grow the biggest and longest in the game. If the player's snake's head collides into a part of another snake, the player loses the game and must start over. The defeated avatar's body turns into bright, shining dots for other players to consume.The player can activate "boost mode", which causes the avatar to speed up.In the game you will see many popular old memes and also new memes such as "Do u know De Wae"(from VRChat), "Ugandan Knuckles" and many others.Good luck and have a fun!
descriptionHTML:
Move a snake around a dark space, eat mass, defeat and consume other players to grow the biggest and longest in the game. If the player's snake's head collides into a part of another snake, the player loses the game and must start over. The defeated avatar's body turns into bright, shining dots for other players to consume.
The player can activate "boost mode", which causes the avatar to speed up.

In the game you will see many popular old memes and also new memes such as "Do u know De Wae"(from VRChat), "Ugandan Knuckles" and many others.


Good luck and have a fun!

comments: Amazing and a unique type of game. The currency is all obtainable even as a free to play. Cool looking dragons and the movement in the game more lively than just pictures. I've played many app before this and I would say that this is top 1 so far. The only problem is the game will stop and crash. I don't know the reason but I've tried in another device and also stops working. Overall the game is magnificent and I definitely recommend it to everyone!

Awesome! I really like the game. Top 5 game? Worth it! I've played some similar game but this one is the best. The graphic is great and the dragons are cute. The resources are not too hard to get. The best part is the drag-skill! It's really different. Each dragon have their skill effect with different area form. You have to drag it right. A long way to be a master tamer. So enjoy the process!

I Tried this game with fair expectations, and even as I started i thought it might not be as fun as some other ones I've tried. But this game legitimately blew my standards away! It looks great, latency is great, gameplay is great! It's just a great game. Characters have simple tropes but are written in a likable way, which can't be said for alot of games. Everything about this game is very approachable and fun, and not to mention really nice to look at. I'm a fan for sure!

This game is awesome. The graphics are beautiful. The game is really unique because of the dragging skills. This game definitely give you a lot of chance for getting a good dragon. In my opinion it is action packed. Overall the game is awesome. The only reason I rate 4 stars is because of the fact that the game crashes several times and sometimes freezes. However, this game is still the best game out of all the other dragon game I played.

Pretty well made game afterall, all currency ingame can be obtained in fairly free and quick way. The game also offers really big help/supply for newbies. Spend a few (for me 3)days and you can already get 3 times of 11 advanced draw. Can get a little bit of grindy but not pay to win either. The flaws being some English translation error and extreme flashy visual effects, and the lack of (limited even) variety of the dragons and campaign plot.

Good games guys but the summon rate for a 5 star is too low. Im one of the top players on the server. When i do get a 5 star its one that i already have. Also the log in event is not working for the American server. Even if you pay. Its a waste cuz rates are too low. So don't

Why does one person always seem to do almost everything (‚ùó) and, most importantly, what can you do about it? Emily and Patrick face (and answer!) this question in Emily‚Äôs newest story, Moms vs Dads!  ‚ôÇÔ∏è ‚ôÄÔ∏èüèÜ Manage both dads and moms in this fun time management story game!üèÜ Play your way through 60 story levels plus 30 challenge levelsüèÜ Get to know the differences between the four couples! Who will you be rooting for?üèÜ Take in six fun locations including favorites like Camp Talon and Emily‚Äôs houseüèÜ Earn diamonds and build your own kids‚Äô paradise in Emily‚Äôs back yardüèÜ Beat daily challenges to earn extra diamondsüèÜ Collect all the postcards and send heartfelt greetings to all your loved onesüèÜ Help Emily and Patrick discover what is truly important in lifeEmily is thrilled with her family, but now that she has three kids, it seems there‚Äôs 10 times the work! Balancing her work in the diner, her cooking vlog, her chores AND her family is getting harder and harder. descriptionHTML:
The moms are testing the dads’ mettle in this fun take on an age-old debate! Who will end up victorious? ♂️ ♀️

We’ve all been there, whether as parents or kids – why aren’t chores split evenly in the family? Why does one person always seem to do almost everything (❗) and, most importantly, what can you do about it? Emily and Patrick face (and answer!) this question in Emily’s newest story, Moms vs Dads! ♂️ ♀️

🏆 Manage both dads and moms in this fun time management story game!
🏆 Play your way through 60 story levels plus 30 challenge levels
🏆 Get to know the differences between the four couples! Who will you be rooting for?
🏆 Take in six fun locations including favorites like Camp Talon and Emily’s house
🏆 Earn diamonds and build your own kids’ paradise in Emily’s back yard
🏆 Beat daily challenges to earn extra diamonds
🏆 Collect all the postcards and send heartfelt greetings to all your loved ones
🏆 Help Emily and Patrick discover what is truly important in life

Emily is thrilled with her family, but now that she has three kids, it seems there’s 10 times the work! Balancing her work in the diner, her cooking vlog, her chores AND her family is getting harder and harder. When she notices Patrick acting like playing with the kids occasionally is him doing his fair share, she decides she’s had enough! 👶🏻 👶🏽

Her girlfriends all have similar experiences - men who don’t help out in the house unless asked, men who only “babysit” their own kids…. and they’ve had enough! It’s time to ACT, and show them how much work it really is. Can the girls get their men dashing around the house, or will this end up being a recipe for disaster?
summary: Join Emily and Patrick in a hilarious battle of the sexes!
title: Delicious - Moms vs Dads

description: If you love makeup, beauty secrets and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!  Play to enter a magical make-up salon and apply beauty products on the beautiful princess of winter!In this game for girls you‚Äôll have complete freedom to design an endless collection of different looks and styles, with unforgettable makeups and fairy-like hairdos. Ice Princess will challenge your imagination with tons of crystal-like eye-shadows, blush colors and amazing lipsticks, plus, absolutely fabulous and wintry face-paints to give the makeup a final touch of awesomeness.And when it comes to the hairstyles chapter, be sure you‚Äôll have tons to choose from! Ice-Princess loves changing the color and looks each day, so all you need to do is choose!Browse through tens of colorful hairstyles, braids and ponytails, then choose your favorite hairlock color to glam the fancy hairdo up.For a final touch, choose from the wonderful tiaras collection the one that will make your queen of all the lands of ice shine the most! Match it up with a divine top, and there you have if: the story is complete and your princess is ready to charm the world once more with diamonds sparkles and winter-glam all around. ‚Ä¢ Play to discover all these wintertime features: ‚Ä¢ Skin-tones and blushes ‚Ä¢ Eye-lenses and eyebrows ‚Ä¢ Fabulous mascaras ‚Ä¢ Tons of glamorous eyeshadows‚Ä¢ Sparkly and matte lipstick colors‚Ä¢ Wintry face-paints‚Ä¢ Icy tops‚Ä¢ Necklaces and earrings‚Ä¢ Beautiful hairstyles  ‚Ä¢ Wonderful tiaras So if you‚Äôre looking for a casual game that combines the magic of the most wintry winter, with beauty, icy jewels, and fabulous makeup, here it is!
descriptionHTML:
If you love makeup, beauty secrets and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!
Play to enter a magical make-up salon and apply beauty products on the beautiful princess of winter!

In this game for girls you’ll have complete freedom to design an endless collection of different looks and styles, with unforgettable makeups and fairy-like hairdos. Ice Princess will challenge your imagination with tons of crystal-like eye-shadows, blush colors and amazing lipsticks, plus, absolutely fabulous and wintry face-paints to give the makeup a final touch of awesomeness.

And when it comes to the hairstyles chapter, be sure you’ll have tons to choose from! Ice-Princess loves changing the color and looks each day, so all you need to do is choose!
Browse through tens of colorful hairstyles, braids and ponytails, then choose your favorite hairlock color to glam the fancy hairdo up.

For a final touch, choose from the wonderful tiaras collection the one that will make your queen of all the lands of ice shine the most! Match it up with a divine top, and there you have if: the story is complete and your princess is ready to charm the world once more with diamonds sparkles and winter-glam all around.

• Play to discover all these wintertime features:
• Skin-tones and blushes
• Eye-lenses and eyebrows
• Fabulous mascaras
• Tons of glamorous eyeshadows
• Sparkly and matte lipstick colors
• Wintry face-paints
• Icy tops
• Necklaces and earrings
• Beautiful hairstyles
• Wonderful tiaras

So if you’re looking for a casual game that combines the magic of the most wintry winter, with beauty, icy jewels, and fabulous makeup, here it is!
summary: If you love makeup and Ice Princess, then this game was made for you!
title: Ice Princess Makeup

comments: I think it is a very good game. But i have a few suggestions that you can make to the game. First you should make it where it shift from daytime to nighttime and when it is on nightime you have the choice to turn on the turn on the headlights. Also you should make it where you have 2 different driving controls. Like you should keep the arrows and add a steering wheel. Also, you guys should add a horn with one of the button options. You guys should also make it where you can ride with other people. One last thing guys you should add a boat people can get on and ride. Please add all of this you guys are awesome!

This is a great game for hanging out, practising quick-scoping and all-round fun. I just feel that you guys haven't put enough effort into this, like you just put something down and left it. People love this game! You need to start making it betterand adding new content, or else people will just get bored. But otherwise, it's great for just having fun killing other people ;)

Can you have us have a friend's list to see who's online I bet  that's what people like me want. Also there's  seats in the vehicle. can you make it were  people for the other person .And last can you make a gas bar were we  refill has with our money that would be cool with a update of a donate Bar were in the server we can donate bet. And add newer cars and guns it's fun but and the same time it's boring plz do these.!!!!!!!!!!!

Pretty good game, though there should be a higher emphasis on fighting. We should be able to register accounts, and receive money for our kills. Also, when we kill someone, it should say in chat who we killed. Game has great potential, registering accounts would be nice to so that we can make friends and remember people. :D

I love the game, it is a great time killer, but I have suggestions. First you should add more guns, like pistols, and add grenades. Also have the plane controls more easier to use, I always have difficulty with that. Add more maps, more planes to fly. Make it so it can save the cars or planes you get. I always lose money buying the same car again every time I log back in the game. Other than that, I love the game!

Make a option where you can choose your sensitivity. The sniper Scope is harder to you in with the new one. Make more guns in the game. Finally when you stay still in the game: people, cars, move which makes it harder to shoot. One you run over a player they should die. Please add these stuff to the game for a 5 star rating.

This lite pocket mine blocky craft game, inspired by the popular cube & voxel based pocket edition creative games, lets you craft dino world! No dragons and no survival - just prehistoric reptiles! Teenage boys and girls are welcome! Craft & build a perfect cube dinosaurs world! Exploration of world is here! Construct anything you want! Play in a creative mode with unlimited resources or mine deep into the cube dino world.Craft, and explore! Exploration of randomly generated cube prehistoric worlds, islands. This game will bring you only joy and relax! No dragons and survival world craft mode. Just cube jurassic craft world/island and your infinite creativity! Very quick and easy. All for free! In this incredible and totally free game you can destroy all the blocks, collect resources, survive and build beautiful & perfect Buildings. This  pocket edition game (PE) contains a large number of different blocks with which you can craft your own cube world/Island! High resolution textures, very convenient and thoughtful game control, High FPS, without compromise! So plunge into the fantastic world of ‚ÄòDino Jurassic Craft: Exploration & Evolution‚Äô - with new cube worlds and adventures! Place blocks / cubes move voxels, dig and mine! comments: You deserve 4-5 stars but you need to solve some issues first: 1: crashing into grass?...really? And I didn't even touched it.  2: I want the car to stay straight and the entire map to rotate according to my driving direction. Just like I would be in the car.  3: Make the area of the buttons larger to have a more accurate driving.  4: I would like, when I'm driving, the entire screen to zoom in a little to be able to drive through narrow spaces more quickly.  Give me the satisfaction of playing and I'll give you your 5 stars on all categories.

I really enjoy the simplicity of the game, a lot of these parking games are 3d now and I don't much care for it. I'm ok with the controls but a little wheel might be better. It's pretty fair overall and the difficulty curve is pretty good for me as I have a short attention span. comments: A surprisingly good game and relatively easy to pick despite the lack of any guide/tutorial. I would have given it 5 stars but not being able to play same game on several devices brings it down. Fix that, and some of the English grammar, and I'll up my score.

Pretty good for finding it on Facebook. I'm liking it so far, but there's no tutorial or anything like it, so you're on your own figuring things out. Some item descriptions aren't in English, and the text after you gain things in combat for gold and souls goes too fast. Still don't know what it's saying.   Would recommend though just for a quick thing to do when you're bored and have time to kill.

There is the basis of a good game here. However the fact that the grammar is atrocious makes it very difficult to decipher what areas you should be investigating for certain quests.   I find myself having to just randomly walk around hoping to come across what I'm looking for. I enjoy the game but feel that this matter needs addressed to avoid wasting time aimlessly walking.

A surprising find, i really don't expected this game to have this level of quality. This game successfully give me the feeling of discovery and exploration while in expeditions, and i feel compelled to build and better the manor. But a disappointment is how there are no differences between characters other than their classes and aesthetics.

English translation is a bit funny to read. It's still understandable though. There's no tutorial so you have to trial-and-error things out at the beginning but after all of that, the game is pretty addictive. Hope I can play it w/ friends or as a clan in the future!

3 out of 4 members of the team died and the last one cannot carry the weight and I'm stuck because I have maximum load and I cannot leave the fight drop cannot collect cannot leave. I can't do anything. A big problem that should have been anticipated.. fixed

descriptionHTML:
Official sequel of classic popular adventure game Dungeon Survivor.

Dungeon Survivor II – Dark Tide is a simulation and dungeon adventure game.

This time, you will lead your daring mission to the no-man’s land, have an unexpected fantasy adventure in the ancient and mysterious continent.


Story of the World
- Be the Ruler of the Sanctuary, the eschatological Manor, guide your people and warriors to fight against the fallen Country.
- Upon the journey, you’ll encounter different people.
Will you draw out the sword or reach out your hand? That is for you to decide.
- Little, helpless and pathetic humans gather together to battle against the Black Tide.
Every decision you make is of vital importance.

Class & Adventure
- 6 main Classes with more than 50 sub-classes, each with unique personality.
- Easy but flexible team formation, Mixed? All Melee? All Mages, whatever you like.
Your Imagination is the only limit.
- Diverting strategy setting, play a sure card and win the battle!
- Vicious creatures, quirky traps, weird strangers-the world is always full of accidents and surprises.
- Find the powerful Monster and beat them up!

Battle & Speed
- Real-time PVP with hand control. let’s duke it out in the Arena!
- Heading to the leaderboard for the CROWN！
- Marching on the Lost Castle and unlock the Arena!

Classic placing and gain mode
- No pains but gains
Place and gain resources every time you enter the game.
- Wit and adroit like you, even with limited resources, can definitely build up a prosperous Manor.

comments: Very Cool Game... I just started playing this game and I'm having a lot of fun.  I Love the üéè in the background.  I wish all card games could have backgrounds.  It makes the game more fun to play.  Not that were not addicted already... LoL!  I also like the fact that the cards are big enough to see.  For my Ole' eyes.  I love the daily challenges as well.  It's so much fun!  More games should be like this one.  I highly recommend it! üòé

Way too many ads. A lot of the ads run for 15 secs or more and you can't cancel them until they are finished. Many of the other ads that display in the bottom of the screen make the game unresponsive a lot of the time. Would have preferred the opportunity to purchase the game to remove the ads. Pity there is no option for -5 stars. I hate apps that force ads on you without options to remove them.

I like to play in landscape mode.  The pictures displayed of this are NOT what is displayed on your screen.   In landscape mode you get almost the portrait sized positioning of the cards just flipped sideways.   Very cramped and uncomfortable play no matter what pretty theme you are on.   I am having trouble finding a fun relaxed plenty of room app to play solitaire, but I do know there are others filling the total landscape screen without themes that I enjoy playing more than this,  sorry to say.   I am more sorry that I wasted my time with this.

I like it,  just when I try to do daily challenges I get this ad that tells me to wait for a while..... That kind of makes me NOT want to play.  If you can fix that,  I'll give a better rating.  Thanks üòä

First of all, the game wants you to rate it by the second hand. You don't have the option to, "rate it later" like on other games. That way they get better ratings because everyone loves the graphics. There's more to a game than graphics people. Some of the ads are very long and others are just plain inappropriate. You only win about 1 in every 10 hands. The game cheats and the daily challenge is a rip off. The "magic" option rarely helps in any way. I have played many different Solitaire game apps and this one is the second worst of them all.

The colorful scenes are awesome! Fish are my favorite. I just had a problem that when I did a daily challenge the rating placard would pop up but I had to totally exit my game and restart to clear it. Everyone says way too many ads but it's giving us a break to drink coffee or run to the bathroom! Just like commercials on TV.üòú

comments: Basically Gran Turismo 3 for Android. 10/10 game and love that ads aren't forced but there is also a reward for watching. It isn't really a grind to get credits. Love the updates especially the Toyota update. Looking forward to more in the future.  02/03/18 edit: Would it be possible to bring back offline mode for us that aren't able to always be online?

I rarely write reviews but this game is a gem in the rough. I love it. Physics are on point, progression feels just right and the audiovisual experience never disappoints. 2 requests though. 1) There's a display glitch: I painted my Dodge SRT Challenger Hellcat purple but in Pro races it displays white. In Drift though it shows purple. Weird. 2) My friends and I would LOVE to see Assoluto X Audi! Can Audi be added? :)

I have a concern about the honda's engine... nsx sound good then the rest sounds like a little off... and could you guys pls take into consideration in fixing the sykylines from r32 to r34... they tend to oversteer alot with or without attessa... and why certain cars have smaller rims?... looks like a drag car... like the skyline r32... after changing rims... its still the same size

So here i was after having earned all the credits to upgrade a turbo mustang and having bought the parts, thinking how cool it was that the developers allowed it to be turbocharged and thought this was an easter egg until the most recent update in which my mustang has lost 200hp and i have lost all the credits i spent upgrading it as a turbo vehicle. Not cool at all. Pretty pissed about this whole situation.

I've upgraded my phone, and now i could really enjoy the full potential of this game. Graphics are absolutely brilliant! I've had mine set on 1440p and max quality, it's beautiful to look at. The physics of the car is awesome, feels like I'm playing a simulation racing game built for PC. It feels that good. The cars, well maybe some of them not properly modelled in my opinion, but it still looks awesome, and the engine sounds..., they're absolutely spot on, especially The AMG GT. Really love that V8 sound. But somehow, i demand a bit of a sound update, because in my opinion, some of it are not similar to the one in real life. It's just a small improvement maybe, but it will give a HUGE immersion in playing Assoluto Racing. For customization, it's enough in my opinion, but adding some aero kit won't let me down thoüòÇ Multiplayer is the most awesome feature yet, and it works well. Well this is my short review, and it's definitely worth staying on my phone to kill some time. Kudos to the developersüòäüôè Edit : take a look at the 190E Evo, it had a weird rear wheel offset imo, and the Ford Mustang, it's rear wheels are misaligned. They're slightly overlapping the rear bumper.

Seen this game come a good ways! Devs are doing awesome! Hope to see some more cosmetic customization soon, really make your cars unique! Maybe a new drift track in the future, or choice on which map for multiplayer later on. Amazing though kepp it up!!

description: Climb! A Mountain in Your Pocket, a challenging game about climbing a mountain with an easy to learn, hard to master control.One button to grab with the left hand, another for the right; swing, jump, use your momentum and grab the diverse rocks to help you ascend through the mountain. But be careful, a single mistake could mean a fall down to the base camp.Reach to the main bases before your run out of stamina, find the best paths to go up, and overcome the different obstacles you will find in each level of the mountain.foot by foot, improve your record and climb higher each time mastering jumps and grabs.Compare and share your records with the rest of the players.Fight for the best time finishing the climb, if you achieve to reach the summit.
descriptionHTML:

foot by foot, improve your record and climb higher each time mastering jumps and grabs.

description: Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle is very classic, unique, challenging and addictive game. It‚Äôs time to install and play famous rock paper scissor classic game in your device. So let‚Äôs play the game with your friends or test your luck against the A.I and refresh your memories.Game is simple and easy to play. Moreover, to make game interesting there are two modes in the game. You can play with artificial intelligence or you can play with your family or friends, game represent a real challenge. In this legendary rock paper scissor game you and the opponent choose a sign of your choice. If you‚Äôre a beginner and don‚Äôt know the rule of the game, don‚Äôt worry here‚Äôs a short detail of the rules of the game. First You and your opponent (friend or family) choose a sign of rock, paper and scissor that you will then compare, the rock break the scissors but covered by the paper, the paper beat the stone but cut by the scissors and the scissors beat the paper but are broken by the stone. So make wise ways and challenge the opponent.Features‚Ä¢	Amazing Hd graphics to make the game more interesting and colorful.‚Ä¢	Play the game Vs. A.I and also against your family and friends.‚Ä¢	Challenging background sound.‚Ä¢	The person with max points will win the game.‚Ä¢	Simple and interesting user interface.‚Ä¢	Invite your family and friends and compete with them.‚Ä¢	Very small size of the app force you to keep it in your device.So download Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle and start having fun by playing in leisure time.Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle By BACA BACA Games in casual and family category 2017.
descriptionHTML:
Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle is very classic, unique, challenging and addictive game. It’s time to install and play famous rock paper scissor classic game in your device. So let’s play the game with your friends or test your luck against the A.I and refresh your memories.

Game is simple and easy to play. Moreover, to make game interesting there are two modes in the game. You can play with artificial intelligence or you can play with your family or friends, game represent a real challenge. In this legendary rock paper scissor game you and the opponent choose a sign of your choice. If you’re a beginner and don’t know the rule of the game, don’t worry here’s a short detail of the rules of the game. First You and your opponent (friend or family) choose a sign of rock, paper and scissor that you will then compare, the rock break the scissors but covered by the paper, the paper beat the stone but cut by the scissors and the scissors beat the paper but are broken by the stone. So make wise ways and challenge the opponent.

Features
• Amazing Hd graphics to make the game more interesting and colorful.
• Play the game Vs. A.I and also against your family and friends.
• Challenging background sound.
• The person with max points will win the game.
• Simple and interesting user interface.
• Invite your family and friends and compete with them.
• Very small size of the app force you to keep it in your device.

So download Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle and start having fun by playing in leisure time.

Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle By BACA BACA Games in casual and family category 2017.
summary: Rock Paper Scissor is the best addictive app to settle your dispute in a fun way
title: Rock Paper Scissor Epic Battle

comments: The makers of this game have put their soul into it, bringing into life every element of the game. The characters are charming and beguiling. I'm in love with princess. üòÅ It's the only game where I've invested real cash, and have received  its full worth. The game is an epic. I love it. Cons: Although I've purchased gems, and bought legendary chests, I've only received relatively less efficient cards like lava hound and graveyard which help in game play only if complemented with other cards. It's a bummer. I think they want me to spend more to enjoy more desirable cards.

NejiOmeGa here!üôè I have got to say this game is a "quick paste first place!" type of game and I love it so far been training like a pro to be on top!!üôá I've loved it ever since the updates, oh yes did I mention I'm a returning player?? An exquisite job well done I have so many new opportunities to reveal, but so many opponents to show who's Royals! So all is said I just ask that you watch and battle me tuff clasherzüòÇüòÇ

I don't think I need to 'review' much here. There are some points I definitely don't like about the game. Such as the matchmaking... You get matched with the same deck type in a row. Other than that and some minor flaws it's a great game. I love the competitive aspect about it.  Finally I would suggest some 2v2 with different game modes, such as ramp up 2v2. Also, add the rematch button in 2v2 challenges with random mates.  Hope I hit the 4,3k this season. Good luck to all clashers!

I think Clash Royale is a great game to play and is very well put together for all ages, it is a fast paced game and at the same time can be played with an individual pace of your own to a degree being that there is a clock ticking, also new characters are released at a well balanced rate, so that the game doesn't become boring and the regular balance of the characters strengths and weaknesses are balanced to make the game more competitive. I recommend this game for all ages and abilities. It's great for a few minutes or an hour or so and this game also has several different tournaments you can enjoy yourself or with a friend or a teammate. See you soon on Clash Royale. A.K.A. Dad.

descriptionHTML:
Enter the Arena! From the creators of Clash of Clans comes a real-time multiplayer game starring the Royales, your favorite Clash characters and much, much more.

Collect and upgrade dozens of cards featuring the Clash of Clans troops, spells and defenses you know and love, as well as the Royales: Princes, Knights, Baby Dragons and more. Knock the enemy King and Princesses from their towers to defeat your opponents and win Trophies, Crowns and glory in the Arena. Form a Clan to share cards and build your very own battle community.

Lead the Clash Royale Family to victory!

PLEASE NOTE! Clash Royale is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Clash Royale.

A network connection is also required.

FEATURES
● Duel players from around the world in real-time and take their Trophies
● Earn chests to unlock rewards, collect powerful new cards and upgrade existing ones
● Destroy opponent’s towers and win Crowns to earn epic Crown chests
● Build and upgrade your card collection with the Clash Royale Family along with dozens of your favorite Clash troops, spells and defenses
● Construct your ultimate Battle Deck to defeat your opponents
● Progress through multiple Arenas all the way to the top
● Form a Clan to share cards and build your very own battle community
● Challenge your Clanmates and friends to a private duel
● Learn different battle tactics by watching the best duels on TV Royale


Support
Are you having problems? Visit http://supercell.helpshift.com/a/clash-royale/ or http://supr.cl/ClashRoyaleForum or contact us in game by going to Settings > Help and Support.

Privacy Policy:
http://supercell.com/en/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service:
http://supercell.com/en/terms-of-service/

Parent’s Guide:
http://supercell.com/en/parents/

description:
The devious pranksters are back at it again with an all new trolling nightmare: Troll Face Quest Video Games 2! Spoof iconic video games and prank the pants off all those characters. Get lost in a crazy world of video game shenanigans and try to escape the pranking trolls!
PHONE-SMASHING FEATURES
‚Ä¢ 85+ million installs across the legendary Troll Face Quest franchise!‚Ä¢ Troll famous video games!‚Ä¢ 35+ hilarious levels of pranking insanity!‚Ä¢ Unlock insane achievements!‚Ä¢ Lots of wacky collectibles!‚Ä¢ No Wi-fi needed!‚Ä¢ A funny trip through a loony video game world!
THE RETURN OF TROLL RAIDER
Get ready for a trolling adventure that‚Äôll take you back to your intense video game playing days. Troll  adventurous, monkey-swinging babes in tight shorts, steal the wheels from an Italian plumber‚Äôs go-kart , prank entire cities under the rule of theft, murder, and mayhem, and piss off birds for no good reason. Will you solve the crazy pranks and win a chicken dinner or will you end up in the loony bin? It‚Äôs payback time for all those levels you didn‚Äôt complete.
TROLLING TIME NEVER RUNS OUT
A whirlwind of trolls and pranks, this is another baffling game that will make you throw your cell phones against the wall. Keep your eye on the ball and crush the prankster video game characters before they troll you into the dirt!
Do you have the guts to prank your childhood video game stars into oblivion?
