description: Business Inc. is a Winner of the 2016 PMI Continuing Professional Education Product of the Year Award!!!Business Inc. is a business strategy game where you are in charge of running a company that develops mobile games. Your end goal is to expand your business as much as you can to come out on top as the leader of the mobile entertainment market.3 difficulty levels of game play, over 15 employees, and an endless number of projects to be run. The game simulates small projectized organization, making profits on projects.Additionally, the game offers predefined Startup scenario with more than 100 projects, more than a dozen people, 11 difficulty levels, hundreds of events and news from the world of project management will provide entertainment as well as a few days of gaming and learning. The game introduces some basic terms of project management, PMI, PMP, PRINCE2, PMBOK Guide, and Scrum.Test yourself out as a project manager, use your resources as best as you can and earn a fortune. You can train people and influence their motivation to increase efficiency and reduce risk. Each project has planned budget, revenue, risk, and deadline. Select profitable projects and optimally allocate people at them to earn as much as possible. The Business Inc. provides a business education in a fun way. However, the game is difficult. If you have problems finishing it, check our FB website for tips and news: https://www.facebook.com/bincgame
descriptionHTML:
Business Inc. is a Winner of the 2016 PMI Continuing Professional Education Product of the Year Award!!!

Business Inc. is a business strategy game where you are in charge of running a company that develops mobile games. Your end goal is to expand your business as much as you can to come out on top as the leader of the mobile entertainment market.

3 difficulty levels of game play, over 15 employees, and an endless number of projects to be run. The game simulates small projectized organization, making profits on projects.

Additionally, the game offers predefined Startup scenario with more than 100 projects, more than a dozen people, 11 difficulty levels, hundreds of events and news from the world of project management will provide entertainment as well as a few days of gaming and learning.

The game introduces some basic terms of project management, PMI, PMP, PRINCE2, PMBOK Guide, and Scrum.

Test yourself out as a project manager, use your resources as best as you can and earn a fortune. You can train people and influence their motivation to increase efficiency and reduce risk. Each project has planned budget, revenue, risk, and deadline. Select profitable projects and optimally allocate people at them to earn as much as possible.

The Business Inc. provides a business education in a fun way.

However, the game is difficult. If you have problems finishing it, check our FB website for tips and news: https://www.facebook.com/bincgame

descriptionHTML:
Are you ready to run your very own beauty salon? In Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game your kids can design and create their very own hair styles, or take the ultimate challenge and match their customer's hairstyle of choice perfectly!

Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game is a fun hairdressing simulation game where everyone can create the most beautiful, fashionable hairstyles at the touch of a button!

With two fantastic modes to play, the fun never stops!

Key Features:

FREE MODE
In Free Mode, your hair models are ready to let you go to town on their hair, all you need is your creativity!

Give it a trim, cut it short of leave it long and flowing; the scissors are always at hand.
Smooth and straight is nice, but with Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game you can curl to your heart’s content with a selection of different curling tongs each of which makes a tighter or looser curl!

Don’t want to curl all of the hair? That’s okay, with Fashion Hair Salon – Kids Game you can pick and choose which hair to curl and which to leave straight. Cut the front short into bangs and leave the back long as you like!

Accessories make a big impact. Choose from a wide range of beautiful grips, clips, tiaras and cute little animal ears to really make your creations spectacular!

Take a picture and share it with all your friends!

COPY MODE
Are you ready for the ultimate fashion salon challenge? Your customers know exactly what they want and expect you to get it just right!

Follow the guide picture and get to work.

First you need to wash your customer’s hair – lean them back into the basin and soak their hair with the shower, then lather in that shampoo till there’s plenty of bubbles! Rinse it all off again and add some conditioner to make that hair tangle free.

Take a good look at the picture and begin! You’ll be amazed at the kind of hairstyles your customers want, so many different tastes and fashions! But they don’t just want hairstyles, they also want you to do their make-up and for you to pick out the prettiest dress to go with their perfect style makeover!

You’ve got to be on top of your game if you’re going to succeed in the hair salon business but don’t worry, if you make any mistakes you can always use the magic redo cream!

Have fun with BATOKI ! Best Apps for TOddlers and KIds
developer: BATOKI - Best Apps for Toddlers and Kids
developerAddress: 802 n. west street, ste 105, Wilmington , DE 19801
summary: The most totally amazing beauty salon ever! Fashion Hair Salon - Kids Game!
title: Fashion Hair Salon - Kids Game

descriptionHTML:
Get ready for the scariest Halloween night with your virtual pet friends Kiki and Fifi! Give a magical bath, style funny hair, dress up in colorful costumes and decorate the haunted house in the neighborhood.

Prepare for kids' favorite trick and treat night with Kiki and Fifi! Play and create the best Halloween outfits for sweet and furry kitty and puppy. Wash Kiki and Fifi in a mysterious bath and look what happens. Brush, curl, wave their hair and create the super cool hairdos. Dress up, add crazy accessories and change eye colors for the spooky Kiki and Fifi's look. Free your imagination and create the coolest kitty and puppy Halloween costumes ever!

Play the best Halloween pet salon games for girls and boys with Kiki and Fifi:
· Prepare for Halloween party with the fluffy and cute kitty and puppy!
· Dress up with amazing clothes and create tons of crazy outfits!
· Help Kiki look like the sweetest furry kitty from Mars!
· Do your magic and turn Fifi the puppy into the colorful unicorn!

This amazing world is full of dangers, you will have very little time to make decisions, you need a lot of ingenuity and good reaction to achieve at least some results.Jump, dodge, fly around obstacles in its path, if you bump into an obstacle, the story is over.The game offers 5 modes :Flight - fly around the poles. descriptionHTML:
Superhero you and your craft - survival. This amazing world is full of dangers, you will have very little time to make decisions, you need a lot of ingenuity and good reaction to achieve at least some results.
Jump, dodge, fly around obstacles in its path, if you bump into an obstacle, the story is over.


The game offers 5 modes :
Flight - fly around the poles. Caution! Some columns can move.
Running - live in the rhythm of parkour, run, jumping over barriers. You can do a double jump.
Jumping - you need to get as high as possible, you will have to pursue the monster, which will annihilate the floor beneath you. If you are not fast enough, it will fall.
Spider - fly on the web through the tunnel, you will find many obstacles in the way and they are not very simple. (This is the most difficult in the game mode)
Bonus mode.

Game Features:
- Procedurally generated blocks world and buildings.
- Cool graphics: enjoy the best pixel cube graphics with high fps.
- Free game: play the game for free!
- Choose your super heroe.
- You can unlock four mine characters.
- Incredibly easy operation.


Go to adventure!
summary: The main goal - to move forward no matter what. Survive at all costs.
title: Quad Squad

comments: Really enjoyed the game until I was entered in a two week tournament.  Now, the boards are incredibly difficult and I can no longer earn prizes on a regular basis. Of course, I suppose that's by design so I spend money. Which I won't do. I just want some "bubblegum" to past the time.  Now, it's making my blood pressure rise...  Also amazing how many 5 ‚≠ê ratings they get in one day without the user giving explanations on why. Seems suspicious...  Oh, how I hate the legends arena stages...

Why is it that when you add new levels, I get kicked back to the first round in the legends arena? Totally unfair that all the progress I've made gets completely erased. Now that this has happened for about the 3rd time, it makes me want to uninstall

Game, not Cool Anymore,,,Sick of waiting & then play..same ole games in Lendgends. .just less moves... Uuggh. ..download BeeBrilliant...Much more Fun...more games, within game..music & Cool Graphics...more Challenging. .
This game is a Stress Releaver, I love it you have got to try it. Especially when you are having a bad day, come on in, see you on the inside xxxx

There are rewards offered after the tournament namely you receive x hours free lives at certain stages in the game. I am not receiving these!!!!!! I have tried disconnecting and reconnecting. No luck.
Such a shame.  You get into the leader area and no free time.  Disappointment.

descriptionHTML:
THE ULTIMATE MATCHING PUZZLE GAME WITH UNIQUE MAGIC POWERS AND BOOSTS!

♥ Join the fun world of Amy and help collect her precious toys! ♥

Match two or more blocks of the same color to clear the level and collect the toys from where they stuck. But be careful! It is not that easy to save all the toys while your moves are limited! Your talent in solving puzzles will be your best tool while playing this super addictive game. Bust the blocks and enjoy this colorful adventure!

Discover Amy’s world to make her smile. Play with the sweetest toys that will drag you to Amy’s enjoyable world. Crunch all the same colored cubes by using various boosters such as brick-busting blasts, rechargeable power-ups and many more!

Toy Blast Features:

● Stunning graphics and unique gameplay
● All kinds of cutest toys; cars, rockets, dolls, stuffed animals and many more...
● So many levels with exciting puzzles
● Numerous boosters along the way to help Amy; vacuums, drills, buckets, paintbrushes, tnts, rotors and so on...
● Spectacular rewards and extra bonuses unlocked after levels passed
● Easy and fun to play but challenging to master
● Facebook Leaderboards to compete with your friends and competitors!
● COMPLETELY FREE TO PLAY

description: Yoga Challenge is a new app that can be really funny. Complete as many solo or team poses as you can before the time runs out. You can see the photos or videos it takes afterwards.This app is full featured and contains many features which increase the fun. You can view side by side comparison of the yoga challenge poses you made using your camera. There are multiple difficulties, the yoga challenge for two can be completed solo or with a friend co-op. Save photos/video to view afterwards or share. You can unlock great prizes like avatars and backgrounds.There are many different styles of poses and disciplines. Yoga asanas, Yoga Nidra,  Bikram Yoga, Kundalini Yoga, Acro Yoga, Vinyasa Yoga and more.Team Mode(2 Player): Master yoga poses with a friend in a yoga challenge for two. Solo Mode(1 Player): Practice your yoga in various different disciplines.Special Features:-Take pictures and video of your poses.-Yoga Challenge GO, has Yoga for beginners, Yoga for kids, yoga for dummies and Yoggies.-Difficulty Modes: Beginner Yoga, Easy Yoga, Medium Yoga. Hard Yoga poses.-Weight Loss Goals: Encourages a healthy lifestyle, physical exercise and breathing techniques.-Yoga Friend/Family Party: You can play this with one and two player modes.-60+ Yoga physical exercise poses.-Can share your yoga challenge videos and photos.-Artistic hand drawn poses.-Unlock avatars and backgrounds.Please ,leave a review and feedback on what you love about that app and what we can improve :)
descriptionHTML:
Yoga Challenge is a new app that can be really funny. Complete as many solo or team poses as you can before the time runs out. You can see the photos or videos it takes afterwards.

This app is full featured and contains many features which increase the fun. You can view side by side comparison of the yoga challenge poses you made using your camera. There are multiple difficulties, the yoga challenge for two can be completed solo or with a friend co-op. Save photos/video to view afterwards or share. You can unlock great prizes like avatars and backgrounds.

There are many different styles of poses and disciplines. Yoga asanas, Yoga Nidra, Bikram Yoga, Kundalini Yoga, Acro Yoga, Vinyasa Yoga and more.

Team Mode(2 Player): Master yoga poses with a friend in a yoga challenge for two.
Solo Mode(1 Player): Practice your yoga in various different disciplines.

Special Features:
-Take pictures and video of your poses.
-Yoga Challenge GO, has Yoga for beginners, Yoga for kids, yoga for dummies and Yoggies.

comments: It's okay and the graphics are really nice, the sound effects are good but ultimately, you play and play and play and play and still not got to the other towns. I've got to about the 7th and had enough of trying to get further and not progressing much. It's okay for a few days but after that, and like someone else has mentioned about the ads, too many to get little rewards

Really fun and adictingl but for samsung galaxy core prime this game has A LOT of bugs and glitches. Tried to play for more than five minutes is making the phone first freeze the screen then restart itself. Some cabs never arrive. Need a lot of bugfixes right now. Other than that it is a good game that i like.

For a game so heavily reliant on ads to deliver benefits to the player, it is a gamble sometimes whether or not those ads will crash the game and therefore cost you the prizes. The game itself is all right, but this gamble drags down the experience when it doesn't work.

It's like owning your own transportation service like Uber or Lyft, but in arcade Crazy Taxi meets Monopoly. If you hire drivers to your service, you not only make more money, but you expand your  territory. I love the diversity of the characters, how you have new with the classic arcade characters like Axel, Gus and Gena. And I also love the concept is modern, but has the classic arcade concept and feel with the scratch cards, gems, and money. Bonuses are earned through accomplishing objectives, and of course, ads. Thanks Sega. üëåüëç‚ù§

Outstanding game. My only fuss is cars get trapped in some buildings during attempts to retrieve funds. Going back to another stage and returning to the stage I'm engaged in usually resets game play. Otherwise, great game.

It's a chilled game to play. There are a bit too many ads. And it because it is just tapping, it can be a bit boring after a while. It takes long before you get somewhere new. But all by all it's a free easy game to kill time perfectly.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome four farm animals to your beauty salon! Play kids favorite makeover games with kitty, bunny, dog and cat. Style, design, color and have tons of fun with the cutest animals on the farm!

Have you ever wanted to have a bunny with a blue haircut? Or dress up a purple furry kitty in fashion clothes? Now you can have it all! Furthermore, you can create new styles and designs for dachshund Judy and gentle-cat-man Carlo in your own beauty salon. Unleash your imagination and help farm animals look stylish with colorful haircuts and trendy fashion clothes. Play and enjoy the company of the happiest furry farm animals in the countryside!

Farm Animals Makeover favorite games for girls and boys who love pets:
· Run a beauty salon and take care of four farm animals: a kitty, a bunny, a dog and a cat!
· Style hair and dress up with a bunch of fashion clothes and accessories!
· Check out the new haircut catalog and choose the best hairstyles for your furry friends!
· Curl, wave, straighten, comb and color their hair as many times as you wish!
· Dress up Lucy the kitty and make her look as elegant as a swan!
· Create the most colorful haircut for Daisy the furry bunny!
· Help Judy the dog look beautiful with fancy girl clothes!
· Find the best haircut for Carlo the cat and color his hair like a rainbow!
· Play every day and create tons of new crazy looks!

description: The city is in the state of turmoil. The terrorists, human traffickers and robbers are everywhere around the city. There is no acts of Violence unturned. Civilians are scared. People are praying for a Flying Super Hero who can save them from the antagonist atrocities in this superhero vs Gangster City Battle. Become the real superhero and save the people from these gangsters and become superhero fighting squad. You are in for some really tough kungfu fight fighting games.Panther Super Hero Crime City Battle is a saga of superhero fighting games where you are not some ordinary hero fighter but a kungfu combat 2018 super fighter, action hero. You have the duty of taking revenge from the super villain and put an end to their harmful intentions. If all the superhero, female warrior, female heroine, super fighter and flying superheroes, teams up to form an elite unit of super heroes then definitely you can superkick the Grand Immortal Gods of terrorism and win this arena battle as a king fu fighter. The terrorist mafia is spreading all over the city, they have created a bank robbery crew which did a major crime robbery at Federal Reserve Bank. It was an impossible heist but the mafia made it possible by their evil tactics and plans. Their gritty crime saga is creating terror among the civilians.Panther Super Hero Crime City Battle is the crime fight between the protagonists and the antagonists. You have to become the superhero New York needs at this time of despair. You have to keep on fighting to survive this cyclone of crime and terror. It‚Äôs time to show your love interest for your city. Apart from doing superhero fight in the battlefield you have been also made a street champ. You have been given training of martial arts by the African protagonist, to save the civilians from the street fighting and robbery. Being a fight champion get the chance of some real action fight on the streets of New York City.Being a Flying Action Hero you have the powers of a flying hero to do crime patrol over the city at night as well. When the superhero fly over the city for the protection of civilians then no chance is left for escape crime. Make sure no one is able to do fly hero city escape. The Bank of downtown is under the constant danger of heist. Recently an armored truck full of gold and money was stolen from the city at night. So their next target is to do a bank heist. Panther Super Hero Crime City Battle is the Heroes Battle to eliminate the outlaws and the Town Crime prevailing in the city. This has become a civil war which will end in the battle arena. The battle city is in need of your skills and valor for it becoming a survival city.Panther Super Hero Crime City Battle gives you the chance of becoming the ultimate legend hero in this Gangster Crime Battle. You have to do just what is expected from a New York City superhero. Stop the grand city robbery from happening, Make counter attacks on gangster strike action, make sure there is no escape crime from the cop and end this crime battle by constantly patrolling the Crime City. Be an active part of the superhero fighting squad. There are a number of missions that you have to win to conquer this Grand Superhero Battle. This is a game of Hero Survival.Game FeaturesHigh Quality 3D GraphicsEasy and Smooth controlsUser Interactive gameAdventurous Missions and Various LevelsRealistic Environments

descriptionHTML:
It’s time to give the baby bump to the pregnant mermaid because she’s about to become mermaid mommy!

Play the ER Emergency surgery game where the pregnant mermaid is about to give birth to mermaid baby so operate now!

Play the ER Emergency simulator of the pregnant mommy and do the surgery by starting with the pregnant mermaid checkup in the doctor salon. Take her to the ER Surgery room and check the condition of the baby.

The beautiful mermaid Ariel is expecting her little mermaid baby and she needs full care as this is the cesarean birth of the mermaid baby in the baby doctor salon. Prepare your surgery squad and start the bubble bump and the baby shower.

Take her to the maternity room and give birth to the mermaid baby by doing the surgery simulator. She was in a hurry and rushed to your maternity hospital so admit the pregnant mermaid and operate now in the pregnancy kids game.

Mermaid Pregnancy Surgery ER Emergency Game Features:

• Exciting and adventurous pregnant mermaid surgery levels.
• A different Clinic and surgery squad for a check up.
• Check the heartbeat of the pregnant mommy with a stethoscope.
• Use surgical tools to give birth by cesarean birth in the baby doctor salon game.
• Take the pregnant mommy to the maternity hospital for the baby birth surgery.
• Do the check up and start the cesarean birth to operate now!

How to Play Mermaid Pregnancy Surgery ER Emergency:

• Press the play button and select if you want a twin baby or single baby birth.
• Select the check up tool.
• Drag the stethoscope to check the heartbeat of the mermaid mom.
• Check the temperature of the pregnant mermaid if its perfect
• Then drag the BP apparatus and check the blood pressure.
• Take the blood test in the baby shower games.
• Check the blood sugar of the mermaid girls If its ready for the ER surgery.

The surgery squad is ready to operate now! Give a mermaid kiss to the mermaid baby after the cesarean birth in baby shower games.

descriptionHTML:
Mellisa is nine months pregnant and preparing to give birth. Her family is out of city and it is up to you to manage the whole pregnancy surgery process.


Mellisa is going to have a baby soon. She goes to the hospital. After a whole body examination, the doctor tells


Mellisa that she needs a caesarean surgery.


Become a doctor and prepare the surgery. Firstly give her the anaesthetic and then turn on the breathing machine. When the preparation is done, like a doctor finish the surgery.

The baby is born. But there are lots of work that need to be finished. Please complete the treatment for both the mommy and the baby.

The baby is so cute. Please take care of him. Thanks.


1) help Mellisa to eat, then take her to the hospital by road.
2) While going to the hospital, avoid any car accidents.
3) Drive the ambulance and take her to the hospital quickly.
4) Apply a treatment to get rid of stretch marks caused by pregnancy.
5) Make ultrasound scan to see in what state the babies are in.
6) Now head home and make them a warm bath.
7) Play with her child, help her to do so as well.
8) Make the baby go to sleep, so you can help Melissa dress.


A game for young children who want to become a doctor in the near future. Test your skills to the limit and show the world that you can become a doctor. With so many mommy’s to select from and so many prince and princesses to come in this world. You surely can be the best surgery doctor on playstore

descriptionHTML:
Do you want to have fun on Christmas holidays? Download our game and you will not be bored in long winter evenings!
It is an unforgettable adventure in a mysterious world. In this game there are many randomly generated worlds: from snow-capped mountains and a huge snow-covered forest to tropical jungles and dangerous marshes. Each of these worlds hides many secrets.
Here you will feel the freedom for your creativity. To do this, we added a lot of Christmas items to the game, which will create for you an atmosphere of celebration and Christmas magic.
Play in creative mode with unlimited resources or get into the wilds of the world in the mode of survival, making weapons and armor to fight its inhabitants. Explore endless worlds and build the most incredible buildings, from simple houses to majestic structures.
Have a good game! Merry Christmas!

Features:

А lot of Christmas items.
Beautiful graphics in high expansion.
It is supported by all modern devices.
Free flight mode.
Two game modes: survival and creativity.
Randomly generated maps with complete freedom of action.
Dynamically changing world.
Many different locations.
Many different blocks and objects.
For all ages.

Please, support the developers - give our game 5 STARS and it will inspire us.

descriptionHTML:
Subway vector running game that is developed for the kid’s. This endless ninja running game is very easy to play because it is 2D game with easy and to control just by using 2 buttons, that’s are Jump and sleep. You have to jump and sleep to cross the hurdles according to the shapes of hurdles.
It is an endless game just like other subway games. You can just enjoy it by playing it on your cell phone and when you will play then you will find more features of this game.
Your mission is to protect or save the ninja from the hurdles carefully if you don’t care about that then it will be hit to any hurdle and will die and game will be over. Your first mission is to unlock the second character after covering the distance of 5000 km. After that you can enjoy the endless free playing subway game.
How to play?
 This game is very simple and easy to play just follow the tips given below:
 Click the icon and launch the game.
 Click the play button to start the game
 Click the option that you like to choose, by swiping on the screen or by using buttons.
 Just click the jump button to jump the ninja and save it from the hurdles
 Click the jump button two times if you need to jump at a little high height
 Cover the distance of 5000 km to unlock the second ninja to enjoy subway running

description: Enter the warehouse area and complete multiple missions in the second instalment of the Truck Trials series! Choose from various different vehicles and try to prove yourself as a professional driver in every one of them!Being quick with your deliveries is not the most important thing here ‚Äì though of course you are operating on a time limit. Beat the target time and you will be rewarded handsomely for your speed. But don‚Äôt forget about caution and thoughtfulness ‚Äì what good is your delivery if you smash the cargo along the way?Other cars won‚Äôt be much of an issue here. There‚Äôs not much traffic in the warehouse area for most of the time. But that doesn‚Äôt mean your trials will be easy! Don‚Äôt rush it, be careful with your driving and parking, and make sure you get your cargo to its destination in one piece!Earn your Truck Drivers License completing multiple varied tasks quickly and efficiently. Prove you can control the biggest cars around and park them with style! Drive like a pro! Don‚Äôt treat it like a race!The game features detailed warehouse area with carefully modelled buildings and equipment. You will have to drive carefully and avoid obstacles. You will also get out on the road where realistic traffic will provide some additional difficulty. Other cars will provide some challenge there.10 DIFFERENT VEHICLESChoose one of 10 different vehicles, suited for particular tasks. Drive an utility truck, a forklift, small buggy and even a huge trailer truck. Each car poises a different challenge. This is not a racing game! Learn to drive them properly and complete the trials in this realistic and demanding simulation!DETAILED WAREHOUSE AREADrive around warehouses and beyond. Explore industrial areas and drive on the roads around them, minding the realistic traffic. Other cars may not be as imposing as the one you‚Äôre driving, but that doesn‚Äôt mean you can ignore them. Mind your speed or you risk a dangerous crash!50 VARIED MISSIONSThere‚Äôs much to be done in Truck Driver! You have 5 different missions to complete in each of the cars. Learn to drive all of them fast, discovering their strong and weak points, and you will be able to overcome any challenge. Try to control your rush though ‚Äì speed is not always the best option. Learn, observe and react!FREE TO PLAYThe Main Game Mode is 100% FREE to play, all the way through, no strings attached! Extra Game Modes which alter the rules slightly to make the game easier are available through optional In-App Purchases. Each mode has separate leaderboards to make for totally fair competition!GAME FEATURES‚ñ∂ IMPRESSIVE TRUCK COLLECTION : Drive 10 Awesome Trucks, feel like a king of drivers!‚ñ∂ PRO PARKING MISSIONS: Huge campaign to beat, earn in-game money for your progress and buy new cars!‚ñ∂ 100% Free to Play Missions‚ñ∂ CONTROLS: Buttons, Wheel, Tilt & MFi Game Controller Support‚ñ∂ CAMERAS: Multiple cameras including First Person view for full immersion‚ñ∂ iCLOUD: Supports play between your devices & automatic progress backup with iCloud
descriptionHTML:
Enter the warehouse area and complete multiple missions in the second instalment of the Truck Trials series! Choose from various different vehicles and try to prove yourself as a professional driver in every one of them!

Being quick with your deliveries is not the most important thing here – though of course you are operating on a time limit. Beat the target time and you will be rewarded handsomely for your speed. But don’t forget about caution and thoughtfulness – what good is your delivery if you smash the cargo along the way?

Other cars won’t be much of an issue here. There’s not much traffic in the warehouse area for most of the time. But that doesn’t mean your trials will be easy! Don’t rush it, be careful with your driving and parking, and make sure you get your cargo to its destination in one piece!

Earn your Truck Drivers License completing multiple varied tasks quickly and efficiently. Prove you can control the biggest cars around and park them with style! Drive like a pro! Don’t treat it like a race!

The game features detailed warehouse area with carefully modelled buildings and equipment. You will have to drive carefully and avoid obstacles. You will also get out on the road where realistic traffic will provide some additional difficulty. Other cars will provide some challenge there.

10 DIFFERENT VEHICLES
Choose one of 10 different vehicles, suited for particular tasks. Drive an utility truck, a forklift, small buggy and even a huge trailer truck. Each car poises a different challenge. This is not a racing game! Learn to drive them properly and complete the trials in this realistic and demanding simulation!

DETAILED WAREHOUSE AREA
Drive around warehouses and beyond. Explore industrial areas and drive on the roads around them, minding the realistic traffic. Other cars may not be as imposing as the one you’re driving, but that doesn’t mean you can ignore them. Mind your speed or you risk a dangerous crash!

50 VARIED MISSIONS
There’s much to be done in Truck Driver! You have 5 different missions to complete in each of the cars. Learn to drive all of them fast, discovering their strong and weak points, and you will be able to overcome any challenge. Try to control your rush though – speed is not always the best option. Learn, observe and react!

FREE TO PLAY
The Main Game Mode is 100% FREE to play, all the way through, no strings attached! Extra Game Modes which alter the rules slightly to make the game easier are available through optional In-App Purchases. Each mode has separate leaderboards to make for totally fair competition!

GAME FEATURES
▶ IMPRESSIVE TRUCK COLLECTION : Drive 10 Awesome Trucks, feel like a king of drivers!
▶ PRO PARKING MISSIONS: Huge campaign to beat, earn in-game money for your progress and buy new cars!
▶ 100% Free to Play Missions
▶ CONTROLS: Buttons, Wheel, Tilt & MFi Game Controller Support
▶ CAMERAS: Multiple cameras including First Person view for full immersion
▶ iCLOUD: Supports play between your devices & automatic progress backup with iCloud

comments: This is an amazing game, but it has pros and some cons. PROS: This game has too many pros to list (two of the pros are that it's very realistic, and there's a sandbox). CONS: Engine noise that is different for each vehicle would be nice, but at least not every vehicle has the same sound. Sometimes certain "crews" (AKA Skins) don't apply to certain vehicles. It says you fell of the world when you fall off of the world.

Great game and the best part is it's free!! The only thing I can see that could use some improvement are the controls... and it wouldn't hurt to be able to change the point of view... other than that I say "jolly good show" as I tip my hat to the creators!

Way too many ads. Not just ads, it's that annoying video-kind of ad you have to watch X seconds before you can skip. After every single level. Even in the tutorial, where you need about 30 secs - 1 minute per level.

The ads never stop! videos you can't skip, two ads in between every level, you can't even exit the app with two more ads popping up and having to wait for them to close. Developer should've taken less money to make the gameplay better.

Fun for 3 minutes, then i saw the same ad ten times in a row. OMG. I get it, you have to make money, but this is ridiculous. The forced ads are unbearable. If i wanted to install Terminator wars, Clash of Clans or Bubble Witch Saga, i would have done it already.

Loved the start and finish. Got away from me a little with the desert levels... and the random water levels at the end of the city map. Would've loved more loading and unloading of trucks and as well as the construction arc you sometimes saw with buildings going up.

descriptionHTML:
Are you ready to become the ultimate Bubble Shooting Pro?
Train your brain, match colors, and pop all the bubbles. Get the app NOW, beat levels and enjoy this addicting and relaxing bubble pop game! Match 3 bubbles or more to blast and win with fewer shots to get more stars.

Clear the board and advance along the map, win amazing rewards and enjoy fun new elements and features, boosts, power-ups, daily rewards, and more!

description: This is the official port of Five Nights at Freddy's 2: Demo version! The demo lets you play night 1.Please note that this game REQUIRES 512 megs of ram. Please make sure that your device will be able to run it before purchasing it. If you have a newer phone then this shouldn't be a problem!--------------------------------------------------------------------------------Welcome back to the new and improved Freddy Fazbear's Pizza!In Five Nights at Freddy's 2, the old and aging animatronics are joined by a new cast of characters. They are kid-friendly, updated with the latest in facial recognition technology, tied into local criminal databases, and promise to put on a safe and entertaining show for kids and grown-ups alike!What could go wrong?As the new security guard working nights, your job is to monitor cameras and make sure nothing goes wrong after-hours. The previous guard has complained about the characters trying to get into the office (he has since been moved to day-shift). So to make your job easier, you've been provided with your very own empty Freddy Fazbear head, which should fool the animatronic characters into leaving you alone if they should accidentally enter your office.As always, Fazbear Entertainment is not responsible for death or dismemberment.
descriptionHTML:
This is the official port of Five Nights at Freddy's 2: Demo version! The demo lets you play night 1.

Please note that this game REQUIRES 512 megs of ram. Please make sure that your device will be able to run it before purchasing it. If you have a newer phone then this shouldn't be a problem!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Welcome back to the new and improved Freddy Fazbear's Pizza!

In Five Nights at Freddy's 2, the old and aging animatronics are joined by a new cast of characters. They are kid-friendly, updated with the latest in facial recognition technology, tied into local criminal databases, and promise to put on a safe and entertaining show for kids and grown-ups alike!

What could go wrong?

As the new security guard working nights, your job is to monitor cameras and make sure nothing goes wrong after-hours. The previous guard has complained about the characters trying to get into the office (he has since been moved to day-shift). So to make your job easier, you've been provided with your very own empty Freddy Fazbear head, which should fool the animatronic characters into leaving you alone if they should accidentally enter your office.

As always, Fazbear Entertainment is not responsible for death or dismemberment.
summary: Welcome back to the new and improved Freddy Fazbear's Pizza!
title: Five Nights at Freddy's 2 Demo

descriptionHTML:
Grow Phone
It’s a new concept game and growing the phone by your touch.

Game Released Event. When your phone becomes 2nd generation, limited Gift free jewels
(until Feb 28th)

■ Feature
- It’s possible to create your phone.
- It’s a new type game and not normal.
- Just by playing touch, you can stress relief.
- It’s possible to see the evolution of your phone.
- Try to play a battery acceleration and booster skill
- Easy to play and various modules

■ Information for enjoy playing
- Signal starts up from a battery.
- When the signal arrives to CPU, RAM, each module, the module is charged.
- When module gauge is full, it’s possible to get the gold
- It’s possible to get more gold by the module upgrade.
- It’s possible to send more signal to module by the battery upgrade.
- By the technical point (TP), it’s possible to upgrade the board.
- If upgrade the board, it’s possible to add new modules.
- Signal speed up by holding touch
- It’s possible to charge the battery fast by battery touch when the battery is out of battery.
- Press the bonus button that appears momentarily in the game. By the bonus button, buff is activated. Also, buff, it’s able to be accrued (Combo).

■ Caption
- If your phone is changed or uninstall the game, the data is deleted. You had batter push the save button.

■ Request Permission
- About the access permission Info.
Request access to permission follow

[Storage]
• Modify or delete SD card contents
• read the contents of your SD card
[Phone]
• read phone status and identity
• directly call phone numbers
[Contacts]
• read your contacts
• find accounts on the device

■ CS
- If you have install or playing problems, please contact to E-mail.
(help@mobile-game.co.kr) We're going to reply it ASAP.

■ Login error solution
1. Run 'Play Games' App
2. Go to 'setting' menu
3. Check on to 'Sign in to games automatically'

■Notice for Load and Save functions
- When you Save a Data, a previous data will be deleted if there is a previous data.
- When you Load a saved data, on going data will be deleted.

■ Brand page : http://mobile-game.co.kr/eng/

- Current Level and Gold Rank will be deleted later.
‚óÜ Game Stabilization and known bug fix

title: GrowPhone

comments: A truly fun, interesting & free game. A good game for any age. If you need to do something relaxing, this is a good way. You'll get hooked!!! I'm in the 500's & it's still fun! The ads only require 1 more touch on the screen than you have been doing. Well worth it.

Great game, Love it! Very creative, fantastic graphics. Not so difficult or loss of life's to where you can't even play.  Yet still challenging.  Only negative is lots of ads. Would gladly pay nominal fee to get rid of them.

I hate the fact that one can't enjoy the game. So many advertising ads keep popping up one right after the other. Interrupting you while your playing the game. It's so annoying & fusterating. The game itself is Awesome but with all these stupid ads in the way. One gets feedup.

Love it !!! Caught my eye when I saw "pick 2" vs. pick 3. I'm a stay at home mom kids in school 6 days week that gives me time to burn   (lol) They did a couple small tweeks which  made the "typical pick 3 concept"a thing of the past (FINALLY) BUT WAS ENOUGH change to make it a keeper

Not a clue if there's a story line, how the power ups work, the difference between the levels or what the deal with the chest is BUT it a cute fun game to pass the time with and relax with. It's challenging but I've yet to get completely and frustratingly stuck. This feels like a game designed for fun not to make money though "buying lives"

I am pissed off that they went after hashbro but not other knock offs. I liked MLP Puzzle Party this game is so boring. Not only they ripped off peak games they ripped off the music from Genies and Gems from Jam City. I will uninstall!

description: Everyone in this world love his or her school days, always remembering your school days give a smile on your face even in your bad time. Welcome to the virtual school of the vice city in this Gangster Girl in High School simulator, this will remember your teen school days. Where you have to play as a gangster Girl to do all these things with your teachers, principle, bullyboys and with the classmates that you miss out in your school days.Enjoy the most incredible Gangster Girl in High School simulator with incredible missions to play with. Choose your bully school girl to play with, tease everyone in school in the absence of the principal and show that how funny as well as your bully days was. 3D school environment, beautiful classrooms, and tons of students busy in their classwork give you the realistic feeling of your school days. Smooth controls and incredible missions in Gangster Girl in High School simulator made this game addictive.  GAMEPLAY:Get ready to play with the most amazing Gangster Girl in High School simulation with interesting missions. You have to choose your beautiful bully gangster girl to play such amazing missions in virtual school of vice city. Where you have to steal your mark sheet from the principal office and try to escape from the principal of the virtual school.Stand against other bully gangster boys, also steal football from them and do not get caught by him. Pick up the duster from the other classroom while teacher is busy in his lecture, do not caught by the teacher otherwise you have to face punishment from the teacher. Tease the other classmates by your funny movement. Fight with the gangster boys of the school that are disturbing your friend. Many more missions are also waiting in Gangster Girl in High School simulation. 3D graphics and fun gameplay made this game to the best school games. Gangster Girl in High School simulator specially designed for the school games crazier fans and lovers.Gangster Girl in High School Features:‚Ä¢	Choose your wonderful bully girl to play with.‚Ä¢	Irritate your classmates, principal, and teacher.‚Ä¢	Fight with the gangster boys‚Ä¢	Realistic school simulation with smooth controls.‚Ä¢	Steal mark sheet from the principal room.‚Ä¢	3D graphics and amazing camera angles.Gangster Girl in High School simulation contains thrilling and incredible missions, any user love to play such school games. Just grab your favorite virtual school girl to play with and make trouble to everyone with your bad skills. Just make a wonderful entry in the gaming world of Gangster Girl in High School simulation and show how crazy you are in your school days.

comments: Love it but Ive been playing it for a while now but out of no where it keeps saying unfortunately loop taxi has stopped. It won't let me play it at all. I'm going to try to uninstall and reinstall and see if that work's. I had most of the vehicles,working my way to get all of them.4 tickets and loved this game but it keeps closing out all of a sudden. And the split second I can play it now I have to start all over from the beginning. Come on man,I put hard work, love and compassion in this game. PLEASE HELP

Almost had me I love it, but I looked at the achievements and saw that you needed to buy certain cars to unlock the achievement. I thought, okay, I can deal with grinding to get in game coins to buy a vehicle. But the only way to purchase those cars is with real money ($25 each) and not in-game currency. A game where you have to literally pay to win is not fun, and leaves no point to playing if the intent is to unlock all the things and accomplish all the achievements if it means spending $50 to buy virtual vehicles.

Had me at first I don't understand why the cop takes me away and to MANY FREAKING ADS fix it and I'll fix the stars till then y'all got  1 star!          An if y'all respond I want y'all to say I'll fix the dum ads not were striving to make it better fix the game or I will uninstall it! Its not a bad game just to many freaking ads and why the hell do I keep getting towed by the cops

Im currently sat here with all this cash after buying all levels and all vehicles. Their needs to be an option to modify vehicles so you can make them faster and have more seats. The tap does not allways work and when it does you hit somethong. Needs improvement but a good concept. Maybe even a longer road to cross or an never ending level to see how far you can get theres the option to add different modes of gameplay. But really needs work at the moment.

Cynical I was kinda enjoying this game but the frequency of the adverts began to grind me down.  I looked to see how much it would cost to disable them, thinking I'd be prepared to pay a couple of pounds.  The price was ¬£14.  You're joking, right?  Instant uninstall.  Also, please don't respond with "Hi,We are constantly striving to improve our game. Hope to get better ratings from you soon." Try to write a unique response to each one star review. It looks better.

descriptionHTML:
Pick up passengers as a taxi driver, race your way carefully in traffic and drop off passengers at the next bus stop. The more passengers you transport, the more gold you earn!
Experience different cars with various speed and capacity in unique worlds, pick up in game bonuses and try to transport as much passenger as you can.
Pay attention to environment and traffic rules, stay away from other vehicles and try not to crash.
Watch out, don't get caught to tow truck while waiting in the traffic jam!

◉ Easy to play, endless gameplay
◉ 25 different vehicles: Taxi, Sport, Jeep, Truck and many more
◉ 3 unique environments: City, Upstate, Military
◉ Prize Wheel and Daily Prizes
◉ Online Leaderboard & Achievements
developerAddress: P.O.Box 16111 RAK FTZ Ras Al Khaimah UAE
summary: Drive in traffic without crashing your car, transport passengers between stops!

comments: Overall, the game is pretty simple and it has good graphics. Good music and a simple gameplay. Saw this ad on Instagram and I tried it, now I am hooked. Especially the music lol. I recommend you put more updates and characters in this game because it will get boring when you get all the characters (also the mystery one).

Fun game in general. Watching the add for additional rewards makes it unable to go to the home menu. Being unable to go to the home menu after a run makes your letter rescues not count. Worth playing if you want to kill a few minutes here and there.

The home button in the game doesn't work, have to force the game to close and then reopen the game to upgrade characters and progress. Back button also doesn't work. Has potential but broken home button and lack of acknowledging the press of the back button not very good.

Typical 111 game - good gameplay idea frustratingly poorly implemented: tons of forced ads, buggy attack (the minions won't for the life of me attack enemies well within range), buggy home button after watching gameover ads.
Full off unwanted ads. When i use the ad to triple my income, game crashes after the ad and i get regular income. Garbage game just used for ad money
Way too many ads. And it's all forced ads, you die? Ad. You start a game? Ad. Fun game but due to the ads I'm uninstalling.

descriptionHTML:
Buff up the Bodybuilder is an innovative "clicker" with a completely original theme and fun gameplay!

So you didn't manage to buff up for summer this year? You're hardly in the best shape? Then this game is just for you!

Over the course of the entire game you will walk the exciting path of the bodybuilder after starting from the very bottom.
You've got a chance to buff up a skinny dweeb until he becomes a real bodybuilder with massive biceps and a six-pack, all while buying and upgrading your exercise equipment.

In this game you can not only buff up your character, but also compete with your friends in contest mode.

The variety of exercise equipment will surprise even the most hardcore clicker fanatics. Eventually you can also upgrade your apartment and even buy a gym membership.

You can also track your progress and unlock achievements as you play.

AND IT'S FREE!

The game features:
๏ AN EXCITING PATH from dweeb to beefcake!
๏ BUY EXERCISE EQUIPMENT that will help you buff up your bodybuilder!

๏ YOUR BODYBUILDER CAN GET RIDICULOUSLY BIG!
๏ NICE SOUNDTRACK!
๏ LOTS of original gameplay concepts!


For all questions pertaining to collaboration and partnership, email us at help@cryptinity.com

Game Story:                           Kruegar is the owner of a multinational bank. One day, he nearly escaped an assassination attempt from a sniper's bullet. Upon realizing his mistake of letting his enemies grow unchecked, He hired two young professional robbers to loot his enemy's illegal stashes across the world. comments: I have only had the game a few hours and I am already falling in love with it. It is great to go on when you have a spare 10-15 minutes. The grid is larger than others so I can read the words fluently and quickly without them being hard to see. You get points after each time you complete the grid so if you are really stuck you can receive a hint for some points. I would highly recommend this excellent game.

Only been playing for a few days now, and so far, I love it! Forgot how fun Word Search puzzles can be, and to have it on my phone is priceless lol.. No complaints with the app so far. I will say though, maybe they should tweak it just a tad, instead of giving a hint only after a short moment, possibly creating 'the option' to have a hint may be a little better. Not a big deal to me. It truly is a great app, love the simplicity of the graphic design too. Glad I came across this game.

I enjoy ALMOST the whole game, being a word find and all, simple, yet deceptively hard at times. Still, I wish there was a way to turn off the 'hints' it gives, as they get annoying... unless there IS a way that I haven't discovered yet...otherwise, I REALLY like the game, and would suggest it to all ages, as it's not too tough for the young ones, but still challenging enough for experienced players.

Pretty good word search game. It's sometimes hard to hit the right letters, especially toward the bottom of the screen. Occasionally words share more than one letter in common. Sometimes  (especially in the  lower levels) a word will show up more than  once in a puzzle. Maybe extra credit for finding a word that's not on the list?

It's a good game but there needs to be a way to turn off hints. If you don't find a word in the time it thinks you should, it keeps giving hints which ruins the gameplay. I pause for various reasons like talking to someone, cat catching a mouse, watching tv at the time, etc.. Or sometimes it might take longer to fins a word than seconds allowed before the hint.

I love this game. Really nice and well thought out game. It's educative too. But I have just one issue with it though: The flashing hint. This gets me distracted each time it flashes. Maybe there could be a hint button at the bottom of the puzzle. That way instead of it flashing and getting us distracted, we could just click on it whenever we need help. Apart from that, it's just perfect. Will give it a 5 when the flashing hint is worked onüòÅ

comments: I love aviation and this game is perfection. But how can I log in so that I don't lose the progress. I mean, if my phone breaks I will have to start from zero on a different device. All the time and money I invested will be gone. Please add a log in through Facebook or something else. Something to preserve the progress. I would be more encouraged to spend real money in the game if I knew it's safe. Also, I have the same suggestion others made: other planes Embraer, Ilyushin, Antonov, Bombardier. Thank you! Otherwise the game is incredible, so authentic! Every update just makes it better.

Great game, i enjoyed it with the new update. Though can you add more cargo jet like the Antonovs and Boeing 767F, regional jet like bombardier CRJ or embraer E-jet cause they're more common now and some props like Q series or other manufacturer. The landing animation needed the reverse engine thrust part so it will be more realistic, thank you.

This game is superb. Vector Studios have created the ultimate ATC game here, with great graphics and fun gameplay. There are a wide variety of airliners and airlines to go with them, meaning you can create a personalised airport atmosphere.   There are a few instances of liveries being on the wrong planes, but this does not really matter. I would love it if you added another turboprop like a Q400, and an Embraer RJ would be nice. Otherwise, thank you for this amazing game, and I hope you keep updating it. The only downside is that at the start of a game the gameplay is a boy slow and be, especially in small airports...

I love that you can have different planes different airlines different terminals, but the runways need to be twice as long. A big plane needs much more take of space. More airport ground means more terminals. The airport needs more gates. Make it like San Francisco busy airport with cross runaways with wind changes. Heathrow has airlines dedicated to certain terminals.  Just make it really big with lots of gates and really busy with lots of arrivals and departures. Make it like or copy a real life busy airport.

Really like the game, but after getting to the 5th lvl, you have to buy a gate to keep going? Really would be nice if maybe you had some kind of funds coming into the airport for arrivals and departures, just like any airport IRL. That's how they make some of their money. It would at least give the average person that wants to spend the time with the game to advance, and not just have to spend money to do this. Will definitely give 5 stars if this changes. Tia

At night the airport looks pretty dead. All the windows are dark in the terminal and the apron is poorly lit so can barely see what is going on on the apron from the tower. Airports tend to be very well lit at night. I totally enjoy playing capville. Please consider making another (or upgrade an existing airport) multiple-runaway airports.  To answer a previous question terminal A are for SMALL aircraft like the ATR. Terminal B will handle bigger planes and small jets.  UPDATE: the developers put a lot of work into improving this game and upgrading the airports to look more lively. Good job guys.
description: In this simulation game, you're an air traffic controller at a busy airport. The goal is to guide planes safely landing parking and taking off, avoiding collisions between them.This game is much like the actual operation of a busy airport, but with easy and self-explanatory controls. Is a great hobby that stimulates memory and reasoning.Have fun and good flights
descriptionHTML:
In this simulation game, you're an air traffic controller at a busy airport. The goal is to guide planes safely landing parking and taking off, avoiding collisions between them.

This game is much like the actual operation of a busy airport, but with easy and self-explanatory controls. Is a great hobby that stimulates memory and reasoning.

Have fun and good flights
recentChanges: - 86 new liveries including 2 new aircraft (B787 and A350)
summary: Control the aircraft at the airport avoiding collisions
title: Unmatched Air Traffic Control

comments: Hello I've been playing this game for months, so much so that I began to pay to play it. In October of 2017 I had a late payment that resulted in me loosing my VIP status. However; My bank account reflected withdrawals of 9.99 for game plays from October 2017 until January 2018. Google was able to give my money back for January but I have to now contact the Administration of this game in order to be reimbursed for previous months. I love playing this game but I will no longer pay to play anymore.  I will keep you all posted on my outcome.

The game itself is very amazing in graphics and very creative. BUT as for the VIP membership, it's totally absurd that we have to pay $9.99 plus taxes monthly. I would be fine with it if it was $9.99 a year. Hope that this will change some day. I love playing this game. I play this EVERYDAY, even more than any other games. Please consider about changing the membership fee to yearly rather than monthly.

the game does too many resets, all on its own. i can be in the middle of a game, and the game will stop in mid-stream, then start a new game, and causing me to lose not only what i have "won", but will set me all the way back to the bronze box, or, in the case of special games, such as the winter sports 2018, back to the red box, when i actually finished and won the silver medal. the game can be veeerrrrryyyy slooooooooow, and often is. i enjoy the show when i get a chance to watch it, but am not so sure about the game. it would also be nice if there were instructions on how to play the features that are *not* in the tv show...

Decent amount of ads.  I sometimes have an issue where it suddenly stops accepting input. The game doesn't freeze, just can't do anything. I've tried going to home screen and back and even turning my screen off and back on, nothing works.  Have to force close it. :(  this happens maybe 1 out of every 7 or 8 times I play.  Samsung note 8.   A "live" or else "play with a friend" type of feature would be cool.

The game constantly freezes up causing your time to run out, costs you bonus rounds along with the "prize box" that is awarded for solving the bonus round. You also loose your progression from bronze to silver level boxes and so on, for completing consecutive bonus puzzles. Adds are continuous and are data hogs. Nothing worthwhile in its current state.

Extremely laggy, ads do not always close, and the game freezes or closes itself very often. It almost exclusively does that while in a game, so you automatically lose. The inbox always says there's 1 more message than there actually is. And sometimes hitting "play" closes the app instead of starting a game. Complete waste of time.

comments: I'm sure this is a fun game, however I do not see the reason why it needs to have permission to manage my phone calls or know my location if I never plan to use any online abilities. That is just too much access to my phone. I did not even get a chance to play the game because it wanted that access on start up; it will not allow you to play the game without give permission.

It's a great strategic game. PvP is more event driven rather than a free for all.Great value for the money you spend whether it's a little or a lot...and the purchases give a little free to your team. Lots of ways to win free stuff and points you can spend on items needed in alliance store and keep up with your wallet warrior team mate. One downside is the support..they can be a little sliw in response time to problems. But they don't just ignore you either.

Why does this app request access to make calls/read sms/messages? Un-installed right away.  Edit: That's not how it works. Just because you say "your phone is safe" doesn't make it safe. You're still getting the permission from un-educated users that you can read their messages. That's very shady.

Stuff stuff goody good good forensic anthropology your pizza up your potato juice ham sandwich with homework for your face mouth nose elbow skin football Olympic gold karrot. Tough to install, took me about 5 ham sandwiches until this thing fuannlay installed. This piece of shananagins went down a water stream faster than your baby TV

I love this game,  but its money spender game yet what game isnt?  Their support help you in pretty good time most of the time it takes 24 hours but sometime sooner or little later, they add new cool fetures, they do fail to fix some minor things but for the most part it works perfect. One time we had enemy kingdom on our leader boards after KvK they fixed it in less then 1 hour that some great work if you ask me.

The tournament of kingdom was really unfair, yesterday most of our kingdom cannot access their account, we keep contacting support to fix it but no answer,and then today is kill event of kingdom tournament, they fix the problem while were in the middle of war, they didnt even send notification that castles can open already, they didnt even either put shield for few hours, so what happen was 200players of our kingdom got zeroed, now they will retire, they are spenders but they dont want to spend again after got zeroed... Wrong move rok, youre loosing players cause you cannot improve your system errors...
description: Our brand new hero system is just around the corner! In the ever turbulent land of ROK war is here, there... everywhere. People are suffering from war and pain. In these, the most crucial of times, a group of heroes must rise up! They are a group of the most gifted people and the most magical of creatures coming! With their tremendous talent, they will turn the tide in battle or play a pivotal role in your Castle development. Choose the heroes you yearn for in the new update, and have them join the fight against you enemies!  The Great Dragon casts his shadow across the land...In Rise of the Kings, players from all over the world battle to rule this new epic real time strategy game online. Utilizing the best of theRTS, RPG, and MMO gaming genres, take your place in this epic war game as one of many Lords fighting for survival in a hostile fantasy world. In this army game you hold the fate of your kingdom, your army, and yourself firmly in your hands. Tap and install this mobile game to train an army to clash with evil in the best online empire game available! Rally your friends and engage in epic clashes against determined enemies and fearsome foes. Utilize clever strategy, superior leadership, and cunning diplomacy, to rise to the top and claim the crown and the throne. Download this top fantasy RTS MMO today on your phone or tablet and begin playing online with players from around the world! Amass Your Army - Gather friends, old and new, and form a top Alliance to conquer the best new war strategy game available. - Build your empire and train an army, then lead them in PVP war against friends, new and old! - Train your army, lead them into battle, and crush your enemies.Explore the Wild Lands! - Stalk the monster clans roaming the lands and dungeons, and kill them to sharpen your skills and claim their treasure. - Explore the dark dungeons inside the Ruins of the old Kings, and face down the Dark Guards to uncover the riches of the ancients. A King will Rise - If you love PvP challenges, then prove your mettle against the best Lords in the Realm. - Grow faster, build faster, train faster, and then put it all on the line against the terrifying Orcs, the ghastly Grimm Raider Clan, and more as you clash with other ambitious Lords. - Do you have what it takes to Rise and become King? Shoot us a message at servicerok@onemt.com with any questions or comments relating to this wicked multiplayer strategy war game. Ask us anything! Also, connect with Rise of the Kings and friends:https://www.facebook.com/RiseoftheKings

comments: Play this game if you have all kinds of money and just want to pay to win. There is little fun to be had outside of that.  Update: the developers listened to feedback and have been adding numerous ways to get advantages for free. Here is some respect for listening to your users. Rating increased!

This game is for people who want to spend literally ¬£1000's otherwise your just being constantly attacked, wiped out and then you have to spend weeks/months trying to get back to where you were or maybe a little further. They should make it a little more equal for all. Shame really as the game itself has so much promise.

I enjoy the game a lot. It is pay to win in every sense of the word though. My problem is customer service is the worst. Takes 5 or 6 days to respond to help requests if they do at all. Good game, worst customer service possible.

I overall enjoy the game.  I did the tavern and did a volley for rewards. It showed I won one thing and it gave me another. I took a screen shot of it, sent it to customer service to be compensated.  They say, sorry it was a display error you got the correct rewards. Ummm, no I didn't! It showed I won a valor stone and they gave me a champion stone.  I even had the screen shots to prove it!!  Very unhappy with it and the customer service.  It's not my fault the game glitched, and I should be compensated with what it showed I won. It is NOT my fault the game had a display error.  I have spent money on this game ( more than I will admit) but after the way this was handled,  I will not spend another dime.  Although they probably don't care, as they have shown me already, it is just very disappointing. The way they treat the folks that put the money in their pockets....

I maintain my stance that this game is pay to win. Peaceful, nonpaying lords are punished harshly by higher level lords that just teleport next to you and raid your city until you have nothing left. This problem has been made even worse with the killing event. It lasts 4 whole days and invites so much violence and destruction that small peaceful cities are completely set back to square one by larger more powerful lords. I appreciated the hours I spent into this game, but I cannot support what the developers are doing at this time.
Addictive strategy game but again if you want to be strong you have to spend a fortune otherwise you would be crushed. Some roomers about cheating codes I heard from other players.

description: Deciding how to randomize students in a class is not that easy! All students want to do is hang with their friends, and that's not good for students as they don't interact with any new colleagues.Don't worry, Eco Tag is here to help! Just get students to download Eco Tag (it's free!), print out these augmented reality tags (https://arludo.com/tags/ecotag.pdf), give each student one tag and let the students figure it out!Students will need to scan their own tag to find out which ecosystem they're in and will then need to find the students that belong in their ecosystem.It's a fun way for students to break the ice and create a group if they've never met. Along with having fun and meeting their classmates, students also learn about ecosystems and how different organisms interact. Don't believe us? then download Eco Tag and give it a try!By using all the tags, you can accommodate a class of 30 students and put them in a group of 6 students each (that's five groups!) Need more? Then print out some more tags and add some doubles.Want a group of 3? Then let them find their group of 6 and ask students to group themselves by producers and consumers.Want a group of four? Hand out four tags from each ecosystem and then ask students to guess which organisms are missing and see if they can find their matches in the leftover tags.Eco Tag is a flexible app that allows students to have fun creating a group while learning a little about ecosystems.keywords: Eco Tag, ecosystem, producer, primary consumer, secondary consumer
descriptionHTML:
Deciding how to randomize students in a class is not that easy! All students want to do is hang with their friends, and that's not good for students as they don't interact with any new colleagues.

Don't worry, Eco Tag is here to help!
Just get students to download Eco Tag (it's free!), print out these augmented reality tags (https://arludo.com/tags/ecotag.pdf), give each student one tag and let the students figure it out!

Students will need to scan their own tag to find out which ecosystem they're in and will then need to find the students that belong in their ecosystem.

It's a fun way for students to break the ice and create a group if they've never met. Along with having fun and meeting their classmates, students also learn about ecosystems and how different organisms interact.

Don't believe us? then download Eco Tag and give it a try!

By using all the tags, you can accommodate a class of 30 students and put them in a group of 6 students each (that's five groups!) Need more? Then print out some more tags and add some doubles.

Want a group of 3? Then let them find their group of 6 and ask students to group themselves by producers and consumers.

Want a group of four? Hand out four tags from each ecosystem and then ask students to guess which organisms are missing and see if they can find their matches in the leftover tags.

Eco Tag is a flexible app that allows students to have fun creating a group while learning a little about ecosystems.

keywords: Eco Tag, ecosystem, producer, primary consumer, secondary consumer
summary: Eco Tag - Helping teachers separate students into groups since 2017
title: Eco Tag

Block Puzzle is a classic puzzle game in which you arrange blocks of wood into a fixed square. The block wood puzzle game offer a great intellectual challenge for you. You will have to use your intelligence to arrange them in the most reasonable way.

How to start playing a block bricks game?
⇒ Select and drag the blocks in the bottom row. Move them to the optional position in the large square
⇒ Arrange to fill each row of the square
⇒ Each filled row will automatically disappear. You will have more space to arrange the next blocks
⇒ The block jewel games will end when the bricks block can't be grafted to the correct place in the square.

descriptionHTML:
You were handcuffed and sent to a high security prison for a crime that you didn't commit. In prison that sort's a sprawling labyrinth of gangsters, murders, lowlifes, drug dealers and thieves you have to find way out, and maybe then you'll get a chance to prove your innocence. With no friends among his fellow inmates, you must rely only on yourself.

Solve the puzzles, discover the hidden objects, manipulate the prisoners and guards, use your skills, do whatever it takes, and become an inmate who destined to escape..

↗ An addictive prison escape game!
↗ Solve the puzzles and use your skills to escape!
↗ Manipulate the prisoners and guards!
↗ Gorgeous graphics and different themed rooms!
↗ Addicting mini puzzles!
↗ Do whatever it takes to escape!
↗ Escape from maximum security prison!
↗ Easy and fun to play!

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/amphibiusgames/
summary: Become an inmate who destined to escape..
title: Prison Break: The Great Escape

Um, Its a cute game. It is an.okay game to play. But certain thing can be change. When its festival time you can only play one task at a time. I think that stupid because sometimes you don't have all the ingredients or spices for a task you have chosen, but you ended up having other ingredients for another task. But the only way , you can choose that other task if you quit your current one in which you have work hard and also you loose 50 diamond's for that. Not fair because diamonds are not easy to find. There a lot more i dislike about it. I only play because its a distraction sometimes. A lot of people has left playing the game and i can see why Because at times,  it can be very boring. But there's a lot of things i think can be improved.

When I started playing this GAME it was fun and I enjoyed. But this GAME is becoming not so fun anymore. I didn't mind spending a little bit of real money on It, but it has started to become a rather expensive game. Why on earth would you change the festival gameplay.  I am finding this game has actually become stressful and expensive rather than fun and relaxing

When u feel like playing a relaxing game that's not so intense this game is perfect. There are waiters doing it for u and all u have to do is install coffee machines and talk to your customers. Personally to some people this game might be boring but I really love it

I think this is a great game in general, good graphics and gameplay. However I always have difficulties trying to purchase the gifts, like it will take very long to process the transaction. Is the developer able to do anything about it? It will be greatly appreciated.

I would give this game five stars, but I was on level 8, going at a good pace, and the game restarted, taking me back to the start of level 7! Completely frustrated with this. Made all that time I spent on getting to the next level worthless.

descriptionHTML:
My Cafe is an addictive bakery & restaurant story game where you set off to help chef Ann open a classy cafe and serve her guests delicious drinks and baked goods.

The first episodes of your coffee shop adventure begins as you set off to a quiet town and open your own classy cafe with your friend Ann! Serve coffee, cook bakery goods and immerse yourself in an addictive kitchen & restaurant simulator that’s brimming with exciting tales and stories.

Download My Cafe: Recipes & Stories and tell your cooking story!

Exciting features in this restaurant simulator lets you:
★ Build and scramble a diner, pizza bakery, or restaurant – hire staff, buy furniture, improve the kitchen and set prices on the menu.
★ Design your coffee shop with tons of glamorous decorative items – After all, comfort is in the details! Be the brightest café on the street.
★ Discover baking and cooking, including special food and drinks like the Sweet Tales Latte, the Mojito Cupcake, and more. Feel the cooking fever in our eating game!
★ Develop your own business strategy and management take big risks or go for slow to ensure you make a profit and thrive in Cafeland game.
★ Bring your restaurant to life with impactful stories and colorful customers for kids and adults. Gossip with regulars and choose your own responses to influence the direction of the story, and make new friends in your neighborhood. Each story is unique in My Cafe: Recipes & Stories!

Features:

My Restaurant, My Cafe Story
• Story mode with unique characters and meaningful relationships. Learn the stories of your regulars, influence their gossip life, make new friends and experience your own Kitchen Craze restaurant adventure in this nice life simulator.

Cafe Treats & Bakery Sweets
• Coffee mania, fast food, dinners, desserts and hot drinks for cafe fans of pizza games from crazy kitchen!
• Bakery treats and restaurant eats!
• Special baking and cooking recipes like the Sweet Tales Latte, the Mojito Cupcake!

Restaurant Mania & Cafe Simulator
• Design your own coffee shop with over 900 decorative items
• Make a business paradise at your cafe by taking big risks or going slow and steady.
• Manage restaurant staff, hire, train and fire your employees in our making food game

Customized Cafe & Bakery Story - Gossip & Intrigue Abound
• Coffee shop gossip goes a long way! Investigate the town’s story, see how characters fall in love, make their choices and discover secrets the whole cartoon city wants to know!

Play with friends
Go social – see how your Facebook friends are running their own coffee shops and townships in your favorite game!

My Cafe: Recipes & Stories is the restaurant story of a lifetime inside a casual game! Gossip with cafe guests and meet new friends in a story mode so deliciously addictive for girls, you’ll never want to put it down! Become a happy world chef and build your bakery, sushi cafe, diner or restaurant with cooking dash to make the best dishes and drinks in a story game that lets you play your way, choose your story and start a true!

However, some in-game items can be purchased for real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

My Cafe: Recipes & Stories is FREE to download and play with no obligations to pay.

Note:
An internet connection is required to play our cooking game

SUPPORT
Chef, are you having a problem with the game? Please contact us by going to the game Settings > FAQ or visit https://goo.gl/Bw6QVb.
Our support service: http://melesta.freshdesk.com/support/tickets/new

Play the best episode of games with your friends, including friends from Facebook, and bring your exciting restaurant story to life in the exciting new business simulator My Cafe: Recipes & Stories. Join in the fun!

Time management games fans from all over the world have already started their restaurant story.

How to develop your coffee shop and choose your own story:
Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/MyCafeGame
summary: Cooking, Design & Cafe Management - all with a fun story! Own a Restaurant ‚òï‚òï
title: My Cafe: Recipes & Stories - World Cooking Game

description: Get ready for impossible bike stunts with crazy tracks challenges!Enjoy the most thrilling bike games adventures of impossible bike stunts ride in the middle of the sky on dangerous tracks. This sky high game offers freestyle stunts that include ramp jumps, air stunt, sky roll, backward flip,  high jump as a stunt driver on impossible paths to reach the finish point. Race your motorbike through each tricky level to reach your goal. Feel like a racer in this amazing simulation. If you want to participate in this racing you have to choose your favorite motorbike before to starts the race. Every level is different from previous one and a little bit tough to finish the level. Complete your mission or you may lose and will have to start the mission again. You have to accept different stunt challenges to complete the levels. By completing the challenging missions, you will also unlock many different amazing vehicles. Smooth and realistic bike games controls have been designed to make you feel the real racer. To control your motorbike, the controls are given on your screen. Fast speed may not always be required at some hurdles you need to be slow down by applying brakes button. Avoid fall off the dangerous track and ride carefully to cross obstacles and narrow tracks.It‚Äôs time to show your real crazy stunt ride by riding your bike on dangerous tracks. Can you beat all of the extreme levels in this stunt bike games ? So, this is a time to prove yourself by clicking the download button of impossible bike stunts game.Game Feature:- Real life motorbiking experience.- Simple and easy graphics.- Different camera angles make it more thrilling!- Multiple challenging levels.- Smooth and easy controls to make your race easy.- Lots of vehicles with unique upgrades.
