description: Play the super fun bubble popper game! Pop bubbles and explore thousands of awesome levels filled with seriously amazing boosts, power-ups, and features. This cool game is simply ideal for your Tablet or Android device. Step into a world of sheer amusement, clear the board of all the colorful bubbles and crush your way up to the top. Match, hit and blast bubbles to reach the level target and win levels! The amazing 2 Pop Bubbles game features 1000+ of puzzle levels, highly addictive gameplay, and cool graphics and effects. PLAY AND ENJOY!- Plenty of unique levels packed with awesome challenges.- Fun puzzles and brain teasers to keep you engaged for hours!- Use awesome power-ups to complete missions and win levels.- Captivating gameplay.- Completely FREE-to-play!-  Work your way through the bubble packed challenges and reach high scores. - Bubble swap is free, just tap on your bubble to change its color.- Awesome graphics and effects.Boost your gaming experience with cool power-ups that will create big explosions and clear a path to victory:- Make 7 shots in a row to earn a fireball that will burn up bubbles on the way.- Drop 10 bubbles or more and get a bomb that will take out surrounding bubbles.Enjoy hundreds of challenging levels in this awesome game. descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Fun Kid Racing - Motocross, one of the best free racing games where you speed to the finish line in a bike race. Prepare yourself for a physics-based motorcycle racing experience - Jump on the seat, learn some awesome bike moves, and have fun.
One of the best simulator games is just a click away!

You deserve the Best!
Unlike other physics based race games, Fun Kid Racing - Motocross was developed specifically for simple but fun and exciting gameplay, so you will make the most from your racing games experience. All of our free race games are packed with intuitive and easy game controls – you can play with just one finger, making it easier than ever to play this motorcycle game and have fun. This game can be played by grandparents, adults or even kids. We suggest playing this game and inviting your kids to watch how you play. This race game contains family friendly visual and audial racing game elements that will provide you with the best online gaming experience.

Endless Fun
Sometimes, finding fun racing games for free can be a daunting task, but no worries! With Fun Kid Racing - Motocross you will get one of the most fun games to play online! In this fun race game, you will be able to perform realistic moves while driving and your offroad bike will mimic real physical movements (most of the time). Control your off-road bike riding with just one finger and see how it flips, jumps and rolls on its way. You will love all the surprises packed in each level in one of the most fun motorcycle racing games online.

Never loose - Always improve
Fun Kid Racing - Motocross, One of the best motocross games designed in a way so it’s almost impossible to lose – That way you are always a winner. This physics-based dirt bike racing simulator has the potential to enhance your skills including problem solving, quick decision making, creativity and flexible thinking, fine-motor and working-memory skills, self-control, and hand-eye coordination. Don’t settle for lousy driving simulator games, go for the BEST!

Join our community of 10 Million players worldwide and enjoy these amazing features:

• One finger control

• Choose your favorite bike and color
• Family Friendly – everyone can play!
• Realistic moves – based on real physics
• Bike stunts – Backflips, frontflips, and more
• 5 Racing Worlds - Original, Police, Jungle, Safari, Snow
• Weekly surprises – Unlock random world for a limited time!


Join the ride!

descriptionHTML:
Guess the name of the singer is a special game for all fans and passionate about music because in this game you will have to guess the name of all the most famous and acclaimed singers of all time.

With guess the name of the singer you have hours of absolute fun assured trying to memorize the name of the singers that are presented to you at each respective level.

Each level contains a popular singer and recognized worldwide of different musical genres. Among the singers featured in this game are:
- Miley Cirus
- Justin Bieber
- Marc Anthony
- Sam Smith
- Bruno Mars
And many others!

Whats the game about?
During each level appears an image of the artist that must be recognized and immediately write its name; In this way they are completing all the levels until arriving at the final level.

The game also has reward systems, communications and the possibility to ask for help to your family and friends or use special powers to complete levels in which there is some difficulty.

How to play?
Below each image will appear a series of letters with a random order with which you have to properly form the name of the singer without mistake. If you hit it automatically you go to the next level and receive different rewards.

Be the first to complete all levels and show your friends that you really are a fan of the singers!
developerAddress: Parque el maestro zona las cuadras cochabamba
summary: Have fun Guessing the names of the most famous singers in history!
title: Guess the singer

comments: It is fun and challenging I find myself returning to play constantly to reach another level and build my team I love my mercs. I like having to find the materials too. Often going back to previous levels needing three stars for best advantage. Only problem I have is with cloud save I can't log in successfully and you must exit game to save data to your phone leave any other way all current data is gone. lOVE the game Good job.

The only way i would give this game 5 stars if there was an option to walk around instead of pressing an arrow to jump from cover to cover that ends up breaking cause your enemy's keep shooting at it. You bring all these amazing features but you take away the most important feature in any shooting game: walking around and taking cover where you like.

Well executed game.  Items are there only for quick power freaks.  Looking forward to seeing the add one for the game.   PS- The English in the game isn't great and could use improvement.  It doesn't affect gameplay,  just a bit nerve wracking,  üòâ

You'll know right away if the game is bad just by reading the dialogues. If the English is bad, chances are the game is bad too. I have proven this many times already, and I know many other players have too.

Its not a bad game, its actually just like the rest of the shooters on google play, which is point and shoot type of games like Zombie Frontier. I bet this game would be a lot more fun if you could walk around instead of just sitting In one place which is my only complaint. But otherwise overall this game is rather a bit fun if you are looking for a time killer.

Genuinely terrible. Game looks like garbage, the English translation is horrendous, and the gameplay is a much less polished version of games such as KillShot. Galling screenshots lie about the actual fidelity of the game.

comments: Freedoom is the best DOOM clone, that is available on Android (and possibly iOS)! I absolutely adore this game! Odd controls, however, you may configure your controls, and place the buttons where ever you feel comfortable placing your fingers.  This game has so much originality being a DOOM clone. Cool weapons, mysterious locations, bad@$$ enemies, and amazing music!  Definetly give this game a try!  Freedoom: 8.5/10 EXO 4/5 EXO  Love it!

I find Freedoom to be one of the best doom clones to play, and it even comes with a sequel! What's also great is that you can use other WAD files to play more levels or custom doom stuff like brutal doom and even the original doom! The controls are simple and feel great as well. One of the best and underrated DOOM apps of all time in the play store

I've been waiting a long time for a game like this. It delivers very well. Had to turn down the sensitivity for mobile play, but I'm sure I'll get used to it. I love how there are options to make it more like the original game. Very well done, guys.
Have to get used to it if ur not an old-school gamer. Never really played doom but I still got into it.

Whoa man this is awesome. I just randomly had this pop up in recommended games on the main screen of the play store. This is a special treat made for us by the developer. Seriously. I mean, I would pay for this. But it's completely free! Just perfect really. I'm playing on the  Note 8 and it's smooth. Better than original doom when it comes to aiming. You can actually look up and down in this remake.
It should be modded so you can use touch controls! Edit: The game does have touch controls, my mistake! I love that I can play doom on my phone
description: Why Freedoom?While the game engine for everyone's favorite game from 1993 and its many spinoffs are open-sourced, most of its "assets" such as textures, sounds, and game levels are copyrighted and not legal to redistribute. The Freedoom project offers an alternative set of assets and game levels that are entirely original, open source, and can be used with most engines of said 1993 game. In addition, Freedoom is compatible with most of the vast library of fan-made "WADs" (i.e. game levels) as indexed in the idgames archive.This app is a fork of nvllsvm's GZDoom-Android port. My idea for this fork was to bundle this app with the open source Freedoom (freedoom1.wad and freedoom2.wad) assets to publish a completely open source android game running on the GZDoom engine. I hope this "bundling" will allow it to reach a more diverse audience of users whom either don't own the OG awesome 1993 game or are averse to having to find and copy their legally-owned game resource files onto their phones.Most custom wads can be played by:1.  placing them under Freedoom/config/wads2. Selecting the desired wad from the main screen by pressing "Addons", "WADS", then your desired wad3. hit "OK", then select the main game resource file to use (usually freedoom2.wad)4. hit "Launch"5. start a "new game" as usual, but you will go to custom level instead of the normal first level of the game6. (alternate) some levels replace other maps than the first one in the game and may require use of a warp command or special launch argument to get to itFull game mods should be placed in Freedoom/config/modsDISCLAIMERThis project is not affiliated with Id Software or parent companies, Bethesda, or any relevant publishing companies.More info:https://github.com/mkrupczak3/GZDoom-Androidhttps://freedoom.github.io/index.html
descriptionHTML:
Why Freedoom?

While the game engine for everyone's favorite game from 1993 and its many spinoffs are open-sourced, most of its "assets" such as textures, sounds, and game levels are copyrighted and not legal to redistribute. The Freedoom project offers an alternative set of assets and game levels that are entirely original, open source, and can be used with most engines of said 1993 game. In addition, Freedoom is compatible with most of the vast library of fan-made "WADs" (i.e. game levels) as indexed in the idgames archive.

This app is a fork of nvllsvm's GZDoom-Android port. My idea for this fork was to bundle this app with the open source Freedoom (freedoom1.wad and freedoom2.wad) assets to publish a completely open source android game running on the GZDoom engine. I hope this "bundling" will allow it to reach a more diverse audience of users whom either don't own the OG awesome 1993 game or are averse to having to find and copy their legally-owned game resource files onto their phones.

Most custom wads can be played by:
1. placing them under Freedoom/config/wads
2. Selecting the desired wad from the main screen by pressing "Addons", "WADS", then your desired wad
3. hit "OK", then select the main game resource file to use (usually freedoom2.wad)
4. hit "Launch"
5. start a "new game" as usual, but you will go to custom level instead of the normal first level of the game
6. (alternate) some levels replace other maps than the first one in the game and may require use of a warp command or special launch argument to get to it

Full game mods should be placed in Freedoom/config/mods

DISCLAIMER

This project is not affiliated with Id Software or parent companies, Bethesda, or any relevant publishing companies.

More info:
https://github.com/mkrupczak3/GZDoom-Android
https://freedoom.github.io/index.html
recentChanges: App now automatically creates folder Freedoom/config/mods to make it easier to install full game mods (IWADS)
Most individual level(s) (most WADS) should still be placed in Freedoom/config/wads
summary: A free and open source game on the GZDoom engine
title: Freedoom

Okay. I love this game. I don't know HOW it became so addicting, but it did. One of my fave features is that if your character crashes, you can drag him around and have fun with it. I also love the awesome tricks you can do. My favorite trick has got to be the Superman Seat Grab. It just looks SO cool. The other two long tricks, Freefall and Special Flip, those ones are epic as well. Nice job, creators, nice job. (P.S. I recommend dis game)

Awesome game if you love mtb I just beat the game with 3 stars on every level. It should acknowledge when you beat every level or when you complete 3 stars on every level. Should be more jerseys, helmets, more levels etc. Should have a profile online and really keep evolving. High score log etc for fastest runs or best tricks and competing against others online would be great additions too

Finally got an answer I had to download the game again when I changed devices. Then the restore purchase button was inactive so I had to pay AGAIN to remove ads and the ads are still there. I have since upgraded my phone and yet again (3rd time now) I am being required to pay again. Now that I have got s response I wait to see it they will activate it.

Grafics and controls are great... gets 3 stars as its impossible to complete further levels without Boosts! But there is no way to earn boosts! Unless you Pay for them..... Why advertise it as "free" if it cannot be completed without spending money..... not very "free" really is it??....

This game is just awesome! It may take some time to get use to the controls, but its a fun game! I think it needs a little something though. Like when I'm doing backflips, its hard to stop when I'm close the ground. Other than that, this is one of the best BMX game I've ever played!!
description: Downhill mountain bike racing like never before. Race down beautiful trails, smashing over rocks and roots, boosting huge jumps, scoring insane trick combos, unlocking better bikes and gear for bragging rights as the King of the Mountain!The best mobile bike game, Bike Mayhem Extreme Mountain Racing! Compete in timed races or freestyle trick events on 19 different mountains and over 100 trails inspired by real world locations.Unlock over 80 items of gear to add style your rider and tune your bike for speed, agility, strength, and energy for each trail.Experience realistic physics and plush bike suspension as your bike eats up the rough stuff and softens the landings of big jumps and drops. High speeds and big jumps means huge crashes where your rider will ragdoll tumble down the trail. Use your finger to pick up you rider throw him even further.Share your races with your friends. Challenge them to beat your times! Brought to you by the makers of the epically popular Motocross racing game: Moto X Mayhem, which reached #1 Paid App worldwide and was a Top 5 Racing game for over a year! FEATURES: - 100+ Beautiful mountain trails for all styles of riding- 80+ Gear items for your rider and MTB bike - Frame and wheel upgrades that impact game play- Epic bike crashes, fun rag doll physics and active bike suspension- Tricks, bunny hops and flips! - Addictive gameplay - Powerful online leaderboardsTIPS: - If you use check points, you will get a maximum of one star. Stay on your bike to achieve 3 stars! - Lean to add flips into your trick combo. - Wheelie into and out of a jump to add to your trick combo.- Hold down the pump/hop button when entering a downhill section to get a boost in speed.- Wheelies do not drain your energy- The timer doesn't start until you start to pedal the bike or brake! - Use your finger to grab the rider and toss him around the map when you're on or off the bike. - Make sure you pick the right frame and wheel combination to get the best score for each trail.-Use boosters to help you through a difficult trail or to get the top position on the leaderboard.See a video of this crazy action packed mountain bike game at: http://www.youtube.com/BestFreeGamesIncFollow us @facebook.com/bikemayhemtwitter.com/BestFreeGamesCo
descriptionHTML:
Downhill mountain bike racing like never before. Race down beautiful trails, smashing over rocks and roots, boosting huge jumps, scoring insane trick combos, unlocking better bikes and gear for bragging rights as the King of the Mountain!

The best mobile bike game, Bike Mayhem Extreme Mountain Racing!

Compete in timed races or freestyle trick events on 19 different mountains and over 100 trails inspired by real world locations.

Unlock over 80 items of gear to add style your rider and tune your bike for speed, agility, strength, and energy for each trail.

Experience realistic physics and plush bike suspension as your bike eats up the rough stuff and softens the landings of big jumps and drops.
High speeds and big jumps means huge crashes where your rider will ragdoll tumble down the trail. Use your finger to pick up you rider throw him even further.

Share your races with your friends. Challenge them to beat your times!

Brought to you by the makers of the epically popular Motocross racing game: Moto X Mayhem, which reached #1 Paid App worldwide and was a Top 5 Racing game for over a year!

FEATURES:

- 100+ Beautiful mountain trails for all styles of riding
- 80+ Gear items for your rider and MTB bike
- Frame and wheel upgrades that impact game play
- Epic bike crashes, fun rag doll physics and active bike suspension
- Tricks, bunny hops and flips!
- Addictive gameplay
- Powerful online leaderboards

TIPS:

- If you use check points, you will get a maximum of one star. Stay on your bike to achieve 3 stars!
- Lean to add flips into your trick combo.
- Wheelie into and out of a jump to add to your trick combo.
- Hold down the pump/hop button when entering a downhill section to get a boost in speed.
- Wheelies do not drain your energy
- The timer doesn't start until you start to pedal the bike or brake!
- Use your finger to grab the rider and toss him around the map when you're on or off the bike.
- Make sure you pick the right frame and wheel combination to get the best score for each trail.
-Use boosters to help you through a difficult trail or to get the top position on the leaderboard.


See a video of this crazy action packed mountain bike game at: http://www.youtube.com/BestFreeGamesInc

Follow us @
facebook.com/bikemayhem
twitter.com/BestFreeGamesCo

202 515 West Pender Street,
Vancouver, BC,
Canada, V6B 6H5

title: Bike Mayhem Free

comments: Maybe add an option to disable some graphics. Like the fimish animation. It does not add much to the game experience but it affects the performance quite a bit.  About the ads: I have premium, and I only have to watch an ad if I choose to get a reward in return. There are no sudde, unwanted or random ads anymore.

Simple game. Ads galore. Also when ads pop up better not be listening to music because it's gonna pause your music even if the ad has 0 sound. Thus the one star rating. You can advertise all you want but don't interrupt any background apps to force me to look at your ad. That's just messed up.

Not the most challenging game but its okay if you need something to do on the toilet. Unfortunately there is only ONE menu to open for the entire game and every time you click on it you are forced to watch an advert. EVERY TIME!!! i wouldnt give this game 5 stars in a hurry but the constant bombardment of adverts kills what would otherwise be a far mkre decent game.  Side note: yes i know there is a premium version which is basically the same game but without ads. This isnt a game i would spend money on and definately not (at least to me) worth killing with adverts.

First of all the game it self is a great little game. Graphics are fine game play is simple and easy to pick up it's a good game. Now for the reason it only gets two stars. WAY TO MANY ADS! I mean for f@$k sake every two seconds there's an ad. Click on the car buying button there's an ad. Sit there to long there's an ad. I understand this is how you make your money but come on there's a line and you didn't just cross it you swan dived over that bad boy. I'm sorry but I do not recommended this game for anyone.

Potential to be a great game but wayyyy to many ads, like every 10 seconds of gameplay there's a 30 second ad, and when you choose to watch an ad to get a reward you never actually get it. Waste of time. No idol earnings so you have to have the app open to advance and forces you to watch more ads.i get you want to make money but this app is basically unplayable.

Not had too much of a problem with ads, but that might be because my game doesn't progress after dragging the car onto the race track.  Just keeps going in circles, and won't allow me to remove it after track, no matter if its gone pass finish line or not.

description: Prepare yourself for a battle unlike any other when you enter the 3D world of Rescue Robots Survival Games. Constant challenges await you in this fast-paced game where you must overcome every obstacle and overpower every enemy in your quest to dominate the playing field. Unlock an arsenal of powerful army-grade weapons as you progress. Use your ammo wisely and take care of your health as an onslaught of enemies are poised to strike around every corner. It is up to you to save the blocky universe from a mass invasion.After the nations outlaw nuclear, biological and chemical weapons, the military develops a new way to obliterate enemies: thousand-foot robots. The mechanical marvels work wonders, until it becomes discovered that these automatons can use raw materials from the world around them to build duplicates of themselves. Suddenly these robots where were once allies, have turned on the humans and now a new war rages. The government has called upon their every reserve and still these new enemies have refused defeat, wreaking havoc on the cities of the world.You are the world's last hope‚Äì you, the engineer who brought these monsters to life. Only you know the secret to triumph over these deadly droids. Avenging your fallen comrades, you embark on an epic journey to protect your planet from these foes and the take-over they plot. This will be no easy task, it will take all of your skills, lightning fast reflexes and quick thinking to battle your way to victory. Expect hard hitting fights and double the action as you tear through waves of enemy bots in this addictive combination running and action-shooting combat game where survival is everything. Prepare yourself, this FPS showdown is about to begin.

descriptionHTML:
Become a horse owner in our new animal simulator! Raise and groom an entire horse herd on your farm and see if it fits for survival in the wild. Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator if full of animals adventures and funny stuff to do with your horse herd!

Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator features:

>YOUR OWN HORSE HERD - create a unique horse, make a family and raise foals

>REALISTIC ANIMAL CARE - wash and feed your horse and foal, to keep them happy

>OPEN WORLD ADVENURES - explore big world, meet humans, wild animals and other horses

>LOTS OF ACTIVITES - complete quests, take part in horse racing and do other stuff

Customize a horse!
You can choose breed, color, gender and name for your horse, and try to take care of a horse you create! And after that complete quests and fight enemies to make your horse and herd stronger in the animal simulator. A horse herd life is fascinating, experience it in our animal simulator!

Take care of a herd!
Once your horse strong enough, you can star a herd and explore the world together - horse is a herding animal! Groom your foals, level up your horse herd to make a bigger herd in the animal simulator. And don’t forget to wash, feed and play with your horse!

Explore open world!
There’s a lot to do in the animals life simulator, so explore the world with your herd! Interesting quests, wild animals and picturesque locations are waiting - explore the world of the simulator with your horse herd and find them all!

Try living with a horse herd in Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator - a captivating animals life simulator!
summary: Welcome to a farm where you can play with your own herd in a Horse Stable!

comments: It's like having an Axolotl, but on your phone! It's extremely hard to find one around where I live, so I guess this is the closest one I could get for now? I love Axolotls and I dream of getting my own smiling water-walker. They're so cute! Thank you for making this app I love it. But try to make more options in communicating with the little dude. And I like the idea of scrubbing the screens instead of pushing a button. Something that will make it not too button-pressy-game thingy?

The game is cute. Very straightforward and not at all time consuming but relaxing to check in every  once in a while. I loved visiting my Axolotl every day. Mine grew up to almost 9 cm! Unfortunalely, I didn't  check in for a few days. I checked every day until suddenly I forgot. Poor Lottie is gone now but I'm going to do my best to be a good virtual Axolotl owner this time!! The only thing I would like differently is I'd like more interactions with the axolotl and to be able to zoom in. Anyways, its an overall lovely game. Simple but sweet.

I was very excited when I saw this as a love an axlotle but although he is very cute there is just not enough interaction. You can only have one and you can name him but he only needs fed and cleaned every 4 days. You can't decorate the aquarium and, as I mentioned, you can't get any friends for him. It has potential but there needs to be more interaction and an ability to personalise the environment.

AMAZING AND SUPER CUTE! Doesn't take up alot of storage. I think it needs more interactions but that's is! Also could you add a feature to get another pet after your original has been alive for a certain amount of days because they look lonely.

Cute and fun, even if it's not 100% realistic. The axolotl doesn't do much, but neither does a real one. It would be nice if you could change the tank decor and choose different colors of axolotl (or even have a random color when you get a new one). I like that it doesn't require as much care as a real axolotl, who wants a game on their phone to be that much work? I'm also curious to see how big it will get. Real axolotls can get to 30cm or more, but at just under 7cm my virtual one already takes up most of the screen space. All in all I like the app.

I think that you definitely need more things to do. It would be great if you could do more things and maybe get more Axolotl! THEY MUST BE SO LONELY! I also think that it should let u personalise the tank and maybe make it so u can design your Axolotl! Other than that it is a EPIC game. (Will rake 5 star if u do) ;-)
description: Over one million downloads worldwide!Introducing the „ÄåAxolotl„Äç to this already popular game!  FREE DOWNLOAD! descriptionHTML:
Over one million downloads worldwide!
Introducing the 「Axolotl」 to this already popular game! FREE DOWNLOAD! It's real easy to raise your own pet in this game!!

■Raise your own Axolotl on your smartphone.
■Watch how cute your Axolotl moves. It's so soothing and therapeutic.

[Instructions]
This is a virtual pet app where you can raise your very own Axolotl on your smartphone. It`s so easy to raise. Just feed your pet once every four days and clean its home once a week. This game app is great for kids and people who find RPG's and puzzle games a bit tedious. Try this game out! It's therapeutic, and a great way to kill time!

[Basic Functions]
- It's simple to raise. Just remember to feed you Axolotl and clean its home.
- Like a real Axolotl, it moves around in such an adorable way.
- You can call over your Axolotl by tapping on the screen. Look at how adorable this is!
- You can give your Axolotl a name. You can give it a new name at anytime.
- Your Axolotl grows in realtime. The growth of your pet is calculated by every 0.5 second.
- The game records how much your pet has grown since the last time you visited it.
- You can take a picture of your Axolotl with your mobile device and share it with your friends over various social networking sites.
- The app also can send you notifications to let you know when your pet needs feeding and cleaning.
- You can even transfer your pet's data to a new device so that you can keep the same pet even after you change your mobile device.
- All of these functions are free and do not require any microtransactions!

[Recommended for:]
- people who have always wanted a Axolotl or already have one and want a virtual Axolotl to spend time with everywhere and at anytime
- people who love visiting the zoo and aquariums
- people who love raising virtual pets
- people who want a simple game to pass their free time with something fun
summary: How would you like to experience the warm feeling of raising your own Axolotl?
title: Axolotl Pet

comments: Well how about the fact that you can only play half of the game, then you have to buy the other half of the levels.  Even buying the levels, the game on a whole, was a bit cr*ppy so I wouldn't waste my money. Maybe Goblin LLC,  should say that you have to buy almost 10 levels. Everyone is entitled to their own opinion so mine is: the game was bad. üòà

I wish these dumb ass games tell you that you can only play 9 levels before you have to buy the rest of the game. Having to pay for any part of the game means it's not free like you claim it is. Don't waste your time with this game.
Well, I bought the 1st package for a dollar and played level 10 and I opened it this morning and the levels 10-12 are locked again. Wasted a dollar. Don't waste your time with this. Uninstalling

Once you pass level 9, you have to pay for VIP. I don't like this and am uninstalling this app because of it. This was supposed to be a  free app. This is very disappointing, for I liked this app. I have been playing it all weekend, and just now passed level 9, which then said if I wanted to continue, i would have to pay for VIP. I am appointing any one who is going to get this app, to not, because of this. It is very dissappointing. The graphics however, are excellent, same with the gameplay. If you're stuck ok a level, you can click the lightbulb and it will bring you to a YouTube video showing you how to get through the level which I found really useful, because these levels are pretty difficult. If you read all this, wow. Good job. And thank you for listening to my advice.  And Goblin LLC, I wish you did better and thought of others when making the VIP part. I won't be downloading any more of your apps.   Thank you.

It is very challenging yet very fun. I finished 1-9 in a couple of hours. I do not like the fact that I cannot do 1-18, though. Plus, there are too many advertisments.  Overall, the game was extrordinary and very relaxing and satisfying, but you guys should limit the adds and give us more free levels to do. Thanks!
Ad placement is too distracting, graphics not that impressive even for being free.

comments: Easy decision to drop down 7 bucks for a killer racquet. I will ALWAYS support devs that make GREAT games with zero ads. This IS fast paced that requires perfect timing to lay down some killer shots. Drop shots are down with ease. If timed perfectly, hard shots stays inbounds.. 7 bucks for a gem? No question on this one. THIS IS THE BEST TENNIS GAME. Kinda like ping pong. I also love one of the Stickman tennis games too, but stick tennis is a gem. Other tennis games are just too easy Thanks to the developer, for no advertisements.. I despise ads

It's a nice game to play with ace players and hand to eye control is very important along with utmost concentration. The difficulty level of the game increases slowly which is nice. But sometimes I found the game gets stuck or lagging is evident.

* WIRED - Essential App * The Telegraph - Must Have App *

Easy to play yet difficult to master, Stick Tennis offers fast and fluid gameplay and a huge range of unique player styles and characteristics to unlock and play.

With just a simple one-fingered swipe you’ll soon be thumping crosscourt winners, yet at the core of Stick Tennis is a highly sophisticated physics engine that rewards tactical play.

descriptionHTML:
Next chapter of Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D scary game! Defend yourself against robot bears, angry chickens, bunnies and foxes and even worse creatures hiding in the shadows! Welcome to the Cube nightmare safeguarding yourself until the morning comes! Open or close the doors and switch on the light not to let cube bears, foxes and bunnies attack you! Use the flashlight to protect yourself from the attack! It will scare away angry cube creatures that may be creeping at the far end of the hallways!

Nevertheless, be careful! If any cube monster has crept too close, it will be the end of your security guard career… Moreover, the life! Face your nightmare with Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D – 2 game!

Spend five nights at Cube pizzeria hiding from angry cube bears, chickens, bunnies and foxes! Are you afraid of cube bears or other monsters? These robots were made to help in Cube Pizzeria, but during the night they might become unpredictable or even attack you! Who else could be in this nightmare mines? Spend five nights at pizzeria full of scary cube monster! Try Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D – 2 game – meet cube bear robots and escape from them to survive!

Be a security guard for chicken, fox, bunny and bear robots for five nights and protect Cube Pizzeria from total destruction! Use very limited amount of electricity per night to protect yourself from robots’ attack! Stay in your security office, watch cube creatures with cameras and try to survive! When you run out of power for the night - all cameras and light are off and cube robots are able to move! Beware of cube bear robots walking in the pizzeria! Escape from your nightmare! Face cube robots with Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D – 2!

Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D – 2 features:

- Cube robot monsters – chickens, foxes, bunnies and bears!

- New Cube Pizzeria locations to explore
- Five nights to survive

Don’t allow cube bear monsters or angry bunnies and foxes to get close to your security office! They all are robots! Spend five nights at Cube Pizzeria and stay alive! Finish your work safe after five scary and horrible nights with Nights at Cube Pizzeria 3D – 2 game! Survive being a pizzeria night security guard and escape from your nightmare! These five nights are going to be the worst nights in your life!

description: üòú You can‚Äôt miss this! The latest crazy installment of Troll Face Quest (Youtube Memes Edition) is finally here! Never heard of Troll Face? With more than 33 million installs worldwide, this series is insanely successful! This time you‚Äôre taken on a hilarious adventure where you‚Äôll solve brain-teasing puzzles and try to make sense of impossible situations while trolling the most famous video game characters in history.üòä To spare their embarrassment, we‚Äôre not mentioning any names here, but the classic heroes of first-person shooters, Italian plumbers, fruit-craving ninjas, fearsome orcs, candy-clogged puzzles and innocent test subjects trapped in labs filled with portals won‚Äôt escape Troll Face‚Äôs ridiculous pranks. üò¨ TROLL OR BE TROLLED?How do you make sense of a world that makes no sense? Is it crazy, or are you just crazy? Try to keep it together as you work your way through more than 30 wacky levels, or lose it when you get trolled for the umpteenth time. ‚Ä¢ 30+ totally crazy and funny puzzles that will make you LOL‚Ä¢ Experience new controls ‚Ä¢ Unlock wacky achievements‚Ä¢ Conquer the global leaderboard‚Ä¢ Play anytime, anywhere no wi-fi neededüòÅ So whether you‚Äôre a young gamer hooked on the latest and greatest MMORPG or a less young one filled with nostalgia for the days when the NES, Game Boy and Mega Drive reigned supreme, you‚Äôre sure to get a kick out of Troll Face Quest: Video Games.   We love your feedback! What‚Äôs your favorite level? Let us know in the reviews!#puzzle, #trolls, #free, #videogames
descriptionHTML:
😜 You can’t miss this! The latest crazy installment of Troll Face Quest (Youtube Memes Edition) is finally here! Never heard of Troll Face? With more than 33 million installs worldwide, this series is insanely successful! This time you’re taken on a hilarious adventure where you’ll solve brain-teasing puzzles and try to make sense of impossible situations while trolling the most famous video game characters in history.

😊 To spare their embarrassment, we’re not mentioning any names here, but the classic heroes of first-person shooters, Italian plumbers, fruit-craving ninjas, fearsome orcs, candy-clogged puzzles and innocent test subjects trapped in labs filled with portals won’t escape Troll Face’s ridiculous pranks.

😬 TROLL OR BE TROLLED?
How do you make sense of a world that makes no sense? Is it crazy, or are you just crazy? Try to keep it together as you work your way through more than 30 wacky levels, or lose it when you get trolled for the umpteenth time.

• 30+ totally crazy and funny puzzles that will make you LOL
• Experience new controls
• Unlock wacky achievements
• Conquer the global leaderboard
• Play anytime, anywhere no wi-fi needed

😁 So whether you’re a young gamer hooked on the latest and greatest MMORPG or a less young one filled with nostalgia for the days when the NES, Game Boy and Mega Drive reigned supreme, you’re sure to get a kick out of Troll Face Quest: Video Games.

We love your feedback! What’s your favorite level? Let us know in the reviews!

#puzzle, #trolls, #free, #videogames
summary: Now you can troll your favorite video game characters in this hilarious sequelüòÑ
title: Troll Face Quest Video Games

comments: I'm kind of in a love/hate relationship with this game.  The concept is great, it controls great it's addictive.  The fact there are 30 sec unskipable advertisement is unforgiving. The fact you can't earn coins in online mode. (Effectively avoiding the advertisement) now explain to me why when I am online, the game is in offline mode which doesn't allow me to collect coins, but I still get advertisement.  It's btw quicker to when an advertisement starts to close the app and restart it, seriously It tested it.

This game is awesome but when it says that you going to get a new track and adds minutes onto the waiting time for your track you were going to get a new track. The controls are really bad and you can't stearer properly you crash and you die in the game

Whomever made this game. Has no concept of the laws of physics or how to properly calibrate controls for a video game. Awesome idea.  Extremely poor execution. Watching paint dry is a better way to spend your time. Just so I'm clear. This is realistically one of the worst games/apps in the world. Almost a waste of effort to write a review. Almost.

Im all for a tough challenge, but this is ridiculous from the rip! It's almost impossible to control. Why not make it easier at first, then progressively harder? This is crazy hard from the start. Let me get good at it before you throw the crazy hard levels out. How can I get better if I can't play past 50 feet? I want to play this game, and I don't give up if I fail once, but if I fail like the first 300 times I guess I'll just never be good at it. So sadly, I have to move on from this game.

Love this game. Though there seem to be no option to skip ads after the recent update. I don't mind ads cuz you can just skip it but if you force people to watch ads in it's entirety, that's just inconvenient & annoying
It is a very good game and addicted BUT it really really annoyes every minute a 40 second video pops up and you can't get off it üò§üò§I would relate it because of the video a 3 star üòä

descriptionHTML:
!!Over 12 million downloads!! Thanks to all the Thumb Drifters out there.

Got an issue? Email us first so we can help.

Note: There are 2 types of cars. Cars which you can pay to unlock or get for free.
[?] secret cars which you can ONLY unlock by performing certain actions.

Whether you know how to drift or not, you’ll enjoy sliding sideways around the corners to compete for the highest score.

WHY PLAY THUMB DRIFT?
- Over 100 fully unlicensed cars to unlock + more to come
- Simple one thumb controls
- Addictive drifting gameplay
- Original soundtrack with 6 pumping tunes
- 6 different tracks to race on each with a unique feel
- Challenge your friends for the top score
- Cutting edge, flat shaded, low poly graphics
- Groundbreaking Carticle™ Technology

SPECIAL GUEST CARS!
- Rice Pirate (Newest!)
- 1320Video driven by Cleetus McFarland (Newest!)
- 4WDTV (Newest!)
- BossLogic (Newest!)
- Hoovivan (Maximum Driftcast) (Newest!)
- Bulletproof Automotives Kamikazi GTR (Newest!)
- Ozzyman Reviews (Newer!)
- Street FX WTF-86 (Newer!)
- Rooster Teeth (New!)
- Regular Car Guys (New!)
- Yogscast (New!)

SCORE REGISTER

* 51-99: Sunday Driver
* 100-199: Training Wheels

* 300-399: You feel the need for speed
* 400-499: You’re in the red
* 500-599: Flat out!
* 600+: You live your life a quarter mile at a time! Dom will be proud

Got a car we should add to the livery? Get in touch!

Note: The game will require access to photos, media and files on your device. This is only used to cache the advertising in game and to allow the sharing of custom screenshots taken in game.

3-1-18: Thank you developer for quickly addressing the problem. The controls are now usable. I look forward to enjoying the game! Edit: the flags on the campaign/skirmish map and the party edit menu are both hard to utilize. I tap them and the screen lights up like the input was acknowledged, but nothing happens. Only after button mashing several times does something happen.  I agree with the other comments: seems like a great game, but unplayable on a phone due to poor controls. It is almost impossible to select icons in the menu.

description: ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ  5/5 ‚Äì Martynas Klimas, strategygamer.com‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÜ  4/5 ‚Äì Matt Skidmore, pockettactics.comWarbands:Bushido is a miniatures board game arena with cards, miniatures, dice (i.e. dice random involved) and beautiful terrains to fight on, with both multiplayer battles boardgamers are used to, and challenging single-player scenarios.Game has a isometric, tabletop-style look with miniature-style characters, cards, dice, pre-rendered battlefields and story-mode scenarios. There will be more than 50 various paintable units and heroes planned for full-scale release and later additions. Multiplayer skirmish will let you test your skills in best traditions of tabletop wargame classics with a fast-paced gameplay. While single-player scenarios with their own characters and events, are highly influenced by classic turn-based RPG tactics.Game background - is the story of civil war in 16th century Japan, known as ‚ÄúWarring States period‚Äù. Samurais and ronins, criminals of all sorts, ninja clans, Chinese pirates, Portuguese mercenaries and firearms traders, all trying to benefit from anarchy and conflict. It is hard to find a more atmospheric and dense setting for a tactical board war games.
descriptionHTML:
★★★★★ 5/5 – Martynas Klimas, strategygamer.com
★★★★☆ 4/5 – Matt Skidmore, pockettactics.com

Warbands:Bushido is a miniatures board game arena with cards, miniatures, dice (i.e. dice random involved) and beautiful terrains to fight on, with both multiplayer battles boardgamers are used to, and challenging single-player scenarios.

Game has a isometric, tabletop-style look with miniature-style characters, cards, dice, pre-rendered battlefields and story-mode scenarios. There will be more than 50 various paintable units and heroes planned for full-scale release and later additions. Multiplayer skirmish will let you test your skills in best traditions of tabletop wargame classics with a fast-paced gameplay. While single-player scenarios with their own characters and events, are highly influenced by classic turn-based RPG tactics.

Game background - is the story of civil war in 16th century Japan, known as “Warring States period”. Samurais and ronins, criminals of all sorts, ninja clans, Chinese pirates, Portuguese mercenaries and firearms traders, all trying to benefit from anarchy and conflict. It is hard to find a more atmospheric and dense setting for a tactical board war games.
recentChanges: - Units list updated with larger cards and zoom
- Deck building screen controls updated with drag and drop, addition by tap removed
- New Leader quest completion now takes more orders to complete
- Major combat controls issue with freezing UI buttons fixed
- Major issue with main menu controls on high DPI devices fixed
- Fixed issue with combat replays freezing
- Fixed conflict with New Leader quest
summary: Turn-based historical hex CCG wargame, with samurai and ninja skirmish fights.
title: Warbands: Bushido - Tactical Miniatures Board Game

comments: Very good app that trains logical thinking. If you want to be a computer scientist, math isnt everything since math and logic are different areas. This game gives a pretty good idea of whats behind coding, and its a good supplement to play when you are bored while improving some skills at the same time. The controls could improve, such as being able to reset the bots position, or cancel a loop run without having to reset all the code. Im looking forward for more planets :D

One of the best applications I have encountered till date. Am not into programming, but still had to learn it as a necessary course for a semester. There was no need of it afterwards, so the teachers were simply skimming everything. We were taught from basics to looping in two classes with zero previous knowledge about programming. But still this thing caught my attention. Only if they would have recommended this game to one and all, we would have spent a nice semester. This game pretty much explains the basics, but with better understanding. Great job.

Love this game/app. I mean the only thing I wish it had a little more instruction to learn from (I got function-2 but not the way it should have been done.)  Just as I am "self teaching" with only books and apps. But anyway this app still gets 5 stars.

To the developer: please try to answer what other used has already asked you: what's the solution for problem #6 in Loop? (If any). Just like him/her, tried as I may, I came to the conclusion that, unless we're missing on something, it seems to be one step short of the solution! Also, though like me, English is not obviously your mother tongue, please change "Congratulation" (singular) to "Congratulations". üòÄ

It's interesting, but my main gripe is that it really doesn't feel like you're learning how to code. There's also a bug where if you press the restart button it erases all your work. So, if your robot is stuck in an endless loop, you can't save your work at all. It's also a bit short at the moment, finished all the levels in under an hour.

Difficulty level is all over the place. Doesn't really do well to teach programing concepts and more of just puzzles.   Coding is about finding the most efficient way to do something.   The game actually encourages you to do an infinite loop and run redundant steps to complete a puzzle.   Crashes almost all the time

- The defense game with over 11 million downloads is back with more advanced graphics and systems!
- Kill or be killed! It’s one or the other! It's the breathtaking confrontation for mankind's survival!

description: Welcome to downhill racing on Piggy Island! Feel the rush as you tear down the track at breakneck speeds in a thrilling race to the finish. It‚Äôs going to be a bumpy ride! Watch out for hazardous roads, and mischievous opponents who will do anything to get to first place. Outrun the competition to earn rewards, upgrade your kart, and become the best driver Piggy Island has ever seen! Ready, set‚Ä¶ GO!RACE AS THE BIRDS OR PIGS IN A 3D WORLD! Jump behind the wheel with your favorite Angry Birds characters (Red, Chuck, Terence, King Pig, Moustache Pig and many more) and see Piggy Island come alive in this rich and colorful 3D world! EXCITING CAMPAIGN MODE! Test your skills in super-fun and surprising races and unlock exclusive rewards!MASTER THE TRACKS! Plenty of racetracks, stunt roads, air courses and off-road races ‚Äì each throwing big and unexpected challenges your way!AWESOME SPECIAL POWERS! Smash your opponents off the road and take that winning position thanks to unique special powers for each character! UPGRADE YOUR RIDE! Collect and upgrade your karts to become the best racer on the Island! TIME-LIMITED TOURNAMENTS! Mirror, mirror on the wall, who‚Äôs the fastest of them all? Drive your way to the top of the leaderboards and win prizes!DAILY RACES! Enter a new race every day and find the hidden gift box on the track!LOCAL MULTIPLAYER MODE! Compete with friends in real time local multiplayer!TELEPODS! A ground-breaking way to play! Teleport your favorite characters into the race by placing your Angry Birds Go! TELEPODS figures on your device‚Äôs camera!*MORE TO COME! The new race has only just begun ‚Äì look out for more GO developments in 2016! Angry Birds Go! now requires an internet connection. After the initial download, additional content will be downloaded and this may lead to further data transfer charges according to your mobile phone service plan. You can avoid data charges by playing over WIFI. descriptionHTML:
Welcome to downhill racing on Piggy Island! Feel the rush as you tear down the track at breakneck speeds in a thrilling race to the finish. It’s going to be a bumpy ride! Watch out for hazardous roads, and mischievous opponents who will do anything to get to first place. Outrun the competition to earn rewards, upgrade your kart, and become the best driver Piggy Island has ever seen! Ready, set… GO!

RACE AS THE BIRDS OR PIGS IN A 3D WORLD! Jump behind the wheel with your favorite Angry Birds characters (Red, Chuck, Terence, King Pig, Moustache Pig and many more) and see Piggy Island come alive in this rich and colorful 3D world!

EXCITING CAMPAIGN MODE! Test your skills in super-fun and surprising races and unlock exclusive rewards!

MASTER THE TRACKS! Plenty of racetracks, stunt roads, air courses and off-road races – each throwing big and unexpected challenges your way!

AWESOME SPECIAL POWERS! Smash your opponents off the road and take that winning position thanks to unique special powers for each character!

UPGRADE YOUR RIDE! Collect and upgrade your karts to become the best racer on the Island!

TIME-LIMITED TOURNAMENTS! Mirror, mirror on the wall, who’s the fastest of them all? Drive your way to the top of the leaderboards and win prizes!

DAILY RACES! Enter a new race every day and find the hidden gift box on the track!

LOCAL MULTIPLAYER MODE! Compete with friends in real time local multiplayer!

TELEPODS! A ground-breaking way to play! Teleport your favorite characters into the race by placing your Angry Birds Go! TELEPODS figures on your device’s camera!*

MORE TO COME! The new race has only just begun – look out for more GO developments in 2016!

Angry Birds Go! now requires an internet connection. After the initial download, additional content will be downloaded and this may lead to further data transfer charges according to your mobile phone service plan. You can avoid data charges by playing over WIFI.

This game includes paid commercial content from select partners.

Important Message for Parents
This game may include:
- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.
- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.
- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.

*Angry Birds Go! Telepods sold separately and are compatible with select mobile devices.

title: Angry Birds Go!

descriptionHTML:
Ever wondered what happens when you leave your puppy home alone?
Does your puppy throw a secret disco party? Does she dress up in the most stylish outfits or ride her skateboard around the house? Find out what really goes on when you’re not home!

Discover your puppy’s secret life - and get ready to party!

Features:
> Choose from 12 adorable & fluffy pet puppies!
> Throw a secret party with your puppy - choose your favorite party music & show off your dance moves! Shhh... it’s a secret!
> Sing and chat with your pet puppy - she’ll repeat what you say!
> Dress up your puppy in the most adorable outfits & doggy accessories.
> Feed your puppy yummy snacks like steak, ice cream, & drumsticks!
> Care for your pet puppy when she’s sick. Take her to the doctor’s clinic!
> Bathe your puppy - give your pet a warm bubble bath!
> Win tons of awesome toys & furniture to decorate your puppy’s room!

comments: If flying a "real rc plane" is like this app why would you bother? I have flown both rc helicopters & basic model planes, this app is nothing like flying a rc plane so far from the real control & feeling of flying a rc plane you might as well sit in a chair shut your eyes & make airplane sounds!

The flight physics are way off. If I have idle power and a nose down attitude my airspeed should be increasing not decreasing.  The rudder is non existent . Deleted after 5 minutes.   From: A real pilot , and Rc flyer
You have only 1 plane. To get the rest of them you have to pay REAL MONEY. This company wants just to take your money. DON'T DOWNLOAD!
You only get one plane...you have to buy remaining planes it is the only problem..but if you are looking to fly a rc plane for first time then this app is very helpful..
I think this is a great game to pass time but the planes are just to expensive. I passed all levels with in 2 days.  It's now time to uninstall and look for another game with less expensive planes.
Game is beat but one thing is bad that is we have only one plane but we want to by a new new plane so we will pay our real money ......so please solve this problem ..

comments: This game has highly disappointed me.  It was super fun and interactive at first then it gives you the option to pay to continue to play or to complete free offers to unlock the game for free.  I have found that you can complete as many offers ad you want but the game won't ever unlock and emailing the support web site doesn't do any good either. They don't ever respond and it is a complete waste of time.  Don't waste your time on this game.  Go out and find yourself something worth playing because this surely isn't it.

DO NOT DOWNLOAD CAN NOT BE COMPLETED DUE TO A BUG!!!!!!  After buying you eventually get to the accordion level just before leaving the prison roof only for one (or 2 on some phones) ball being outside the play area which makes the mini game impossible.  Many reviews all over the internet highlighting this bug but the developer has not bothered to fix it.  AVOID THIS DEVELOPER !!!!!!!!!!

I really like it and how you get to interact with other people. The only thing that bothered me were the hints being super obvious. Not very helpful. Also, some things are glitchy. Like I know I pressed certain things and it couldn't detect my finger. But overall good game!!

It's fun in the begin it has a great starting puzzles.. they are challenging but interesting.. until you get to put your plans in place and then find out you can't continue unless you pay for hints or you do unnecessary task using other apps.. I found this feature pointless because I don't even use the hints but the producers are making me extra hard to get them.. it's a bunch of b.s. at this point I am unhappy with how they set this part up.. don't install you'll be disappointed unless you have money to spend that for no reason

It would be a good game if it didn't keep freezing up on me. It's a shame too because I really love these types of games (like Escape from the Titanic). Couldn't get past the level where the inmate has the task of cleaning the glass pane and has to gain entry into the clerks' office...it just freezes up and I can't resolve it no matter what I tried.

"Free" version lets you play minimal levels. I then completed 2 different offers to get the whole game. After spending an hour on each offer, still haven't been given access to the full game. Game is a joke and makers are a fraud. Waiting for something to happen to my info that was added to the offers.
description: No one has ever escaped and lived to tell. At least that's the official story...Escape Alcatraz, the follow-up to Escape the Titanic delivers the next blockbuster adventure puzzler that puts you at the heart of an amazing true-life escape that remains unsolved to this day. Craft and assemble tools you‚Äôll need, as you plan your high-stakes prison break. Can you devise an escape plan, fool the guards and find the right time to pull the trigger to freedom?Never a dull moment as you pinch, twist, tap & swipe your way through ingenious room-puzzle challenges.With nothing to lose, do you have the smarts and tenacity to solve every puzzle and make it off The Rock!  ....Good luck!  ‚Ä¢ 50+ clever puzzles - unlike anything you‚Äôve ever seen.‚Ä¢ Integrated Hint System, if you need a little help.‚Ä¢ Find hidden tools to aid in your escape.‚Ä¢  Hints and Answers available as IAPEscape Alcatraz is a FREE-TO-TRY app. You can play the first chapter for free, if you want to unlock the epic FULL version, there is a one-time fee to purchase, plus a FREE option unlock the FULL version, too.
descriptionHTML:
No one has ever escaped and lived to tell. At least that's the official story...

Escape Alcatraz, the follow-up to Escape the Titanic delivers the next blockbuster adventure puzzler that puts you at the heart of an amazing true-life escape that remains unsolved to this day. Craft and assemble tools you’ll need, as you plan your high-stakes prison break. Can you devise an escape plan, fool the guards and find the right time to pull the trigger to freedom?

Never a dull moment as you pinch, twist, tap & swipe your way through ingenious room-puzzle challenges.

With nothing to lose, do you have the smarts and tenacity to solve every puzzle and make it off The Rock! ....Good luck!

• 50+ clever puzzles - unlike anything you’ve ever seen.
• Integrated Hint System, if you need a little help.
• Find hidden tools to aid in your escape.
• Hints and Answers available as IAP

Escape Alcatraz is a FREE-TO-TRY app. You can play the first chapter for free, if you want to unlock the epic FULL version, there is a one-time fee to purchase, plus a FREE option unlock the FULL version, too.
summary: No one has ever escaped and lived to tell. At least that's the official story...
title: Escape Alcatraz

description: Its mechanics is very simple you only have to press with your finger the badly placed pieces of road and look for the correct position until forming and completing the car puzzle. All parts must be properly connected. Demonstrate your mental ability and become part of the great players. Intelligence video games are an excellent way to improve brain performance. Each exercise is a riddle that urges us to look for the right result. They are puzzles with a unique answer, looking for solutions to each problem.This game has difficult puzzles at higher levels. It has a perfect learning level for those players looking for fun without having to eat their head. If you like math puzzles this is your game. Solve each puzzle with exact solutions.Exercise memory for free with this logic and strategy video game. Playing will make you think and test you. Solve the visual puzzles 100% free and get inside the club of the wit of the most intelligent people in the world as the genius Einstein. Complete this puzzle car puzzle with progressive difficulty. Look for the right path as in the pipe games and build the race track.It will be the ABC of all your mental agility pastimes and test your intelligence. Complete the levels and dashboard forming the race tracks, join the roads. Practice with these games to exercise your mind: reasoning, logic, memory and mental / cognitive skills to train throughout your life to get your brain in shape. With the practice of mental exercises will help improve your ability to solve mathematical problems in your daily life.Logic puzzles | Cars puzzle contains:- Translated into 22 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Brazilian, Turkish, Russian, Malay, Japanese, Chinese, Danish, Norwegian, Polish , Swedish, Indonesian, Arabic, Korean, Thai, Indian and Persian.- Different sections of roads.- Simple logic.- Simple and intuitive controls.- Difficulty of puzzles from easier to more difficult.- Does not contain purchases within the application.- Hours of fun.- No annoying ads.- Car puzzle game that you must build racing car circuits.- More than 100 logic puzzles with exclusive response.- Video game totally free.- You do not need the Internet.- It takes up little space.- You can train the mind.Remember that logic is the branch of philosophy that studies the geometries and general principles that rule over all knowledge and human thought, considered purely in itself, without reference to objects. In addition to being a method or reasoning in which ideas or the sequence of events that are manifested or are developed in a coherent way and without there being contradictions between them.* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *Do not forget to vote, rate and / or comment on the Google Play Store in order to improve (suggestions, graphic errors, translation errors, improvements, suggestions ...)
descriptionHTML:
Its mechanics is very simple you only have to press with your finger the badly placed pieces of road and look for the correct position until forming and completing the car puzzle. All parts must be properly connected. Demonstrate your mental ability and become part of the great players. Intelligence video games are an excellent way to improve brain performance. Each exercise is a riddle that urges us to look for the right result. They are puzzles with a unique answer, looking for solutions to each problem.

This game has difficult puzzles at higher levels. It has a perfect learning level for those players looking for fun without having to eat their head. If you like math puzzles this is your game. Solve each puzzle with exact solutions.

Exercise memory for free with this logic and strategy video game. Playing will make you think and test you. Solve the visual puzzles 100% free and get inside the club of the wit of the most intelligent people in the world as the genius Einstein. Complete this puzzle car puzzle with progressive difficulty. Look for the right path as in the pipe games and build the race track.

It will be the ABC of all your mental agility pastimes and test your intelligence. Complete the levels and dashboard forming the race tracks, join the roads. Practice with these games to exercise your mind: reasoning, logic, memory and mental / cognitive skills to train throughout your life to get your brain in shape. With the practice of mental exercises will help improve your ability to solve mathematical problems in your daily life.

Logic puzzles | Cars puzzle contains:
- Translated into 22 languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Brazilian, Turkish, Russian, Malay, Japanese, Chinese, Danish, Norwegian, Polish , Swedish, Indonesian, Arabic, Korean, Thai, Indian and Persian.
- Different sections of roads.
- Simple logic.
- Simple and intuitive controls.
- Difficulty of puzzles from easier to more difficult.
- Does not contain purchases within the application.
- Hours of fun.
- No annoying ads.
- Car puzzle game that you must build racing car circuits.
- More than 100 logic puzzles with exclusive response.
- Video game totally free.
- You do not need the Internet.
- It takes up little space.
- You can train the mind.

Remember that logic is the branch of philosophy that studies the geometries and general principles that rule over all knowledge and human thought, considered purely in itself, without reference to objects. In addition to being a method or reasoning in which ideas or the sequence of events that are manifested or are developed in a coherent way and without there being contradictions between them.

comments: I've tried about most of the bowling games on line and none compare with this one.  I almost had a perfect 300 game but for 1 spare frame.  You can back off the foul line and really speed the ball for a perfect strike.  None of the others can do that!  Love it.  One change please, put the high score function back into play. Finally got my 1st perfect 300 game and no one witnessed it!  ü§óüò†üëç

Ultimate bowling 2014 This is by far one of the better bowling games I have ran across in very long time. You have more choices when it comes to the bowling balls, better control of the ball as you are sending it down the lane, I could go on but the one thing I would like to see change would be for you to show the pins like they do in real bowling that have gone down on your first shot like off to the side somewhere. This would make it even more realistic, otherwise I can't find a thing wrong so far with the game..hope you enjoy

This is a nice bowling game that works beautifully on my 10" tablet.  The ball can be rolled slow or very fast.  The pins act as if they're very light weight.  This is a good game for beginners or anyone who just wants to bowl a quick, satisfying game. Aiming the ball is easy. I like the fact that this game connects to Google Play Games.  The ball can appear a darker color if pulled back toward you too far. Check out the ball with the hand imprint or the one with the spider.  If I could recommend one update, it would be to update the year (2014 bugs me) and prevent the ball from being snagged up by the thin black line.  Also, please relay my score rather than telling me to wait until a friend plays for comparison.

REAL BOWLING!!!!! Wow finally found a good no frills bowling game! The ball movement is wonderful! You can get it to do all kinds of things. I can launch it like a missile or granny roll and even throw yes throw!!!! IT HAVE FUN if I could give it ten stars I would.
Best bowling game on the app store There are so many games with all this unneeded nonsense, you have no idea how hard it is to find a bowling game where you just roll a ball at pins.
Crappy.. No arrows on the lanes and you can throw the ball 200 mph.. Kinda OK game if your not really looking for the bowling experience..

descriptionHTML:
Start your construction today! Create your infinite fictional world!

Enjoy this endless paradise.

Build, destroy, move, fly, jump and craft. And all this for free !!!

There are over 100 different items in your inventory to build separate rooms including a living room, bedroom, toilet, bathroom, a private garden, a house for animals.

Easily place the standard blocks that you want to install and use them to build something, you can build everything you can imagine.

Choose creativity or survival mode, move through your world and make it more remarkable.

Move through this endless world in flight, save your work, and play again later.

Everyone loves Kraft games, they have become popular all over the world; You can start with a few blocks and gradually build an empire.

Explore and start developing your dream. You can use many different items, so you can create your ideal Kingdom. The game is infinite, which makes it so intriguing.

★★★★★ PLEASE RATE THIS GAME WITH 5 STARS★★★★★

For those who still see the error at the beginning. Go into the settings of your phone. Selects programs and games. Look for our game: Exploration Prime. Choose this. Then you can grant permissions to the game. Then you need to give the game permission to write to your storage. After that, the game will work.

Enjoy!

The game Exploration Prime is an open source project which is subject to the LGPLv3 license. Before using the code, you must read the entire license and agree to it.

descriptionHTML:
Tap your way to an earthy empire in “Dirt Inc.” and become the global power house in the world market!

----------------------------------------

Game Features

• Simple one tap controls to dig as many minerals as you can!

• Spend your income on upgrades to increase your production from the hundreds to the thousands, millions and beyond!

• Buy a Digger to automatically dig for you!

• Hire a foreman to help find the rarest of earthly minerals like coal, copper, gold and even diamonds! (Yes coal is a rare earthly material...).

• Build mines in the quarry to automatically generate even more income!

• Purchase awesome bonuses in the research lab such as generating income while not even playing the game!

• Progress through five different worlds, each with their own visuals, via the progression bar system!

• Reset the game with the prestige system and play again with an income bonus based on your last play through!

• Complete contract missions to earn rewards.

• Can you unlock all of the achievements?

----------------------------------------

Adverts and Permissions

• Permission for network access to show ads, no other special permissions!

• Unobtrusive banner ads at the bottom of the screen!

• Full screen ads (completely optional) to set your own company name, get in game skins, support us (with a reward) and to increase your mission rewards!

----------------------------------------

With an almost never ending upgrade system you will be entertained for weeks!

----------------------------------------

Games played on some mobile devices can be intensive causing them to generate heat.

- If your device is heating up too much, play for small periods of time and allow it to cool in between.
- Do not play games while the charger is plugged in.
- Do not leave your device on playing games for excessive periods of time.
- Do not leave games playing overnight.

----------------------------------------
ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES

- For specific information about how Digital Panda Studios collects and uses data, please read our privacy policy available through the Privacy Policy field below.

- Requires acceptance of our End User License Agreement ("EULA") and Privacy Policy. You can find both of these documents on our website, please review them before downloading.

- Minimum system requirements: Android v4.0 or above, 70mb of free space and 512mb of RAM.

- You must be aged 13+ to play.

summary: Tap your way to an earthy empire in Dirt Inc!
title: Dirt Inc.
